name: ID IDAODAN Portable Dual Nozzle Rose Red 110V 600W Electric Balloon Blower Pump/Electric Balloon Inflator for Decorations
description:
Product Description

Description:¬†

This Electric Balloon Air Pump Inflator has Advanced Wire storage (when not use, you can store the wire to avoid to be damaged) and Automatic protection device, when the pump unattended too long time, the pump will automatically disconnect the power supply.

The best suitable for advertising balloons promotional activities and balloon decoration and festive scene layout, the inflation rate is fast, simple and flexible operation, switch control inflation, classified as continuous and touch-on two patterns, the appearance of lightweight, portable design.

Choose this and create a warm atmosphere for the party and enjoy the nice time.

operating steps:

1: pinch two sides of mouth of balloon with your fingers¬†
2: cover inflation port with balloon¬†
3: inflate balloon by pushing inflation port down¬†
4: release inflation port when balloon size is suitable¬†

Highlight:¬†

This electric balloon pump is designed with two operation modes, one automatic and one semi-automatic. Please choose the right mode for different balloons. If automatic mode is too fast, then please choose semi-automatic(press-on) mode, which will avoid blowing balloons burst. When using semi-automatic mode, just simply plug in the pump, leave power switch to "off" position and press the nozzle to inflate. If stop pressing, inflation will stop as well.¬†

Please be aware that this product will only fill the balloons with air, not helium or hydrogen.

Product Specifications¬†

Color: Rose Red¬†
Size: 20 x 15 x 12 (cm)
Input voltage :110-120V.
Pressure: 18000pa-22000pa, 1.75psi.
Frequency: 50Hz¬†
Item weight: 1.3kg
Power: 600W.
Inflation Rate: 750 (L/min)

reviews.content: We recently brought this. It has plenty of accessories for various sizes. Just to make sure, this isn't helium, so balloons will not escape in the air or float high. Few issues are that the air pressure to high, so I doubt if smaller kids might be able to operate. Also, it heats up pretty quickly. We did about 50 balloons in about 30-40 min or so. Except for the air pressure and heating issue, this is a decent product. Buy based on whether adults plan to use or kids, if adults, its a good products, but for kids I do not recommend this.

We haven't had our party yet so sorry no photo, but I have tested this unit out and it is exactly what we needed. It is so easy. And even though there seems to be no explanation on how to use the "balloon tie off" pieces, there are great YouTube videos for that. I don't really LET my 5 year old granddaughter use it because of the air force that comes out of it, but she did test it and blew up the balloon just fine. Takes about 1-1.5 seconds for a 12 inch balloon.
This is easy to use and perfect because it is affordable and should last the course. If you have little kids, this is a must buy!

¬†I recently purchased this Electric Balloon Blower Pump for Decorations for my son's birthday party and I have to say, I am extremely impressed with this product. As someone who has no experience with balloon decor whatsoever, I was a bit apprehensive about using it. However, I found the process to be incredibly easy and straightforward.

The dual nozzle design was particularly useful for me as it allowed me to inflate multiple balloons at once, saving me a lot of time. The color of the blower, rose red, is also very attractive and adds a touch of elegance to the decor.

The 600W electric motor is powerful enough to inflate even the largest of balloons with ease. I was also pleased to find that the noise level was minimal, which made the process even more pleasant.

Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase and would highly recommend this product to anyone looking to add some balloon decor to their next event. The ID IDAODAN Portable Dual Nozzle Rose Red 110V 600W Electric Balloon Blower Pump/Electric Balloon Inflator for Decorations is a great investment for anyone looking to add some fun and color to their party. It was so easy to use and the end result turned out great. I love this product!
I purchased this because a friend recommended it as useful & affordable/ it‚Äôs beyond easy to use - I think I‚Äôve really wasted a great deal of money üí¥from not purchasing a long time ago !!!
This machine made it so much easier to blow up a lot of a balloons, only bad part is that after blowing up a lot of balloons it starts to smell like its burning.
The balloon pump was perfect!! Made blowing up the balloons fast and easy.
It worked great! I love it!
I purchased this to help blow up balloons for a babyshower and a Balloon garland and was so surprised at how much time and effort it saved me.
Product is easy use. Fair price and fast delivery

name: Tomcat Glue Traps Mouse Size with Eugenol for Enhanced Stickiness, Contains 6 Mouse Size Glue Traps - Captures Mice and Other Household Pests - Professional Strength, Pesticide-Free and Ready-to-Use
description:
Product Description

The Tomcat Glue Traps, Mouse Size with Eugenol for Enhanced Stickiness are the pesticide-free, non-toxic way to effectively control mice. The Eugenol formula enhances stickiness for gripping power. Effectively captures mice and other rodents and pests. Includes Eugenol for enhanced stickiness. Also traps a variety of insects, including spiders, roaches or even scorpions. Glue traps are easy to use, allowing placement in small places like entry and garage doors, below windows, near utilities and any other areas where rodents tend to hide.

reviews.content: Great product, was having issue with 1 rodent running in the house tripping alarm multiple times, we didn‚Äôt know why. After months of this issue the rodent relocated to the garage and then it crawled up in the attic making odd noises. So we knew we had a mouse freeloading in our house, so I decided to buy this trap, and within 1 day it was caught and disposed of. So no more odd noises at night.

I live in the country and mice are a problem year round. No matter how clean your house is, no matter how much you try to keep everything organized ... mice are a problem out here. We're surrounded by fields and woods so it's just a way of life. That being said, we still shouldn't have to "live" with the dirty rat bass-turds. So I have tried everything out there. . .bait traps, snap traps, catchmaster traps, you name it I've tried everything. I've purchased very expensive "humane" traps and poison traps, I've done it all. NOTHING is as good as these sticky traps. Yes they seem a little awful but it beats getting sick bc there are mice feces all over my house. No thanks. It's them or me and right now it's all about me and my home. . .huge thumbs up for these bc they actual STICK!!!

If you have very small mini mice then these are the traps for you. But if you have unknowingly had mice in your house for a while, and they have been eating crumbs from under your fridge, crumbs the kids left behind, chocolate Christmas candy wrapped in foil you had hidden in the basement... and now are huge mice with super length and strength get the bigger traps. The big ones can run with these traps still attached to them

I‚Äôve bought these glue traps before and they work!! We have several mice in our house (there‚Äôs a lot of new houses being built nearby, so they are just getting pushed out of their environment). I paid an exterminator $800 to seal any openings and set traps. He used a few snap traps and those things didn‚Äôt catch Jack squat. I heard two of the snap traps go off but they didn‚Äôt catch anything. We caught 3 mice with these glue traps! It‚Äôs embarrassing to admit having vermin in our home, but these will definitely help catch them! I have a dog and a baby so I didn‚Äôt want to use poison- plus the exterminator said if the vermin eats poison they just go and die inside your walls and then you have the dead smell to deal with. Just put these to block the paths where you think the mice are using.

These traps are STICKY so if you have a pet that gets stuck to it- my dog made the mistake of picking up the trap once a mouse was caught and it ended up getting stuck to my dog‚Äôs paw. I put (a lot of) olive oil on a folded paper towel and really had to wipe to get all the residue off his foot (then I washed his paw with soapy Dawn water cuz gross!)

But great product- super effective

Got 2 mice within hours of placing these traps in an evidently-high traffic mouse crossing. I wish these were slightly larger, because both mice got stuck on the edge and worried me about whether they'd be ever to pull themselves free since it was only 1 or 2 of their feet stuck. The second mouse dragged itself and the trap toward the hole they're coming out of, and I think it might have soon been able to free itself since it chewed at the trap itself and was barely still stuck. I placed a dab of peanut butter on the center. Stickiness does the trick, though, and it's simple to set up, which is what I'm looking for since I'm afraid to set other traps. Just make sure you keep checking these since they do not kill the mouse.

That mouse tried its hardest to get off. It died right on the trap! Laid it out before bed around 2am, got up at 6am, and boom. CULPRIT STUCK TO TRAP!

Found out the contractor left a super huge hole where the dryer connection leading to outside was. I had it sealed ASAP. Have NOT had any issues since!
Put them down with a bit of dog food bait. Caught 4 overnight and am mouse-free. I'm a believer. Easy to use and easy to dispose of.

A mouse got into my 400 sq. ft. NYC apartment on a Monday and could not/would not leave. Ordered these straight away, they arrived Wednesday. I set up two around 5pm (slightly difficult to pull them apart, just hold one firmly in each hand and pull the glue holding them together apart slowly), baited them with a little bit of peanut butter and waited. Just 6 hours later, the trap was sprung and my torment was over! My only regret is I couldn't get these in my hands fast enough.
I tried other traps that the mice just ignored. When I used this product my problem was solved.
Cheep traps didn't work in cold, these do got three mice that other trap didnt

name: Amazon Basics Microfiber Cleaning Cloths, Non-Abrasive, Reusable and Washable - Pack of 24, 12 x16-Inch, Blue, White and Yellow
description:
Product Description
Product Description

Amazon Basics Microfiber Cleaning Cloths, Non-Abrasive, Reusable and Washable - Pack of 24, 12 x16-Inch, Blue, White and Yellow

From the Manufacturer

Amazon Basics

reviews.content:
This review is for Amazon Basics Microfiber Cleaning Cloths, Non-Abrasive, Reusable and Washable - Pack of 24, 12 x16
Color-fast and with a nice edging that does not ravel. I have not tried using these for "deep cleaning."

Having read some comments that machine laundering may gradually reduce their effectiveness, I wash them by hand and hang to dry, unless they are unusually dirty. No fabric softeners, of course, as they reduce absorption. I keep clean cloths handy for wiping down the chrome fixtures in the kitchen, bathroom sinks, and shower--expecting by these means to prevent spots of corrosion from developing because the water in So. Cal. being very "hard."
I have also found them very good for cleaning our brushed stainless steel refrigerator and Magic Chef microwave oven. We wanted a white fridge, but constraints of sizing and supply forced us to buy stainless, and I was worried because many people write about how it shows fingerprints. The company selling it also sells a special compound to remove them, but I found a DIY online that calls only for white vinegar and a cloth that leaves no fuzz--i.e., microfiber. Keeping a spray bottle of vinegar and one of these cloths handy, I have found that "fingerprinting" is no problem whatsoever.
If anyone here is considering getting microfiber cloths for cleaning stainless steel appliances, be aware that brushed stainless steel has a sort of "grain" to it. You can see very tiny lines all going in one direction; that is the "brushing." Spray a bit of the vinegar on a microfiber cloth and wipe in the direction of the grain to remove dirt and fingerprints. Wipe again with a dry section of the cloth to remove any residue of vinegar, which seems to remove the necessity of rinsing, and if any fingerprints persist, re-wiping with a tiny bit of olive oil on the cloth somehow miraculously takes care of them. Polish again with a clean part of the cloth, and done. Most of the time I find I am "one and done‚Äù with just the vinegar, and I love these cloths.
I like that they came in white, blue, and yellow, so I can assign different colors to different jobs. If there is anything particularly dirty, or a potential for staining, I plan to use the white ones for that, so I can give them whatever laundry treatment seems necessary. By the way, neither the blue nor the yellow has bled into the laundry water and caused trouble with white garments being washed together with these cloths. I recall reading a comment about such bleeding, and can only assume that it refers to a different product, as Amazon sometimes lumps together the reviews for similar, but not identical, products.

I used to work for a professional (National) cleaning company and these cloths are comparable to what we used! I love the color variety pack so I can color code per area. Pink for bathrooms, grey for kitchen and green for house and dusting. I like to know I‚Äôm not cross contaminating. I‚Äôve only washed a couple times now but they‚Äôre still soft and pick up dirt and debris super well. This former maid approves.

I initially purchased these to reduce the amount of paper towels we use. They clean any residue with ease. No steaks left behind on granite, stainless steel, mirrors, or glass. I also used them for dusty baseboards. So impressed! The quantity you receive is nice and the size of the clothes are perfect.

These are great, I use them instead of paper towels now to clean up messes. They also work really well and so much better than anything else on brushed nickel, stainless steel and glass/mirror. You get a ton of them, I keep them in a plastic (pork rind) container and just pull them out as I need them, use and rinse a few times and then toss in the washer. I haven't used them to wash a car, I think they'd be great for interior cleaning but probably too thin for exterior washing.
I use these for windows, mirrors, and chrome fridge. Never any lint. They even did a great job on the inside car windows.

These are good for cleaning and are soft enough not to scratch a delicate surface.

Slightly more expensive than the Costco bundle you can get for similar towels, but then again you have to have a costco near you and be a member!
For this price, they're cheap enough to order, use a few times, then donate. Do not put these in the dryer - they'll last longer if you air dry them.
I use these for both light and deep cleaning and they work great. Not so good at picking up hair but what rag is? These will definitely cut down my paper towel usage.
I‚Äôve been using these for about 2 months. They soak up water nicely and dry quickly. Great replacement for paper towels. I would buy again.

These cloths are the most amazing and versatile cleaning product I've ever used! I had no idea when I bought them how many things you could clean with them and how many cleaning products they would replace. Here's a sample. They can easily replace:

*Paper towels
*Windex, Glass Plus, etc.
*Comet, Ajax (except in the worst cases)
*Mr. Clean Magic Sponge (they work exactly like Magic Sponge on light grease buildup)
*All kinds of soap/cleaning products

Using just water with these cloths, you can clean so many things that used to require soap and water. Like a greasy stove, or the grease build-up in your kitchen and bathroom sinks.

The real trick to keeping your house clean is to clean often before the dirt and grease have a chance to build up. But when you have to use soap - it really discourages you from doing it too often because everything turns into such a big job. Like, would you really clean your microwave after every couple of uses? No! Because it's too much work to clean something that's not that dirty yet. You have to use some kind of soap with water, then you have to use more water and a few more minutes to rinse away all the soap. So most people just wait until it's dirty enough to make all that work worth it. But with these, you can literally clean after every use. Just wet one, and wipe the microwave down one time (10 seconds max)... and you're done! The end result: the microwave is NEVER dirty!

And it's so easy to clean things that used to be so hard. For instance, if you want to keep your stove sparkling clean after cooking a meal that resulted in a lot of greasy splatter... just fold these twice, wet one side and after you finish cooking wipe down the stove, then turn it over and wipe again with the drier side. Then take a second one that's dry and wipe one more time. And voila, your stove will be completely clean, no grease or oil left! They're really amazing. And I LOVE not having to use soap on everything. It makes it so much simpler and quicker to clean.

I actually enjoy cleaning now, because it's so quick and easy. The trick on cleaning things like your stove is to do it often. I do it every 3-4 times I cook. I should do it every 2-3 times. But the point is to do it often enough that the grease splatter doesn't have a chance to build up so much that you need something stronger to clean it with.

They are also so absorbent that they'll soak water right off anything they touch. I even find myself reaching for them when I want to dry my hands quickly - because I know they'll suck the water right off. They don't feel as good on your hands as a soft cloth or paper towel does - but they do a much better job at drying them.

They dry very fast too. If I soak one in water, and then wring it out, it will be dry within 3-4 hours.

You can clean all kinds of things with them, from the stove, to sinks to windows and mirrors. I've even used them on my eyeglasses - although I'm not sure that's a good idea as they may rub the various coatings off after a while. But I did it on an old pair so no harm done - and they clean every bit as well as my old eyeglasses spray and a paper towel did. And all you need are one of these cloths and a few drops of water!

They're also amazing at picking up dust when they're wet or dry. Just wipe the surface once and the dust is instantly gone.

I've found the quickest and easiest way to clean most things from windows to stove tops is what I suggested above for the stove. I take two of them and fold them over twice. Then I wet one side and wipe it all over whatever surface I want to clean. Then wipe again with the backside which should be a little drier. This will pick up all the excess water, which will then make it easy to fully dry with the second dry cloth. Just use it to wipe one more time to fully dry the surface. Seriously, what could be simpler or quicker? I can clean my stove, microwave, dining room table, plus two glass living room tables all in less time than it used to take me to clean just the stove!

I've put a couple of these in my shower. And every other morning after I shower, I take one and wipe down the glass doors, then I wring it out and wipe them again. Then I take another dry one and wipe one more time. The doors are spotlessly clean and there's never any build up from evaporating water. No water spots! In all, less than a minute every couple of days to keep the glass shower doors spotless!

These are saving me a TON of money in soaps and various other cleaning products!

description:
Product Description
Product Description

Amazon Basics Multipurpose Copy Printer Paper, 8.5 x 11 Inch 20Lb Paper - 8 Ream Case (4,000 Sheets), 92 GE Bright White

From the Manufacturer

Amazon Basics

reviews.content:
First things first, I love the fact that Amazon Essentials now has this! I was so sick and tired on buying paper from the office supplies retailers where the paper is overpriced and then you have to waste time trying to find coupons and deals to bring the cost down! No more of those hassles anymore for me, can order without having to worry about overpaying from Amazon.... (of course even Amazon has deals sometimes, but I wont ever get this at 50% off here I guess)

Now for the paper quality, I personally find this comparable to the big name brands out there! The thickness is perfect, the brightness is just right and I did not have any jamming issues or ink bleeds at all!

Usually once I order 10 reams, its lasts a few years for me!

Happy with the switch to Amazon paper, highly recommended for a quality product at a decent price!

This is a great product and I highly recommend over any other well known brand name. I buy this exact case of paper reams again, and again for my small business. I have used the high end tech name brands and I can tell you that unless you are needing some special quality paper for something (resumes, certificates, awards,etc), this is the exact same copy paper you will get from anywhere or any brand. Paper is paper...that pretty well sums it up. It's not like this is some cheap/thin, easy to jam/tear, ruined by ink/machine use, cheaply made/low functionality paper like I suppose apparently some people may think judging by the questions I've answered about it. This printer/copy paper is solid white, blank paper, of the same size and thickness of every other regular multi-purpose printer/copier paper on the face of the planet. However, there is ONE difference and it's a HUGE one, I mean game changer difference....it's about HALF the price per case than those well known tech name brand cases, same product, only cheaper. That is why I chose to purchase THIS particular case of paper, it's a very smart business decision to save money without risking and quality reduction. Highly recommend and will NEVER pay those insane prices for PAPER again after finding and trying this. Ordering any other paper by the case is just a complete and total waste of funds that could be used in other areas.

I work in a small office that has a fairly tight budget when it comes to office supplies. The reviews for the Amazon brand paper were very good, so I ordered a few reams to try it. I have a Xerox C8030 copier and this paper works fine and I have had no jams with it. Great for everyday copying. Now, if you are picky about paper brightness for color copying for some important report or color bulletin, then I recommend going with another brand that specifically states super bright white and maybe 24 lb. stock instead of regular 20 lb. like this is. I like that this paper is sold in a package of 3 reams. We do not make a huge number of copies daily, so it's nice to have something I can lift easily when the delivery person leaves it at the office door, so this 3-ream pack is very convenient.

Package of 3 arrived on time, inside a box with another box of 3 packs. The inner box was cushioned with bubble wrap and the 3 packs had no damage whatsoever. Previous reviews cited paper damage during shipping but mine arrived in perfect condition. The 92 brightness was very slightly grayer than the 96 paper I already had but not enough to be concerned about. A great quality paper which the package states is made in the USA!

I've used dozens of different manufacturer's paper over the years. When I saw this Amazon paper, I decided to try it. Well, I'm glad I did. So far (knock on wood), my printers have all been very happy with it and I haven't had a single jam. For me, that's unusual. The print quality is very good to excellent and every sheet seems to be uniform in quality.

I was hesitant to purchase this paper because it was so inexpensive. My first thought was it's probably dull looking, or super thin. Was I ever wrong!

This is 1/3 the price of the paper of similar quality that I purchased at the office products store, and the quality is excellent! No paper jams either.

I'll definitely keep buying this paper as long as Amazon sells it at an affordable price!

This is the best paper ever. It is white. It is 8-1/2"x11" just the right size. It comes in a handy Amazon box. It is 3 packages just like it says. I like it so much I have bought the same it a few times. lol

I've used this paper for my small business for years and will always choose this one! It is very high quality and the price is excellent. I can't tell the difference between this brand and other more expensive brands. It has become our staple for paper in our office. It is not thin, and takes ink beautifully! Very well worth the money and I would highly recommend it.

Definitely; not accurate package weight it's 5 lbs 1.1 oz based on package description. It must have 250 sheets for total count not 500 sheets. counted & weighted 30 sheets equivalent wgt. is 4.9 oz. based on mathematics 5 lbs 1.1oz is equivalent to 497 sheets of paper. I didn't count entire package manually. Only issue is weight printed on packaging.

I‚Äôm not sure what you would be looking in the reviews for‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs paper. A lot of it.

Prince Adam for reference

name: Motor Trend - 923-BK Black FlexTough Contour Liners-Deep Dish Heavy Duty Rubber Floor Mats for Car SUV Truck & Van-All Weather Protection, Universal Trim to Fit
description:
Product Description

Flexible and Tough - Flex Tough Tortoise Series mats feature a deep inverted shell are designed to provide maximum protection. The uniquely constructed linear and diagonal ridges are placed strategically to maximize the dirt trapping capabilities of the mat. Made from the highest quality polymers, these Motor Trend mats are trimmable for extra customization.

reviews.content: I am really, REALLY impressed with these mats. Heavy duty rubber that still stays flat against the floor of my car. I had to trim the driver‚Äôs side mat but the passenger mat fit perfectly! I had cut the back mat into three separate pieces and trim them down to the smallest size possible, but they all fit into my floorboards nicely. They‚Äôre also very easy to cut. Just make sure you have a sharp, heavy duty pair of scissors. I used a sharpie to mark x‚Äô son the pieces I needed to trim. The sharpie worked for me but it was sort of hard to see, so I would recommend using a paint pen if you have one. I see a lot of reviews mention a ‚Äústrong, bad smell‚Äù from the rubber, but I did not have that problem. I was worried that at this price point I wouldn‚Äôt get a quality product, but I was pleasantly surprised. If you‚Äôre hesitant to order, don‚Äôt be!

Had a mat set I bought from a big box store which was ok while living in the city for a used 4-door Oldsmobile Alero I bought 3 years ago. Moving out to my parents in the rural area (more dirt, mud, no highway at times) there were times it was difficult to keep the carpet clean! My car is my sole form of transport so I try and take care of it to the best of my ability. I saw these mats and what attracted me to them was the large size of the front mats - based on the photos I saw - and also the continuous rear floor mats. Here is the skinny on the fit. Front mats are perfect! The coverage is great for the Olds Alero! The rear mats will need to be cut. I cut mine down the middle. There is enough leftover to create an overlap. I used velcro on the overlap to keep the rear mats together. The top part of each rear mat will also need to be cut as well for front seat track clearance. The mats look great now and have better coverage than my old ones! My car has a gray interior but the black mats complement it. Highly recommended!

4.5 Stars overall. Great price point and value. The rubber is hard and durability should not be a problem, but be prepared to work a bit or use a very sharp blade to trim to fit to your vehicle. These have a nice raised edge that should contain water and snow / debris as well. My sole complaint is that they seem to take on a bit of a chemical like odor when heated -- in winter, they are exposed to vehicle heating and mine smelled rough after the first install. It has gone away, and I am not sure if others noticed. All that said, for $30 and some elbow grease to cut them to fit, extremely hard to beat for me.

I was drawn in by the color options and the low price, and I'll be the first to admit that my issues with this product could ‚Äî and indeed, probably are ‚Äî due to user error, but I found it difficult to cut these to fit properly in my car, especially in the driver's seat and backseat. The driver's seat one keeps sliding around, possibly because that's the seat that is used most often, and the backseat one was very difficult to situate in my car (I drive a used 2020 Subaru Crosstrek), although I rarely have backseat passengers, so this isn't a huge issue. They work well enough, and they'll do for now, but I do kind of wish I'd just sprung for something custom-fitted to my specific car. I gave them four stars because they are waterproof, and they get the job done, but I personally found the installation process too frustrating to be worth it. I thought about returning them, but since I'd already started to cut them up to try to make them work, I obviously couldn't. But who knows, maybe you'll have better luck.

By using my Accord Coupe original mats as a guide/out line and the Motor Trend deep grooves, I was successful in trimming these deep dish to fit. Honestly... It took patience, a sharp pair of sizzors, and a little arts and crafts vista. NOTE: These fitments obviously does NOT cover the flooring similarly to Lazer measured liners, nor in most cases identically to the originals, but... they're close while "laying" in the sweet spot. This upgrade üëå works well for me.

My complaint is the box has ‚Äúheavy duty‚Äù in big bold lettering written on it but they are very thin. Also where the rear floor Matt was folded up they have pink spots where the material was stretched. Overall decent product and does its job. They fit my 1995 Silverado without any trimming. I am happy just wish they were a tougher material.

Did not allow for fit on both sides. Have to cut the middle to make it more narrow and fit. It's wide and so it wasn't allowing the two mats to lay flat and fit in. Still not as I want. But looks better than without and since cut it.

I had to cut mine quite a bit to fit my 2014 Ford Focus front seats. Once cut, they sit perfectly.

It probably took me 30-45 minutes of trial and error cutting bit by bit to get them to sit right.
They‚Äôre not AS GOOD of quality as I was expecting, but they still get the job done. All 3 floor mats fit in the car perfectly.

Bought these for a Honda CRV. Love the durability of them. Front fits almost perfectly with some trimming. Mats for the back were a little big. Was able to easily cutdown outside mats. Middle piece in the back could have been a little smaller for my vehicle but I was able to make it work. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.

description:

Product Description

Upgrade your kitchen with the Broan Ductless Range Hood Insert and Incandescent Light! This versatile insert is the perfect solution to your ventilation needs serving as both an exhaust fan and overhead light for your stove. The white unit is designed to fit neatly underneath your cabinets to provide quality airflow in your kitchen. It installs as a non-ducted range hood with a charcoal filter that effectively removes smoke and odors from your cook space. The protective lamp lens distributes light evenly over the cooktop and accepts up to 75W bulb (not included). It's designed with smooth surfaces that clean easily and quick-release filters that can go in the dishwasher. Install the insert at least 18" above cook top. The sides are mitered and the bottom edge hemmed, with no sharp edges for safety and good looks. The unit has a two-speed fan switch and separate light switch and the motor is permanently lubricated. Two-Speed Duct-Free Range Hood. Broan's most economical duct-free hood with the exclusive Microtek system for filtration of airborne cooling contaminants. Installs as non-ducted only with charcoal filter. Accepts up to 75 watt light (bulb sold separately).

reviews.content: Over all, this was very easy to install. It does not ship with a power cord, so if you are plugging it into an outlet , be sure to purchase when ordering. It came in a standard bow, but there was no damage. It fit perfectly into my space, was easy to wire in the power cord, instructions were simple and clear, and 4 simple screws to hang it.you may want a second set of hands to help hold it when mounting, but i had everything done in less than 5 minutes from opening the box. I am giving for stars for now, will update when i have used it for a bit. it is very light weight, and its kinnd of noisy with the fan running but for the price, no worries

This range hood is beautiful and fairly cheap. The ventless option was great for my kitchen that doesn‚Äôt have the ability to vent to outside. The filters do a great job at filtering the odors and the light is perfect for that extra brightness needed while cooking.

Replaced a Broan stove hood with this. Firstly - the packaging used is thin and the item was damaged when we received it. The outer packaging was not impinged - the inner box was - So either the hood was damaged during shipping to the stock location - or Amazons method to pick and package damaged the box. The box was crushed on one side, and since there is little cushioning, bent the side. We kept it since the bent side I contoured by hand and that side is not that visible. Another thing is the metal - it is much thinner gauge than the older Broan hood we replaced -which is probably why it bends easily - as with other notes in reviews.
The hood was quickly replaced - so easy to install
Much better than having nothing at all, but I wish it sucked less by sucking more. I should have stepped up to a higher CFM unit.
Great fit, looks great! A great way to spruce up your kitchen!
Nice quality. Easy to install. Plenty of fan suction but Quiet.
It make my kitchen pop!!
Installed with no issues and looks great above my new stove!
I bought this to replace my current RV s vent. It arrived damaged. When I inspected it was not very well made. And design was ver bad too. I returned it.

Happy with it once we got it installed. getting it installed was a bit of a pain due to our house wiring not aligning to either of the porta available, so we had to drill a new hole... took twice as long to get it installed. But now that it's in it looks and works great.

reviews.content:
If you are removing panels or parts from a vehicle that has those dang pesky retainer clips that we all break; you must get this package! This will save you a tremendous amount of time and energy in removal and installation. I recommend watching youtube videos on how to remove them and from there you are on your way. It is very easy using this tool and even if you break one you have an assortment of spares to replace it.

The biggest thing I like are the variety of retainers to fill a multitude of applications. They are also segregated, so you don't have to go through different sizes to get the one you may want. I have no detractors for this item, just an overall great product that I wish I knew about sooner!

I've found a few different ways to use these fasteners for 3D printing projects. The first was a tow hook insert, and the second was a cover for the coolant bottle in my Camaro. They are very inexpensive and easy to use and, because the dimensions are printed on an insert in the box, it's really easy to design parts around them.

For the price, these are a must have OCCASIONAL USE tool for a DIYer to have around. They will not hold up to regular use in a shop but if you do your own repairs / maintenance and need them half a dozen times a year then they will serve you well. I have tool truck versions at work and these at home and there is no comparison in any way but these get the job done at a small fraction of the price. I wouldn't trust them for my daily use at all but for what I paid I am very satisfied for their intended use and the frequency that they will be used.

Nice assortment but some aren't as sturdy as they should be. Your holes need to be almost the exact size as the clip or you risk bending g or breaking them. Other than that great product for the price.
Doing a rebuild on my moms car after she was in an accident; Praise the Lord, no life threatening injuries. These were the final piece(s) needed to get the car back on the road!
There were tons of different types included. I used them on a 2004 Jeep Grand Cherokee Laredo. Plastic case they come in kinda sucks, won‚Äôt stay latched but no worries, I got ductape
somehow the pieces got mixed together. had to remove everything and match each piece.
What has been great if it came with the tool as stated so useless without it, though
Only about 1/8 of the clips actually fit my car (Honda accord), but considering the price I think it was still worth it.

Had to replace the headliner in my 2007 porsche cayman. This kit really did the trick. I broke a few of the clips taking out the structure for the headlinner. I'm kinda a bull in the china shop... but fortunately I had everything i needed to put it all back together. And at a great price.

name: SABRE Pepper Spray, Quick Release Keychain for Easy Carry and Fast Access, Finger Grip for More Accurate and Faster Aim, Maximum Police Strength OC Spray, 25 Bursts, Secure and Easy to Use Safety
description:
Product Description

Intuitive, Easy to Use Design for Maximum Protection. Stay safe with our SABRE RED Pepper Spray, the strongest available single ingredient pepper spray. Boasting the same police-strength protection as law enforcement, SABRE RED is the most popular formulation carried by police worldwide and contains UV Marking Dye to help police in suspect identification. The most popular SABRE style, this Pepper Spray Keychain with Quick Release is a small but powerful 0.54 oz container that deploys a ballistic stream to reduce wind blow back. The intuitive grip design allows for better aim and proper hand alignment with touch alone, allowing for faster deployment and helping you to keep your eyes on the threat. This police strength pepper spray provides maximum security in a powerful stream to reduce wind blowback and protect from a distance with a 10-foot (3-meter) range. Feel secure with 25 bursts (5x more than other brands) for protection against multiple threats. The Quick Release with detachable key chain allows immediate access to your pepper spray and easy attachment to keychain for maximum portability. Available in a selection of colors. Keep your daughter, wife, son and college students safe with SABRE - THE BRAND THOUSANDS OF POLICE DEPARTMENTS TRUST. Safety You Can Trust. SABRE Pepper Spray is made in USA. SABRE is the #1 brand trusted by consumers worldwide for pepper spray and is a leader in developing safety programs and safety videos to maximize end users‚Äô safety. Empower yourself with extreme stopping power when you need it most.

reviews.content:
I ordered this stuff for my wife, as we have a new neighbor in the area we live in who is really being over friendly toward her. Unfortunately he will not approach her when I am around, so I made the investment. To help her gain some confidence in her device, I let her test it on me...
Do not do as I did.

To give you some background, I am a career military soldier, with 4 deployments to Iraq. After my last tour I took a job as a bodyguard. I am also a patron of concerts and clubs. Suffice it to say I've been exposed to some of the best crowd control in the business.
You have about 5 to 10 seconds of coherance (barely) after contact, and after that, your only concern is pain. Even with my prior experiance, I was completely incapacitated. If I were an earnest attacker, this would deter my attack immediately. My wife is not a trained combatant, and she hit me with a glancing spray across my cheek and that was enough to stop me. (Ideally one would draw a line from ear to ear for max. effect)
There is no quick cure for the pain, as is the case with most OC sprays. Even with the coolit spray which is intended to reduce the effects, you are still out of action for at least 30 minutes.

Some tips when using this product.
-TEST YOUR PRODUCT WHEN YOU OPEN IT!!! There is a 1 in 5000 chance that your device may be defective. Go outside and spray a few lines downwind just to be sure it will not fail you in that critical moment.
-AFTER YOU SPRAY someone, LEAVE THE AREA IMMEDIATELY. If you stay, your assailant may go into a rage which not even OC spray can stop. If you decide to take the fight to the attacker, then you risk losing your right to self defense and crossing over to getting an assault charge. Just go. When you are safely gone, call the police and inform them of the situation. THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT
-AFTERCARE IS CRITICAL. After you spray someone, you must call an ambulance. If your attacker or anyone who may have been caught up in the spray as well is asthmatic or has allergies you could wind up killing them. That is grounds for a manslaughter charge at least.
-IF YOU SPRAY YOURSELF, that really sucks. There is no quick fix. Find a safe location and wait it out. Use soap and water to rinse yourself repeatedly and allow air to get to the affected area. Expect to be out of action for an hour. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHOULD YOU ALLOW THIS STUFF TO COME IN CONTACT WITH YOUR HANDS. Your hands are the primary means for spreading contamination, and if you spray your pocket, and then scratch your head, you will know. Also, go ahead and trash those clothes you were wearing, this stuff can contaminate an entire load of laundry.

Hopefully you will never have to use this stuff on anybody. It is truely hell. The best defense is paying attention to what you are doing, the way you are presenting yourself, and avoiding uneasy situations.
This review is in no way intended to be subsituted for legal advice.

I'm just writing this review because I was assaulted last night by my roommate and was fortunate enough to have the Sabre spray on hand. I was feeling very threatened and so kept my hand on the trigger as he threatened and shouted, and when he attacked me all it took was two quick sprays and he was completely incapacitated. He couldn't inflict any damage on me even though he is a bodybuilder and MUCH bigger than me. The only problem is that when I sprayed it he was tackling me and so some of the spray hit me. I was probably hit with only 10% of the spray but I can tell you it was TERRIBLE. It was so powerful that the cops couldn't stay in the house for long because of the residual in the air. So maybe next time I'll practice shooting it more. In sum, the Sabre spray saved me from definite injury and I cannot be more satisfied with this product. I will feel much safer now holding it.

I‚Äôm a paranoid dog mom and I wanted something to protect us while out on our nightly walks. Hell, I live in Orlando ‚Äî you need protection 24/7 with all the crime. I bought this pepper spray but was always scared about what if I was attacked and it didn‚Äôt work when I needed it to.

The other night I sprayed it while out walking my pups just to see the range. Somehow a tiny drop got in my eye ‚Äî holy crap! I was immediately blinded and choking like crazy. It spread to my other eye when I was trying to get it out of my one eye. So basically I‚Äôm stumbling around in my neighborhood looking crazy unable to see anything. For the half a second I could open one eye, all I saw were my two dogs looking at me with a judgey look like ‚Äúmom, you dumb.‚Äù So yes, this stuff works.
I get very paranoid and having this on my keychain makes me feel so much better and safer. I also absolutely love the color and the fact that it can detach, and the safety lock is perfect.

During one of my morning jogs, I had an unpleasant experience with a stray dog coming after me. He didn't actually bite me, but he came close. It was enough of a warning shot to cause me to do something. So this device is the answer. Have not had to use it yet, and hope I never do. But it fits easily into my pocket, is easy to pull out and flip the safety lock open, so I think I'm ready if I ever meet an angry dog again.
Love the feel of this- it fits easily in my hand. Got it to take on dog walks and hopefully we'll never need it, but it offers piece of mind for me and my fur baby.

This product came packaged well. Looks just as the picture in the description. Sprayed it once to make sure it wasn't clogged and it sprayed perfectly. Can be used as a defense mechanism. Will recommend to anyone.
I haven't had to use this item happy about that hopefully it works if I have to use it I feel more safe having something for protection if needed .

I purchased the two pack of Sabre pepper sprays. One for me and one for a relative. Although I have not had to use them thankfully and hopefully never do, I can point out some things to keep in mind. The lock feature is good and easy to unlock, revealing or hiding the nozzle. The only reason I give it four stars for the lock feature itself is because if a child has this in their hand, they can also easily unlock it and spray it accidentally on their eyes. I know obviously we know when we buy it to keep it away from kids but, it's something to keep in mind. It's light weight, easy to conceal it. I have it in my pocket where I can quickly take it out. Has a quick release keychain clip. I prefer no clip and hav it seperate from my keys. Wether your a man or woman, this is far better/safer than a knife for protection. A firearm is best but only if you have practice but also, if you know you will not be afraid to use it in that dangerous situation when your adrenaline is very high. overall I recommend it.
Small, easy to hide in bag or pockets. Luckily i haven‚Äôt had to use it. Comes with keychain to attach to bag if desired. Purple/lavender color as pictured.

reviews.content: I had to print multiple copies of a report that was 580 pages and had to fit in 3-ring binders. I thus had to use a lighter weight paper than the regular paper I use such that they'd all fit. None of the papers jammed in the printer and none tore.

One reason I ordered this paper is because of the price. Luckily it arrived not all smashed up and with torn wrappers like some poor souls have received.

It is a light paper. Another reason I ordered it through Amazon is because it would be delivered and I would not have to cart it from a store.

The copy paper that I purchased some time back, maybe from Walmart, their cheapest brand, is just a bit heavier than the HP paper.

Luckily I don't use it in a printer, but cut the paper into thirds and use it for notes, and also for writing, not typing on children's stories. Oh! I am hinting at my age.

I had previously ordered some computer paper and it had come in a box twice the necessary size, and the paper packages had bounced around enough... no packing material... that the wrapping had ripped, damaging some of the paper.
This came in it's own little sturdy box, perfect for the 3 packages ordered. I can now store the extras on a shelf in the basement and easily find them.

I got this HP Printer Paper | 8.5 x 11 Paper | Office 20 lb | 3 Ream Case - 1500 Sheets | 92 Bright |. for my new printer, I just got a HP LaserJet Pro 4001dwe printer, and I wanted to keep with the HP product line. It also helped that this was the best price I saw for 3 reams at 92 bright. I just finished printing out manuals for my new printer, and kitchen appliances, because no one seems to provide them anymore, you have to print them from pdf online. well, that was about 300 sheets used, and I can tell you the HP paper was no problem, and the print quality was great. So, I will purchase this package again.
Bought in bulk. Glad I won‚Äôt be running out any time soon. Paper is good quality.
What can say one about paper. it's flat and white.
It's paper. There is that.
Three ream package is more than I needed, but single reams were not sold by Amazon.
Item arrived in fantastic shape and on time
Not much to say

description:
Product Description

Command White Large Utility Hooks let you decorate and organize how you want, when you want, without damaging your walls and surfaces. A great home improvement item, these no damage wall hooks stick on a variety of smooth surfaces without leaving holes, marks or sticky residue. Use these hanging hooks to hang clipboards, brushes, dog leashes, kitchen utensils, home decor and accessories. Simply mount these wall adhesive hooks on painted walls, finished wood, painted concrete cinder blocks, laminate, glass, metal and tiles and enjoy the damage free hanging of your favorite decorations and organizers. Perfect for home renovators and college students, use these wall hooks for hanging decorations and organizers in your home, office, apartment or dorm room to elevate the appearance of your living or working space without tools. Directions are included; follow the directions closely to use the wall hangers as intended. A clever decorating and organizing solution that doesn‚Äôt damage surfaces, these large tool free wall hangers will help you fearlessly change your space. One package contains seven white utility hooks and 12 large adhesive strips. Each single utility adhesive wall hook can hold up to 5 pounds. Decorate, organize and celebrate damage free with Command.

reviews.content:
We wanted a better way of storing wreaths in our garage, so we got a set to hang them on the wall out of the way. With the exception of one hook that slid down the wall after a few days, the others held up great. I replaced the hook that failed (sticky side against the wall didn't stick) and it's holding up fine. I probably needed to allow it more time to setup and push harder to make sure it had good contact.

I used another hook to display a charcuterie board in the kitchen when it's not in use and it looks great

We bought these hooks to hang kids‚Äô back packs. We followed the recommended directions by cleaning the wall (just regular painted drywall) first. Put the hooks up and waited twenty four hours before hanging anything on them. They have been in place for two months with kids school back packs and jackets hanging from them everyday with no issues. They do look a little bulky compared to the usual small command hooks, but for me it was a much better option than finding a stud and screwing a hook into the wall permanently.

It arrived late, but I was just glad it did by the time I finally got around to installing them to hang some blackout curtains. It's good to know a product that works as well as its look makes it seem.
Got them for grandkids‚Äô backpacks and dog‚Äôs harnesses. They are holding and went up easily. Haven‚Äôt had a need to remove them yet.

We have used Command hooks and Command strips to hang our Christmas stockings for more than 15 years; ever since they were first invented, in fact. Santa puts a LOT of HEAVY stuff in our stockings and the heavy duty hooks with these refill strips keep our stockings attached to the fireplace throughout the holiday season. Even when we have a fire burning every night, these little babies hang on tight. When the season is over, and it‚Äôs time for the stockings to come down, we simply pull on that magic little tab at the bottom, and they come right off the wall without leaving a mark. Can‚Äôt say enough good things about Command hooks and refill strips! Don‚Äôt be fooled by the imitations. We were out of refill strips this year and Amazon couldn‚Äôt get us these strips right away, so I ordered some of the imitation ones to use temporarily until the real thing came in. What a mistake. Hooks and stockings were flying off the wall from the heat left and right. But then we couldn‚Äôt get the super sticky oversized strips off the wall. That off-brand SUCKED! There is no substitute for the real thing! Insist on Command BRAND refills every time!
The quality is durable & I definitely recommend to buy one. It sticks, but sometimes it has its moments depending on how heavy the material is.
Good stick and it‚Äôs able to hold the heaviest of items. I have a pretty heavy coat and it held up just fine.
These were perfect for hanging my loungefly backpacks on the closet wall!
Work as expected and easy to use. I have ran into no issues with these.
Works exactly as advertised. I never hesitate to use them.

reviews.content: I am pure to the thought that HP ink should be used in HP printers. I've never liked generic brands. That being said, printer cartridges are generally overpriced. At least for the money, more ink could be within the plastic shell. Amazon offers a sometimes better deal than brick and mortar stores. It is important to price compare.

I understand the symbols on the front of the package now, but I think if they wrote that out more clearly quantity-wise that would‚Äôve been helpful.

Good product that has worked great. The printer accepted without any errors which is great. Print quality is acceptable and seem to last a good while. Happy with the overall quality as it performs as designed.
Product was delivered same day. This is an OEM product from HP so a quality product with no issues. Will buy this product again.

Thought my printer was toast, per my prior experience, and just dropping in new ink solved the problem...
Just with inkjet ink wouldn't dry up as soon as it does, per OEM specs...
I decided to always buy good ink by manufacture who made printer. It is less likely to mess up my printer. after 2 printers got damaged by inferior ink. so HP ink it is it has always been great.
I bought this all in one printer HP printer back in 21 and it was wonderful and I would recommend this product again.
The originals that came with my printer didn‚Äôt last to long or to many prints so far those are working very well let see how many prints I will get .

name: NERF Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 Dart Blaster, 12 Elite Darts, 6-Dart Rotating Drum, Blasters, Kids Outdoor Toys for 8 Year Old Boys & Girls and Up
description:
Product Description

Fire 6 darts in row with the Nerf Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 blaster that features a rotating, 6-dart drum. Take aim and unleash 1 dart at a time in indoor and outdoor games, or blast into slam fire action to send all 6 darts flying through the air in rapid succession. This Nerf kids blaster includes 12 Nerf Elite foam darts, so you can fill the drum and keep additional darts in reach for reloads. Take on the competition with pump action blasting. Load the drum, pump the priming slide backward and forward, and pull the trigger to launch a dart. To slam fire, hold down the trigger and keep pumping the slide back and forth. The foam dart blaster has 2 tactical rails and attachments points for a stock and a barrel to customize with Nerf accessories (each sold separately, subject to availability). Designed for distance, the blaster fires darts up to 90 feet (27 meters). Kids toys like Nerf Elite 2.0 toy foam blasters are great gifts for 8 year old boys and girls who enjoy active indoor and outdoor play. Eyewear recommended (not included). Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.

reviews.content:
My ProChrono Digital chronograph measured the speed of the darts fired by this stock Nerf Commander blaster at an average of 73 feet per second (FPS) using Nerf Elite 2.0 darts (it is capable of shooting any blue, green, white, orange, yellow, Accustrike, or any decorated darts). The typical average velocity of a Nerf Elite blaster is 65-70 FPS, so this blaster is an overachiever in this regard.

The Commander has Slam-fire. For those who don‚Äôt know what that is, it is the ability to fire off darts in rapid succession by holding down the firing trigger and repeatedly priming the blaster to fire a dart off every time it is primed, resulting in some semblance of rapid fire. The tradeoff of using this function is often the reduced accuracy due to the shaking of the blaster while it is being furiously primed. Being a top-priming slide blaster does not help this pistol‚Äôs aim either, but at least it has a rear shoulder stock attachment point. I have found that the Nerf Elite Stockade‚Äôs shoulder stock is ideal in fit and function since it holds spare darts that you will need to reload the Commander‚Äôs meager 6-dart capacity. This is one dart more than the Nerf Elite Spectre, the original Spec-Ops rear-stock and front-barrel attachment springer blaster; I see the Commander as a reiteration of that ghost. The Commander has Slam-fire where the Spectre didn‚Äôt. The reloading on the Commander is much easier than what was once a button-push-and-pop-out-cylinder on the Spectre. You simply reload a few darts, rotate the cylinder, then reload the rest. But that is easier said than done if you are in a Nerf War (competitive ‚ÄúNerfers‚Äù would never be caught armed with this as their primary blaster in such a useless situation). Another improvement is the 3 tactical rails located: 1 above the front barrel, 1 under the cylinder, and 1 oddly placed under the pistol grip as a part of the hand guard. The hand guard makes the grip a bit cramped for people with larger hands. Ergonomics are slightly affected by that fact, but for most I believe it will suffice. I do not like the micro faux-sling-mount aesthetic at the bottom- rear portion of the pistol grip because it serves no purpose but to be annoying to your hand. Perhaps even worse than the ‚Äútooth‚Äù aesthetic just below it (which also serves no functional purpose, by the way. I know, I have tried to use it to prime other top-priming blasters; It slips). The shell plastic parts are somewhat appealing. The large orange ‚ÄúELITE 2.0‚Äù label shows well. The painted name and NERF logo on one side and not the other is consistent with the cost-cutting habits that Hasbro has implemented on most Nerf products. As far as cheapness goes, I am hearing a lot of rattling and squeaking of the plastic going on during operation of the Commander. In conclusion, it is a wonder if this product will last the test of time. The Spectre that the Commander embodies did not last very long before breaking, but perhaps this blaster will take after the Elite Strongarm (and last through the ages). I can see this being something to use to casually play around with in a close quarters (CQB) indoor or in-office use. In that light, perhaps there are smaller options that offer the same performance. This blaster is rather on the large side for what it is: The multiple Nerf Accessory attachment points contribute to the blaster‚Äôs problem with being over-sized and difficult to holster. And a primary blaster typically has an onboard dart capacity that exceeds a mere handful of darts. The creakiness of the plastic shell and internal parts do not give one the sense of confidence in the dependability and longevity of this blaster. At face value, the Commander is definitely a winner compared to just about all the other blasters in the failed Elite 2.0 family line, touting a decent FPS performance and not failing at everything else it was set out to do unlike almost all of it‚Äôs brethren. We will just have to see if that fact matters any in due time.

I'm not sure who had more fun with this, my grandson or the cat! I swear the cat was trying to get hit by dodging back and forth across and under the furniture while we were all laughing. Granted, it was a little hard once the foam bullets got torn up from the cat's teefers, but all in all, I would definitely (and will) go out and get some more!

We use it when our grandkids (9, 7, 5, 4, & 3) come over. We set up a target and let them take turns trying to hit the target. the aim is easy to figure out and the darts don't damage our furniture. Sor far, the blaster seems sturdy and the kids have been (mostly) patient while waiting for their turns. Price seems reasonable, although other options included additional parts but prices were much higher.
Nice toy, my son loves it
Buen regalo para ni√±os de 6 a 12 a√±os
works fine
The girls all had a good time with there nerf guns. Easy to use and firing was accurate.
Very good quality and fun to use. üòâ

These will work nicely for my nephews x 3.
I tried them out and they are easy to use even the younger nephew should have no trouble.
You can load multiple nerfs and they will love them.
This was a great gift for my son. It has a powerful shot!

name: Ninja AF101 Air Fryer that Crisps, Roasts, Reheats, & Dehydrates, for Quick, Easy Meals, 4 Quart Capacity, & High Gloss Finish, Black/Grey
description:
Product Description

NINJA AF101 4QT Air Fryer.

reviews.content: Been having this fryer for 2 weeks now and it has NOT rested yet. I LOVE IT & wonder how I've gone this long w/out one. Before I start bragging on this thing, I am by no way endorsed by Ninja or getting paid by them. I've owned a few Ninja products blenders and still have one that's over 10 years old. They make quality machines. This fryer is a life & time saver...especially if you're a lazy cook. I have been researching air fryers for the past few months and nothing comes close to the Ninja. The basket size isn't the large 5+ quart capacity like the bigger fryers, (Ninja is only 4qt), but this thing cooks so fast you won't miss the extra 1 qt. It comes w/ a crisper that works perfectly, a recipe book and a multi-layer rack. The first night I had it I made wings and I tell you that I will NEVER buy fried chicken again!!! Yes, they were that crispy and tasted much better. I bought the Louisiana fried chicken flour from Walmart, battered the wings, spritzed w/ a little olive oil and had fried chicken in 10 minutes. No greasy mess, no 3rd degree burns from hot oil, and your house doesn't smell like a chicken joint for 4 days afterward. Because the Ninja uses a ceramic coating on their fryers the clean up is very easy. Next, I made sweet potato fries! Had a bag of frozen ones in the freezer and popped those babies in for 10 min. They were crispier than McDonald's. I tried homemade fries but the procedure takes too long. You have to peel, slice, soak potatoes, dry them...I'm just ready to pop them in the fryer and eat! It has been nonstop air fryer cooking in this house! I hit youtube to get a few recipes and it's been on ever since. What I like best about this fryer is it has a dehydrator feature and how fast it cooks. Frozen chicken wings? No problem! Throw them in the fryer for 10 minutes and they're defrosted. I've cooked pizza, fries, wings, reheated food, fried zucchini, and tonight I baked a chocolate cake. Everything came out perfect! Next up is donuts! The only thing I don't like about this fryer is 30 seconds after it finishes cooking it shuts off. I know this is a safety feature but I always have more items to cook. In 2 weeks, I have used my microwave twice, and that was to reheat coffee. Before I forget, I did cinnamon rolls too! I used the canned Pillsbury ones and it normally takes 20 min in the oven. In the Ninja? 8 minutes and that's if you like them brown. I actually could have stopped it at 5 min and they would be perfect. My house smelled like a Cinnabon factory!üòõ I have used every feature on this fryer except the dehydrator but I'll be making beef jerky soon. Overall, I am VERY pleased! The best selling feature was the price & the size. The Ninja is much slimmer than some of the bulkier fryers and fits under my cabinet nicely. I'm also happy it only used 1500W unlike some of the larger fryers that burn 1800 which could kill your light bill. The outside of the fryer doesn't get hot so you won't have to worry about getting burned but do take caution when taking your food out. Is it loud? My exhaust fan on my stove is louder than the Ninja. The extension cord on it is long so you don't have to worry about being limited on where you can place it. I think I've covered everything? This thing is THE BOMB! If you're wondering what cookware you can use, just about anything you place in a microwave you can put in the Ninja. I went to the Dollar Tree and bought a few 7" foil pans I use to reheat food & bake in. Also, grab you some silicone tongs while you're there so you don't scratch the surface of your fryer. This thing has been almost as good as a kid getting a new bike for Christmas. You will NOT be disappointed w/ this purchase. Happy & healthy cooking!

A pesar de que solo tengo una semana de uso, soy muy creativa, dado que tengo una familia que valora mucho el comer rico.

Lo que mejor me ha quedado es el pollo frito, que no es frito como tal porque la verdad es que no usamos aceite o unas pocas gotas para que la carne no se reseque, cosa que no veo necesaria porque el pollo tiene sus propios jugos y grasa.

En realidad, todo es delicioso hasta el momento y pienso que mi equipo es muy f√°cil de usar hasta para un ni√±o y con un resultado espl√©ndido.
M√°s adelante probar√© con unos filetes empanizados luego de haberlos marinado en una mezcla de leche, huevo batido, una cucharada de harina y una pizca de sal y pimienta.

Lo bueno de mi NINJA es que te dice la cantidad de tiempo, temperatura y tipo de alimentos que puedes hacer en ella sin que te quede reseco, sino tierno y jugoso.

Luego colocar√© alguna foto de los resultados porque no se me ocurri√≥ antes.

Creo que vali√≥ la pena.

I like the Ninja air fryer. Here are my thoughts:

Pros: Easy to clean and the food tastes really good. I like it better then my previous air fryer of a different brand. I do use olive oil when I cook but maybe Ill use it on the food after the food is done cooking. I like the fact that it shuts off automatically. It gets taking used to for the controls but Ive only used the air fryer so far, not the other buttons.

Cons: It seems very loud while its working. In fact, I had my fire extinguisher in my hand, but nothing happened. I stood in from of it for the whole time-20 mins to make sure nothing was going wrong. I wish it was quieter. When it shuts off, it makes one beep, which is not loud and I am hard of hearing. I wish it had more beeps when the food was done.

I would recommend this product, but may be too loud for some people. If things change, I will update the review.

this is my first air fryer & I love it ! I do not have a working oven so it cooks what I can't do in microwave. Normally devices like this intimidate me but I watched some videos on youtube about how to use air fryers in general & after that-started cooking and it is super easy & does exactly what it should. Also awesome for reheating pizza , garlic bread etc.
for the negatives...I wish it had better temperature choices ; for example there is no 400 degrees. The highest is 390.
and some other temperatures in recipes I come across are not available on here so I have to choose either a higher or lower recommended temp.
And the manual is kind of not worth much.
I still don't know how the ROAST button is supposed to work.
I live alone so it works fine but if you have more people to feed you might want to get one with a larger basket.
I recommend anyone new to air frying to watch videos on youtube etc, of what NOT to do with them for example, you can expect lightweight items to fly off when the air circulation begins .
For example a grilled cheese sandwich (which is cooked to PERFECTION) needs either something on top to hold the bread down or a toothpick to hold top piece to the bottom
for pizza I found if I put the pepperoni on top it flies off but if I put the cheese on top of pepperoni it melts thereby keeping it from flying off.

The first air fryer I purchased was too big for my limited space kitchen. It overwhelmed the counter and there was no cabinet that it would fit in when not in use. This one is a perfect size and weight I can easily lift it to store in a cabinet and when in use I have ample room to prep food nearby. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend for a large family but it is perfect for one or two.

Had an issue with the box not being delivered or getting dropped off at the house. Idk but Amazon was super helpful and refunded so I was able to get one from a local store.

This is not the first ninja airfryer I had. I also have the little oven style but had to leave it behind after a move. This one is SO much better.
It works great, super easy to clean.
We have used it about 3-4 times a week since December of 2022 and it works great with issues.

If you're looking to gain muscle and haven't been able to dial in your nutrition or eat enough, this air fryer will be a great help. I'm a hardgainer, meaning that my body composition is naturally very thin, and it has been a major challenge in the decades of my adult life to put on lean muscle.

But with this air fryer, I can quickly make three to five meals a day with much less effort than futzing around with the oven or frying everything in too much fat, or being exposed to too much microwave radiation. Great for roasted vegetables, chicken breast and wings, a filet or two of fish, sweet potato fries‚Äîthe list goes on...

Wow, this thing is great. So, we finally broke down and got an air fryer. I read the reviews and for the money this Ninja one looked like the best deal. Let me tell you something this thing is great. So, it cooks faster than an oven but probably slower than deep frying. It produces crisp, good tasting food that is almost as good as fried.
As a fatty I got to say I love my fried food. The air fryer tastes much better than baked and better for you than fried. I mean I can tell a difference now, don‚Äôt get me wrong. It is not going to taste like French fries deep fried in lard, but its close.
I decide I am going to make hot wings. Good idea, right? Well the first batch came out great. Even better than fried because they were a bit crispier. So, I decide I want to have a glass of wine while I cooked. This was my first mistake. God, I wished I had just went with whiskey. So, I insert the corkscrew into the cork and pop, it broke. Oh well, I thought let‚Äôs see what the internet has to offer on alternative methods of wine bottle opening.
The first option is to screw a screw into the cork then pry it out using the screw as a lever. Well, I can‚Äôt do that because the corkscrew is broken off into the cork. The second option said to use a lighter to heat but the air in the neck of the bottle and the cork will rise out. The third option was to place the bottle in a shoe to not break the glass. Then smack the shoe against a wall. I went with option two. Note this was my second mistake.
So, I break out the old lighter and start heating the glass up. Mind you I am also flipping my chicken wings in the air fryer while starting to heat up some hot sauce and other ingredients on the stove for my buffalo sauce. I decided I needed help so enlisted my 18-year child to hold the lighter up to the glass while I cooked. No good, this trick isn‚Äôt working.
I tell him he can stop we are going to go with option three, the shoe. Here comes the third mistake. I grabbed the bottle. Yep you read that right I bare handed the bottle that I had ben applying a direct flame to for over 5 minutes. To top it off I grabbed the neck. This resulted in the most pain I have ever felt in my entire life. This is the pain Atreyu felt when Artax sunk in the swamp of sadness. This was the pain worse than 10 kicks to the balls. This was real pain. Kidney stones have nothing on my hand at this moment. I was done. My hand felt like it had melted to the bottle.
Remember my son that I had help me? Well he is still there, and I must look like a man so I can‚Äôt cry, but boy did I want to cry. I haven‚Äôt wanted to cry this bad sense I watched ‚ÄúOle yeller‚Äù. Despite the pain and fighting back tears. I managed to place the bottle in my shoe and set it on the table. I am still wanted to try that trick.
I then went into first aid mode, hand in the sink water running, ahhhh sweet relief. Unfortunately, that was not to last. The cool water only did so much. I decided burn creme would work. Nope don‚Äôt have any. Back to the water. Perhaps some ice. Ahhh flip the wings, run the water, check the sauce wait ‚Ä¶.
The pot isn‚Äôt simmering. Why is the cutting board on the stove look funny? Yep mistake four here I come. I turned on the wrong burner and now my plastic cutting board has turned to liquid on my stove. Hand back in water again. I then retrieve my putty knife to scrape the stove clean. This causes wisps of plastic string to go from the stove to the sink. Hand goes back into the water.
At some point my son decides to wake the wife. Did I mention this was at about 1 am? She come into the kitchen and sees me. With one shoe one, a bottle of wine on the table inserted into my shoe. Note she mentions that is the shoe I walk into bathrooms in and its on her table. She then notices the burnt cutting board and an abundance of melted plastic in the sink. She then simply asks ‚Äúhot wings hu?‚Äù
She is a god wife and wants me to go to the hospital for my possible 3rd degree burns on my hand but me, being a man, I decide I can tuff it out. She ends up getting me more ice and leaving my son in charge to go back to bed once she understands I am not budging on the whole doctor thing.
Anyway, in conclusion the hot wings were the best I have ever made. Although eating them one handed was a bit of a chore. I stayed up all night in pain and now I am out of ice. I never did open that bottle of wine. Also, that air fryer rocks.

Cooking speed and clean up perfect for me and I can get some chicken strips I love and some Brussels all done and ready to eat in 15 minutes. Don‚Äôt forget to toss in olive oil and garlic salt!üéâ. Winner. Took me long time to commit but got rid of other devices and now have one I should have done first!

I debated on getting a Airfyer for a while. When I saw this Ninja one during a Prime sale, I decided to give it a try. I didn't at first though as it sat for some weeks as I wasn't sure what I would make in it. When Black Friday came I ordered an Instant Vortex Airfryer so that I could compare the 2 due to all the reviews I saw.

This Ninja one has a round basket. The Instant Vortex has a square one. Although the many reviews I looked at said go with the square one because it has more surface, that isn't the case with this one. They looked the same and I measured it out. What the Ninja did have was more space as far as depth.

What sold me was the Ninja basket is dishwasher safe. It feels more sturdy than the Instant Vortex. The reviews for the Instant Vortex had many complaining of the handle breaking off when dropped. I can see that.

The one I received did have the rubber smell when it first heated up. But it dissipated after the preheat. It hasn't smelled since.

I started with breaded salmon as the first item. I was pleasantly surprised how it turned out. Baked potatoes rolled in oil with salt took only 30 minutes compared to the oven. That was nice. I've tried different vegetables and they all seem to come out good.

Note that this model doesn't have auto shut off when you open the basket. I don't think that is a big deal. There is a button right next to the handle to pause it.

I think this one is a keeper.

name: Miracle-Gro Indoor Plant Food (Liquid)
description:
Product Description

Miracle-Gro Indoor Plant Food is great for use on all indoor plants, including edibles! Instantly feed all indoor houseplants, including edibles, with Miracle-Gro Indoor Plant Food. Simply apply the formula directly to the soil, or mix it with water. Apply once a week.

reviews.content: My plants love this. I am not really good about repotting my plants to keep up with their needs, so I have been using this in between soil changes. I've noticed that evey time I put some of this in my plants soil, they seem to have what I could call "growth spurts," where suddenly they will grow more leaves, or stems seem to grow more quickly.. they like it and so do I. Would recommend!

Are my plants happier now that they get some of this each week? I dunno; I can't tell.

Are they growing bigger and stronger and faster? I can't really discern that. They were doing well before and are continuing to do just fine.

Do I feel better giving this to them? Well of course I do. Like any parent, the effect here is just the feeling of satisfaction of helping, giving a gift that may be beneficial, whether it actually works or not.

I find that the squirter really does put out some of this stuff, so when you push that plunger down understand that it's pumping a lot out. My first bottle did not really last that long, and I was being careful not to over-feed with this stuff. It goes out fast.

Bottom Line: I don't know if this stuff is helping my plants, but it's clearly not hurting them. So I'll keep up with it...'cause I'm a good plant-dad.

This stuff has been so fantastic for my 100+ houseplants. All of them had huge growth spurt withing a few days to a week! Substantial amount of growth especially in my Hoyas.üòä I see blooms possibly coming in January! Plants have grown addition vines, stems, leaves etc. in just a week! Several of my Hoyas blushed pink in new growth. All types of plants seem happy Hoya, Pepperomia, Philodendrons, Pellonia, Cissus,Pothos,ferns,Rhaphidaphora,Calathea,Ficus,Jungle cactus etc. All are happy and I will continue to use every week to 2 weeks even during winter. People usually don't fertilize during winter while studies have shown a huge amount of root growth goes on during Winter. By not fertilizing during winter you are setting your plants up to fail in Spring when the will push out leaf, stem growth/ flower.

I got this product for my indoor plants. I have a Monstera, Hibiscus and Spider plant.

I take a tall glass first and fill it with water, then add one or two pumps of this liquid fertilizer into the cup to then pour on my plants.

They seem happier than ever and have been growing leaves like crazy!

This plant food is amazing! I have tried various alternative such as food spikes, which do not seem to be as effective since the food is only in one spot. With the miracle gro indoor liquid plant food, you are able to use it when watering, allowing the plant food to fully saturate your plants with any watering method.
This is so easy to use on your plants , no mixing needed
I use this product for my plants when I water them. It became hard to find during the fall and winter months. Price is good.
i bought this stuff for chemical analysis and i can safely say that it is worth buying for your plants or gravimetric analysis!!!!!
I am known for killing all of our plants. But, so far, this is really helping. I pump it in the watering can and it's as easy as that. Highly recommend.

Effective and simple to use with directions relative to pot size; a "must have" for indoor plant use.
Always check when to use as plants have their "dormant" months when fertilizer isn't needed.
