name: Roku Express 4K+ | Streaming Media Player HD/4K/HDR with Smooth Wireless Streaming and Roku Voice Remote with TV Controls, Includes Premium HDMI¬Æ Cable
description:
Product Description

Roku Express 4K+ is the easy way to start streaming in brilliant 4K picture and vivid HDR color. Enjoy a smooth streaming experience with faster wireless performance, even with multiple streaming devices connected to your network. Power up your TV, adjust the volume, and control your streaming with the included Roku Voice Remote. Use your voice to quickly search, turn captions on, and more. Best of all, Roku streaming gives you a massive selection of free and live TV, and a customizable home screen with your favorite channels front and center, like Netflix, HBO Max, Disney Plus, Prime Video and Freevee. Setup is a cinch with everything you need in the box, including a Premium High Speed HDMI¬Æ Cable. Roku Express 4K+ also works with popular voice assistants. Ask Alexa or Hey Google to launch channels, search for entertainment, control your streaming, and more. You can also control your TV using the Apple Home app or Siri on your Apple devices.

reviews.content:
I bought Roku Express when my satellite provider raised prices beyond my tolerance level. I needed to also subscribe to YouTube TV to get access to the channels I wanted, but it was still half the price of satellite. First the cons: The adhesive tape provided for attaching the unit to a TV is useless. This is probably only an issue if your TV is wall-mounted, but mine is. Another wall mount issue, the plug from the unit is too big to fit between the TV and the wall. I had to buy a 1' extension cord with a flat plug, which did solve the problem. Finally, for some reason my TV accessibility settings periodically change on their own. This never happened before I started using the Roku remote. I need to get the LG remote to successfully restore the settings.
Now the pros: The primary advantage for me is cost, even though I added a YouTube subscription. Plus, there are plenty of free services you can add. Roku even has some original programming that I have enjoyed. Also, the picture quality is vastly superior to the satellite picture quality. And the volume is louder. The remote is easy to use.
Overall, I am satisfied with this purchase.

This was very easy to set up, provides a great picture. I don't use voice, don't want to. Haven't tried using it with a headset yet. I'm writing this review to help others who may have the same set up "problem" that I had. My 1st Roku experience was with a Roku TV - so minimal set up. This Roku box required that I follow on-screen instructions, but the TV screen was set to enlarge the screen (previously used with Dish network). The on-screen commands I needed to see were outside the viewing range because of the screen setting. I was able to see just enough of the on-screen instructions that I thought I was clicking the right buttons on the remote. I decided the product was defective because the box didn't appear to respond to the remote control (the Roku box was waiting for me to make the right response). I even changed the batteries in the remote control. I sent it all back to Amazon. When I rec'd the new one, it also "didn't work". This time I tried it out on a TV in the basement. Easy set up, worked perfect, great picture. Eventually I figured out the problem on the other TV was the screen setting.

I was an early Roku adopter. I purchased this one to replace an original to take advantage of some improved specs and features.

One of the new features I like is the ability to listen through a mobile device. This allows you to use a headset. Two shortcomings of note: 1) Enabling audio through the mobile app disables audio through the TV. I wish this was optional. Like many people my age, I like a headset to hear all the dialog, but I don't always want to shut out other people in the room. 2) Audio cuts in and out when using the Roku app on my Samsung/Android phone. It works perfectly through my iPad.

This Roku works only via wifi. I'm old school and prefer wired for high bandwidth devices. But that's probably not necessary anymore, the wifi has worked fine, and I didn't mark the review down for it.

I've used both the Roku 2 and Roku 3 "hockey pucks" for years on my quality, but non-smart, televisons. When my Roku 3 died (pro tip: do NOT leave a Roku on top of a hot amplifier!) a quick Google search uncovered the affordable, small Roku Express 4K+.

It was delivered in two days and took about 10-20 minutes to set up. It first received a poor WiFi signal because I set it down between my audio components, but it got a strong signal when I stuck it onto the TV. Next, I had to wait for the firmware update, reboot and to load all my channels, but it was hassle-free and I was up and watching Netflix and Amazon in under 30 minutes.

Logging on was easy and streaming is smooth. Roku ROCKS! Five stars.

I have finally given up trying to keep up with the rapidly changing technology. I have to say I was more than a bit worried about the set up for this when it arrived. I was pleasantly surprised that it worked the very first time when I completed following the direction folder included in the package. I would certainly recommend it to other older people who are worried about not knowing how to set it up.

We've used basic Rokus for several years as a more cost effective alternative to paying the cable company monthly to rent the little boxes for all the additional TVs around the house. Comcast is up to $7 per month per box and with 6 TVs around the house in addition to the family room main TV with the main cable box, that amounted to an addition $42 per month. So, we bought 6 Rokus on sale @ $30 each that paid for themselves in under 5 months and have saved us ever since. As they have begun to wear out, we upgraded to these which will pay for themselves in about 6 months.

This is my third Roku. I also have a model 3 and a 2020 Ultra, which replaced the model 3. The Rokus are in my opinion about the best streaming devices on the market. However, if you are going to use one for viewing TV from a HDHomeRun Network TV tuner, you need to either get the 2020 Ultra or newer, or buy a different brand streaming device. It turns out most Rokus can not decode the audio from a HDHomeRun tuner per HDHomeRun tech support. They implied that it could work with a newer TV, but as I experienced it did not work with my older TV nor a computer monitor, since neither could decode the audio either. The HDHomerun support team suggested to use a sound bar or surround sound AVR instead.

Update Jan 26th.
I have had more opportunity to use the this Roku device. I have found that the WiFi streaming works well. The router and this Roku are located at opposite rooms and floors in the house. I did not have any issues with dropped connections and the like.

I feel the Rokus have the most comprehensive ecosystems of the the three manufacturers of these devices that I own, that being the Rokus, AppleTV, and the Firestick. This said, the AppleTV has a more polished look and feel, and are much improved over the older AppleTV models.

If you can only afford one of these I recommend going with the top of the line Roku Ultras. That is, unless you are heavily invested in the Apple ecosystem. Then perhaps the AppleTV will serve you better. The top end Roku Ultras have the ability to use a wired connection, and are compatible with the HDHomeRun, whereas the lessor models are not.

I got rid of my enormous cable bill and a couple of Rokus and still watch what I‚Äôve always watched via cable for years. What a relief and saving. Only problem I‚Äôve encountered is the fact that the Rokus don‚Äôt support the version of Disney+ with ads which means I‚Äôll have to upgrade my subscription to Disney+ to the non-ads version, but it‚Äôs still cheaper than what my cable bill was.

I bought this because despite having excellent reception, our HiSense TV would buffer constantly on Hulu/Spotify but was fine on Netflix/Amazon Prime Video. I did a lot of research to see if there was a way to boost the TV WiFi Antenna, and apparently on a lot of expensive TV's that's a thing, but the WalMart Special definietly cant, I LOVE HiSense as they are exceptional for the price, but I did learn the WiFi isn't so hot, in comes the Express. Solved absolutely all of our Smart TV Issues, and even automatically "Took over" Our Smart TV UI. When launching our TV it automatically says "Switching to Roku" despite our Smart TV Already running Roku OS.

I have a Vizio tv that has Netflix, vudu and you tube, but was not that smart of a tv being a bit older. This Roku adapter obviously gave me roku tv + all the streaming. I finally ditched cable. The downfall is that I have to sign up for the Hulu, Disney + , and ESPN package to get Disney +. It‚Äôs a Roku thing unfortunately. So that means $20 a month rather than $9.99. Now the test will be when I order 2 more Roku converters to adapt 2 even older TV‚Äôs. If it works, it will save me $ buying new TV‚Äôs. I hope this helps others as I didn‚Äôt see any rewiews that described what I was looking to accomplish getting this adapter

name: everydrop by Whirlpool Ice and Water Refrigerator Filter 1, EDR1RXD1, Single-Pack , Purple
description:
Product Description

Certified to reduce 99% of lead as well as other potentially harmful contaminants, everydrop filters offer convenient, filtered water for you and your family. For the cleanest water, replace your everydrop filter every 6 months (or 200 gallons). everydrop Ice & Water Refrigerator Filter 1 replaces W10295370A.

reviews.content: Purchased this water filter for our Whirlpool Frig. Prior to WF change, the water stream had decreased significantly. Purchased this recommended filter and it to just a few minutes to remove old filter and install this new filter. After removing 3gals of water, to activate filter, the water pressure was increased. No water leakage at time of change. It‚Äôs been weeks from change and flow of water has not diminished. Water tastes great.

I was on the fence about purchasing this filter after watching some of the video reviews showing slow water dispensed. Luckily that wasn‚Äôt a problem at all! It made a huge difference in the flow of drinking water from my fridge. I‚Äôm beginning to think our filter must been used on our new refrigerator we purchase because it‚Äôs never worked better.

Usually when I see a description that something ‚Äúlasts 6 months‚Äù I think ‚Äúyeah right, not for my family‚Äù because we are 6 people. This filter actually does last 6 months! My indicator light just turned from green to yellow and I‚Äôm a week shy of 6 months from my last date of purchase. That makes this filter extremely cost effective. I was using a water filtration pitcher that required changing roughly every two weeks with a filter that cost about $10!!

In terms of flavor, we have city water that when unfiltered does taste like chlorine. This removed the chlorine flavor. My mom is super picky about any chlorine taste in her water. I don‚Äôt always notice if a filter isn‚Äôt working as well, but she would definitely comment on my water flavor if I didn‚Äôt change the filter quick enough when I was using a filtering pitcher. Even after 5 months of use with this filter, my mom said that my water tasted good!

With a family of four, the filter must be replaced like every three month or less. The problem is that this thing gets clogged and the water pressure gets reduced by 80 percent so it becomes almost unusable because water barely comes out. It‚Äôs almost like they did this on purpose to force you to buy it.

My three main reasons for using fresh filters are A) to try to reduce corrosion in the pipes/tubing in the fridge, B) to make sure the fridge can produce ice and C) to consistently minimize chlorine/chloramine in the water.

Since I do a lot of outdoor and indoor gardening, including hydroponics, I have a few different tools for measuring water quality PPM, parts per million of total dissolved solids. I have a large undersink filter in my kitchen and this filter installed in the refrigerator.

When I test my prefiltered water PPM it swings from 100 to upwards of 150 PPM, and I've seen it go higher on occasion as well. When testing the large undersink and this refrigerator filtered water they are both consistently 100 PPM. The reason I keep buying them is because at times when our water is worse, these filters keep the PPM stable at a decent number.

I can also attest that my refrigerator ice maker will not function when the filter is close to end of life. I was curious is that was happening because it was aware when the filter was expiring, so I chose to not "reset" the filter when I replaced it last and the ice maker started working again.

That all being said, this filter checks all my boxes, keeps everyone happy with ice making and keeps my organic soil chlorine free and happy as well :)

For the 3rd month in a row, this filter has gotten clogged. I have buying these filters for years, but the quality seems to have gone down.

Editing to mention that we bought a new filter from the local hardware store and that also did not work. Turns out the door that holds the filter in place seems to be losing tension. We folder up a paper towel and placed it between the door and the filter. This resolved our problem so the issue was our refrigerator not the filters. Hope this can help someone else!
The filter cost, buy it's very effective. I changed mine every 6 to 8 months. My refrigerator is always fresh and crisp.

This filter is easy to install, works great to remove chlorine odors and lasts longer than advertised. I only need to replace it annually. If that were the only criteria, I would have given it 5 stars. But its cost has risen from less than $20 five years ago to $60 today. It is now more of a necessity than a great value.
Took a while to find this, but it is a perfect match to the one being used. Definitely know where to look next time.
This is the correct filter for my fridge. It dies a great job.

These bold, colorful tumblers are made to keep you hydrated in a fully functional style. Ideal for car commutes or workouts at home, it has a built-in flip straw for easy and effortless sipping. reviews.content: I was looking for a stainless steel cup that was easy to clean with a handle like this one, and the Stanley is perfect! My hand fits inside to clean it easily and I love the top handle. Just what I was looking for!
I am enjoying this cup very much. The color is nice and the design makes it easy to hold and carry.
I own two other Stanleys, and this one my favorite. No leaks because of the straw cap and ability to hold onto the handle makes it so nice. Love it
So far the water bottle is really good at staying cold and doesn‚Äôt leak unless you‚Äôre fully shaking it upside down. The handle is rlly convenient
I use this for the gym. It‚Äôs perfect. Light and has a handle.

I like this cup. Its cute I like the handle, it serves its purpose. However, I think it is a little over hyped. I have a Bubba cup from Walmart that keeps ice longer than this one does. However, I don't exactly need something to keep ice for days so it works for me. I do really like the handle on the top as apposed to the side. Makes carrying it into work with all my other stuff much easier.
Going to be great for my trip
I‚Äôve always want a big cup on the go and also fits in my cup holder of my car, this one made it. And it‚Äôs super cute !
I do like it a lot but wish I would have gotten one with a handle. When working out on a treadmill or elliptical, it's a bit hard to grab and hold at times.

I 1000% reccomend this it keeps ice for so ling and is so nice. perfect size. one thing I didn't know until I got it is it was reused. I wouldve sent it back but it is in perfect condition with no scratches so it is great!

name: Paper Mate Gel Pens InkJoy Pens, Medium Point, Assorted, 14 Count
description:
Product Description

Spread joy (not smears) with Paper Mate Ink Joy Gel Pens. With vivid gel ink that dries 3X faster for reduced smearing, it‚Äôs like a party on the page where smudges aren‚Äôt invited. Brilliant color ensures your writing will be bright and filled with fun. Fully wrapped with a comfort grip, these gel pens have a smooth style that keeps the joy flowing as fast as your thoughts. These smooth writing pens are a perfect addition to your back to school supplies or office supplies, and the fast drying time makes it the ideal pen for journaling and drawing vs Pilot G2 based on average dry times of black, blue, red, and green. Individual dry times may vary by color.

reviews.content: Love these pens. Someone bought me some as a teacher gift a while ago and when I saw these on sale, I had to purchase some more. The colors are fun. They used to have caps on them but now they are retractable. They seem to work just as well. The ink flows smoothly and evenly and does not leave blobs. My writing looks neater when I use these pens. I am left handed and occasionally drag my hand over what I‚Äôve written but these have never smudged. I‚Äôve been using Papermate pens since the 1980‚Äôs and they do not disappoint.

I discovered this pen at work and decided to buy a pack for myself because it's one of those pens where the ink just flows perfectly. Someone in my house used one and wanted some so much that she bought her own pack for her work! So if you're wondering if these are the GOOD pens... yep, this is it!

My journal planner sits on my desk and is my go-to for day to day throughout the year. I have tried several pens over the last couple of years, and none really worked - either the coloring was off, the pens bled through the paper, or the ink came out spotty on the paper.

I despaired of ever finding the perfect solution... and then found these Paper Mate InkJoy Gel Pens! There are 14 different colors (including a brown & a black, which is nice); none of the colors are too similar. They glide perfectly on my planner and other paper, and do not bleed.

Absolutely recommended, and I will be purchasing them again when this current set runs out.

I loved these pens when I bought them. I have so many, in soooo many colors. They only work intermittently. You might have ink, you probably have a lot of ink, but no matter what you do, it‚Äôs not gonna write. Buy a Bic, buy a Pentel, buy a Tul‚Ä¶don‚Äôt buy this.
Very good gel pens
I use these pens for notes for my college courses, using different colors for certain things helps a lot. The flow of the pen in my favorite. It I could change anything it would be the grib
These are my absolute favorite pens! They write so smoothly, are very vibrant, and last a long time! I am a big fan of colored pens and these are hands down the best ones I have tried.
I got these for a Christmas pen exchange and they were by far the favorite. Wonderful color and flow like a high quality gel pen.
These inkjoy gel pens are my favorite pen! I love having a fun rainbow of them for myBible, note-taking, and prayer-journaling.
Not an artsy personbut these pens are great! Use them to write cards and other little projects that go from okay to great.

name: Smiling Case Compatible with Apple Watch Series 6/SE/Series 5/Series 4 40mm with Built in Tempered Glass Screen Protector,Overall Protective Hard PC Case Ultra-Thin Cover- Clear
description:
Product Description

Smiling PC Hard Case with Tempered Glass Screen Protector Compatible with Apple Watch Series 6 SE Series 5 Series 4 40mm - Clear

Compatibility
Compatible with Series 6 40mm /SE 40mm and series 5/ Series 4 40mm
Allows full access to touchscreen, camera, buttons, and ports.

High Quality
This case with screen protector provides full protection for your watch, and still retains the beauty of the watch.
Great protection from scratches and the tempered glass does not diminish sensitivity of the touchscreen.

Special Design
Super easy to install for its snap-on design to avoid taking the watch bands off.

Kindly Tip

This case is not waterproof, it does not support when swimming.
If you forget to take it off, moisture may be trapped between the case and the watch screen. You only need to wipe with a soft cloth or wipes.

reviews.content:
Ease of install gets an A+, protection gets an A+, style gets an A+.

It‚Äôs not bulky but does add some size to the Apple Watch, if you have smaller wrists it may make the watch ‚Äútoo big‚Äù but it‚Äôs not a lot of added bulk. It can be a little tricky to remove in case you need to clean under it (water will get inside of it and when that happens you‚Äôll need to dry it with a cloth or a shirt tail or something). I have broken one taking it off to clean underneath the glass but that was when I first got them and wasn‚Äôt super familiar with taking them off. Now it doesn‚Äôt ever happen unless the glass is already good and cracked.

Putting it on can be a bit tricky but once you‚Äôve done it a couple times it becomes super easy.

Protection feels like it is very high. My watch looks brand new underneath the glass. I keep a couple in the drawer for backup. I work with my hands a lot, digging ditches, installing water lines, plumbing and bang my hands up OFTEN. I‚Äôve cracked the glass protector plenty of times but the watch itself has taken next to 0 damage.

The crown of the watch is exposed and mine is showing very slight wear, but unless you‚Äôre rough on your watches, this shouldn‚Äôt be an issue. I‚Äôm likely on the ‚Äúrougher‚Äù end of the spectrum when it comes to watch use. Anybody on the ‚Äúlighter‚Äù end shouldn‚Äôt have any issue with the crown scuffing.

Works great as advertised. I work in a metal shop and weld, grind etc all day. I wanted to protect my watch from flying bits and molten metal. Does the job. Its not like your typical gorilla glass phone screen protector that adheres its self to the stock glass.
This touches but not air tight. If you submerge it, you‚Äôll get moisture trapped between them which makes the watch spaz out til its dry.
I take off my watch to shower and don‚Äôt experience that issue anymore.
Also, i read some folks complain that the protector shatters if you remove it, but iv taken mine off to clean it atleast a dozen times since november 2022 and its end of January now. Gently lift the non button side slowly and she‚Äôll pop right off. Gently rinse the cover with some soapy water and dry out the inside, then snap it back on.
I love mine. Guys at work got them now to and unfortunately were able to test them for damage.
Works as advertised and keeps your apple watch face from getting shattered.

You‚Äôll lose a tiny bit of touch sensitivity and the edges are a little harder to get at but, all in all‚Ä¶.. an absolute Great product for those of use that are rough on electronics and devices.

I had a Fitbit that served me for 6 years. It was a great product but I had no way to protect the face, which I saw as important considering how active I am. In fact, lack of face protection is what actually killed my Fitbit, so I opted for the Apple SE watch as a replacement. It also was not protected but did off an option which is this product, a face protection clip-on piece. It is inexpensive insurance, very easy to affix to the face of the watch and the touch screen still operates very effectively. The protector does not hinder any intended function of the watch. The only reason I did not give it five stars all the way is that I have not used it long enough to attest to its scratchproofness. Quite inexpensive, very easy to clip on, and highly effective.

This was very easy to snap on. It fits nearly like a glove; you can tap on it with your finger and hear a slight rattle/some give, but it stays securely in place while wearing and working out. I‚Äôve worn it a few of weeks and it has a few small scratches, so it isn‚Äôt scratch-proof, but better this gets scratched than my watch face. My issue with this is how I have to tap the screen more than once to engage a function; rarely does it work like it would without this protector. It‚Äôs a slight hassle and shows that this does not fit like a glove. I like how it protects around the edges of the watch because I‚Äôve dropped mine and the edge was where mine made contact with the travertine, damaging the glass along the edge. This should prevent that from happening again. If this would have been more touch-sensitive, I would‚Äôve given it 5 stars.

I love this watch cover!! I love that it‚Äôs so easy to snap on and off; no need to remove the watch. This makes it handy when my watch comes into contact with water and it goes under the cover (like when washing hands). I can easily take it off, dry the cover and the watch, and snap it back on.

The only thing I would change is the hole on the side button (not the crown). I wish there was a functional button, similar to the volume buttons on phone cases. The fact that there is just a hole there with nothing to press makes it a little difficult to press that button when I need. It‚Äôs not often, but every time I have to, this is what goes through my head.

After following instructions of cleaning and installing the product on the watch, there was a noticeable increase of difficulty in the center of the watch receiving a touch input.

Not impossible as a increase in strength of the touch can force the input, so I am presuming there is a curve on the glass itself or a unnoticeable airbubble that may have formed.

Overall a decent case for the watch and I am trading off a little bit of the touch for a overall protection upgrade.

I have the 45mm blue version apple watch. The 2 pack is great. I have one in reserve. This fits it very well and touch screen is fully functional and you can still enjoy the color of the watch since it is clear.
The first time I ordered this, it was not in the package, but that was an Amazon error, not the product itself.
I have had it about 2 weeks and so far so good. I was working on a remodel and noticed a little condensation forming around the edge of the screen (in between the watch and protector) it went away that evening, but I easily removed the protector and cleaned & dried and put it back on. I don't wear my watch in the shower but I assume water will get between the watch and protector if I did.
Overall, I am happy with this product so far and would buy again when it gets beat up.

I got this case as soon as I got my watch 2 years ago. I wear my watch every single day, even while swimming a few times. I‚Äôve had it for 2 years and it just now broke (screen popped off). I immediately ordered the same one. My watch has no scratches. Every now and then I‚Äôd have to tap a number twice entering my passcode. But never had an issue with it registering me tapping things once it was unlocked.

The looks of the case is so great and I feel this looks a lot better than the look without the case. However, the touch responsiveness is affected a lot.

For example, when I type the passcode to unlock, the Watch Ultra would kinda recognize the number but then it goes away. So, I have to type the same digit several times by varying the pressure until it registers that digit of the passcode. Same thing happens when I try to start a workout. I need to tap several times varying the pressure to make sure it recognizes the touch and starts the workout!

I‚Äôve had similar cases for my Apple Watch 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7. I‚Äôve never seen a touch issue like this before!

If you are someone who types messages from your watch, you need to think before buying this case!

Update:
I changed from 3 to 4 stars. I found a solution to the touch screen issue. If I remove the case and wipe it with microfiber cloth, the touch response is better for a few days. I‚Äôm removing the protector and wiping the back surface and the watch regularly to avoid the touch issue.

I don't have too much to say other than these are the ONES to get. Took about 2 seconds to install, fits great, and just does what it's supposed to.

I liked that the screen protector and the part that protects the body are one single piece - having tried the separate screen protector-style, it's sometimes tough to get the screen protector to not have bubbles. Didn't have that issue at all with this one.

Highly recommended!

name: BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle Perfect for Protein Shakes and Pre Workout, 20-Ounce, Clear/Black
description:
Product Description

The BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle is built off the design of the iconic BlenderBottle Classic, with an upgraded look, and feature updates‚Äîincluding a rounded base and SpoutGuard‚Äîthat make it easy to maintain proper nutrition on-the-go. The patented mixing system‚Äîwith a 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk that moves inside the bottle to smooth out mixes‚Äîmakes it ideal for protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks, and meal replacements. A wide mouth makes it easy to add ingredients, and the rounded base ensures thorough mixing and easy cleanup. Bottle contents and liquids are securely contained by a tightly threaded screw-on lid that creates a leakproof seal, and an ergonomic flip cap that snaps securely shut for shaking and transportation (fits in most cupholders). A SpoutGuard makes it possible to open the flip top without touching the drinking spout, to keep the mouthpiece clean. Embossed markings show both ounces and milliliters for easy measuring. The BlenderBottle Classic V2 Shaker Bottle can also be used as a water bottle. Available in three sizes: 20-Ounce (measurements go to 14 ounces), 28-Ounce (measurements go to 22 ounces), and 45-Ounce (measurements go to 34 ounces). BPA- and phthalate-free. Top-rack dishwasher safe. Manufacturer‚Äôs limited lifetime warranty.

reviews.content:
I've been eating super healthy for the past 2 years but THIS year decided to really buckle down, lose weight, gain muscle, get energy, feel good, be happy. I'm doing a lot of clean eating, cardio, strength training and rucking.

I love protein shakes because they are a nice way to get in some protein, taste good and are EASY to make. My problem is is that I wake up super early and my blender, albeit awesome, is LOUD AS HECK. Instead of waking the dead, I decided to get a shaker cup.

1- Size: This might be too small for some people. Originally I was doing 2 cups of almond milk, spinach, carrots, raspberries, orgain, MCT oil, matcha and chlorophyll. While super duper healthy, I wanted to stop drinking my calories and do one cup of almond milk. I cut everything and ended up with chlorophyll, orgain and ONE cup of almond milk. That makes this size of a shaker perfect for me. Even if I decided to do 2cups of milk, this would still be a good size.

2- PRICE: To be 100% transparent, there is TWO (maybe more) listings for this specific shaker/brand. I orignally purchased the one that is $1.20 cheaper in a color I didn't really LOVE and just LIKED. I realized about 30 seconds later (I'm working on my ADHD lol) that THIS listing had MORE colors and colors I LOVED, was $1.20 MORE and came with the metal thingy, so I cancelled the other one and got this one. Price is good. $1.20 more for a metal thingy is nice and I love the color I bought.

3- Color: The FIRST one I got was like Teal. Cool. It's blue, I love blue. BUT, I love this blue better baby :o)

This is navy blue, true to color, kinda dark, I love it a lot.

4- Leak Proof: I mean I work from home, workout at home, eat at home. I am not a gym rat. Maybe eventually I will venture outwards among the peoples but for now I am in my house. I DON'T know if this is 100% leakproof. Here is what I do know:

- The "drink part" has that plastic part that comes down and CLICKS so you can HEAR it locking properly. I use the term "locking" loosely. But it is a nice tight close. I still kept my finger on it because I have trust issues from other cups lol. But, I shook it a lot and it stayed closed.

- It's a fatty and a shorty. Fat and short cups = stability.

Overall it was under $10, I love the color and size, it can go in the dishwasher (top rack, dude) and it's a thick plastic.

Tip: For my new shaker peoples: Don't shake and drink. If you're using protein powder, go do something else for a few minutes. When i use the blender with orgain it has more RPM than my arm so it blends everything PERFECT. I can make it, blend it, drink it. With this shaker I let it sit for 2-5 min and those little pieces should dissolve and make it not so "grainy" for lack of a better term.

It shows when a product has had thought put into its design. There are a lot of little things about this bottle that you start to notice:

- The wire ball is a great idea and does a fantastic job of mixing. It's light years ahead of putting a spoon in a glass and stirring.
- The bottom of the cup is spherical to match the mixing ball so that it doesn't leave any unmixed portion.
- The spout hinge closes very tightly to prevent leaks, but there is a large ledge for your thumbs to grasp from underneath to pop it open it easily.
- The spout hinge has enough friction to stay open without flapping around, so it doesn't hit you in the cheek when you drink from the spout.
- The sides have indents that act as reliefs to add grip so that when you screw down the lid, you have something to hold onto, ensuring that it closes tightly with no leaks.
- The edges of the pour spot are nicely rounded off so they feel comfortable on the lips, and the diameter is just right for drinking -- if you want to chug your drink quickly, there's enough room for air to get past to prevent restrictions, but you can also sip comfortably.
- The mouth of the bottle with the lid removed is quite wide, and very convenient for dumping drink mix or other ingredients without missing and making a mess.
- There's a convenient folding loop for carrying the bottle with one finger if your hands are full.
- It's just the right size, not tiny and not gigantic.

The only minor annoyance that I experienced was that I tended to get the wire mixing ball stuck on things when setting it out to dry (such as the wire sides of a dish drying rack.) That's easy enough to work around.

TLDR: If you are doing any kind of powder drink mix and you don't have one of these, you're missing out.

I have this item and a larger one of the same brand. They work really well for blending the contents inside so that the liquid is smooth. I use them for almond milk with protein powder added. A few sturdy shakes and the liquid is blended well and ready to drink without lumps of the protein powder. Also add some dried peanut butter powder sometimes to make it taste more like a dessert.

Cup lid seals tight and the only leak I've had was the few times I was an idiot and neglected to click the lid tightly into its sealed position. Otherwise, properly sealed and turned snugly, the lid keeps all the liquid inside.

The only complaint I'd make is that the metering on the side of the cup is practically impossible to read. I'm thinking that I'll use a permanent marker to highlight some of the common size meter markings so that I don't have to struggle to see them daily.

I bought the blender bottle when it first came our years and years ago. I wasn't a fan. It of course was better than shaking protein powders in a water bottle or stirring with a spoon, but the flat bottom prevented a lot of the powder from blending completely. This V2 blender bottle has a curved bottom which allows the whisk ball to get all the powder that settles to the bottom. No joke I only have to shake for maybe 10-15 seconds to get a perfectly blended shake. It is awesome. The only reason I took a star away is because I really wish that they would find a way to make a glass/stainless steel option. I dislike plastic because eventually it will take on the smell and taste of either the dishwasher pods or protein shake if you don't immediately rinse it out. A small complaint and I feel that this V2 version is definitely worth it!

I am very pleased with this product BUT there is one thing that I displeased with ... at first I thought there were no measurements ... I looked and looked but found nothing and then by accident ... I was getting ready to get a measuring cup and then I felt something rough on one side ... I looked at it really hard and I could barely see the oz ... that makes it horrible to use ... I am thinking of getting something to rub over the numbers so I can read them ... not sure what I can use that would cover just the numbers

Great shaker bottle! Easy to add your power to water or whatever, shakes and mixes VERY WELL!
Small note is that as I start to shake it, need to tighten the lid to prevent leakage. After use, easy to rinse out. Works great at home, and easy to take on travel.

I ordered another brand of blender bottle originally and was so disappointed that no matter how MUCH I shook and shook it, my protein powder would not blend and I would end up drinking clumps of protein powder. I had a feeling it was the style of the "blender" that was inside, so I decided to order this one. I have NO issues with this whatsoever! It blends extremely well and eliminates nearly all clumps (I get a few small ones here and there) and it takes me 1/3rd of the time to shake it and achieve that smoothness. My other shaker was a workout in itself lol. I have also noticed NO leaks, it's very easy to hold (I have small hands), and this comes in a bunch of colors! The only downside, which isn't really anything to do with the cup, is that it came with a giveaway QR code inside that apparently is already over so I wasn't able to participate in that.

Never thought about why I was getting clumps in previous cups I bought. Having a rounded inside bottom, makes sure the powder is completely mixed.

Also then having the outside bottom not narrowed following the inside curves, keeps it stable.

I've made it my personal mission to try as many shaker bottles as possible just as a fun experiment and this is the best one I have tried yet. What sets this one apart from most is that it does not utilize a rubber o-ring. That might sound like a negative but trust when I say I have used close to a dozen different shaker bottles and all the ones with o-rings leak if they aren't screwed on a specific way. This one seems to just create a great seal just from pressure which constant use for the last week has proven reliable. I don't use the shaker ball so can not speak to that.

The rubberized hook/handle has a nice feel and is a nice size. I've had others with huge caribener style rings that are handy but often get in the way.

the hinge is also very sturdy compared to most shaker bottles.

if you're looking for a shaker bottle. I'd recommend this one with full confidence.

Love the teal color. Shaker works surprisingly well to disperse protein powder. When full of liquid, a few drops often leak out the rim so I make sure to keep it upright. Otherwise love this little bottle.

Trust Hefty Ultra Strong Tall Kitchen Trash Bags to keep your kitchen waste contained and out of sight. The black color hides unsightly messes, which means these innovative kitchen garbage bags will keep your garbage in the dark. Thanks to Triple Action Technology, these tough Hefty kitchen trash bags resist punctures, leaks, and tears, providing the highest protection available in flexible garbage bags. That stretchy strength means you don't have to worry about unexpected bag breakage and inconvenient messes. Don‚Äôt be afraid to use these kitchen trash bags for tougher jobs, such as garage, basement and construction cleanup. A break-resistant grip drawstring makes it easy to close the bag and cart it away without incident. As a bonus, these scented trash bags include a patented Arm and Hammer odor neutralizer and Clean Burst scent to keep unpleasant smells at bay. All Hefty trash bags are backed by a 100..

reviews.content: I would highly recommend these trash bags. The cost, durability and the ease of ordering these every 6mos. is a win win situation. I've always used this brand of hefty ultra strong trash bags but you can't bit this deal here. I really enjoy the smell that's attached to bags. Don't hesitate, buy!!
Good price and quality
These bags do their job!
Nice bags for a good price!
I switched brands when my usual bags started ripping. I have now gone through a box of the Hefty bags and not a single ripped bag. I'm definitely glad I made the switch to Hefty.
Scented, too. Doubtless to spare the sensibilities of the sanitation workers. And, yes, does stretch rather than tear. Not a 5-star experience but a 4. Most satisfactory and worth the money.
I buy them all the time!
I live around a lot of cats that love tearing into trash bags...Let's put it this way...NOT MYs

These are great kitchen trash bags especially them being black kitchen trash bags I never knew that black kitchen trash bags until I believe last year in the beginning of 2021 and also I think this is the only brand that makes black kitchen trash bags I wish they would come out with more types of black kitchen trash bags like they do have so many different varieties in the white kitchen trash bags I love it that they're black because with the white ones you could see through the bags and see all the yucky rubbish that's been accumulated throughout the day and to me it was nasty seeing left over or spoiled food smudged onto the inside of the bag and depending how full the bag got and it's durability when taking out the trash and seeing that mess always worried that the bag was gonna split open and sometimes that's exactly what happened and then having to end cleaning and mopping up the whole kitchen from the old spoiled leftovers or chicken bones and grease from the pan and please don't bring up the stench that old food left behind then having to clean the whole kitchen trash bag out with the hose and some dish soap then either having to wait for it to dry or finding some old rag to dry it so you could put a new trash bag in and be able to use your kitchen trash can so yeah since I discovered these black bags I've been very satisfied only thing I wish like I said earlier is that wish they had more of a variety to choose the strength and also fragrance of the bag oh my maybe someday I think I'm going to wrote different companies that make trash bags and request for them to make more of a selection on black kitchen trash bags it's a thought I don't know how long these kitchen trash bags have been on the market but it makes me wonder why other brands haven't made their own style of black kitchen trash bags well I will email all the different brands and suggest they make some cause I know there's a lot of other people out there in the world that would and do perfer black bags over white for their kitchen trash can well that's all I've got to say this is my first review I didn't know you could leave reviews about your purchases this one juss popped up when I opened my Amazon account
My favorite bags!

name: SafeRest Mattress Protector ‚Äì Queen - College Dorm Room, New Home, First Apartment Essentials - Cotton, Waterproof Mattress Cover Protector and Encasement
description:
Product Description

SafeRest Premium Mattress Protectors Provide Undetectable Protection for You and Your Family

Protects against perspiration, urine and fluids
SafeRest Premium Mattress Protectors offer protection against fluids, urine, perspiration and making them especially helpful for those with kids, pets or incontinence. As we sleep we shed thousands of dead skin cells, which can quickly accumulate providing an ideal environment. SafeRest mattress protectors trap and skin cells on the surface of the protector where they can be easily washed away during suggested quarterly launderings. This helps provide a cleaner environment for you and your family.

Soft Cotton Terry Surface - Breathable, Cool and Noiseless
To keep our protectors cool and noiseless, the surface material is made with soft cotton terry back coated with a breathable and 100% waterproof membrane layer. Cotton terry naturally absorbs moisture and is completely noiseless.

Fitted Sheet Style
To ensure a great fit, an elastic band is used on the side skirt to automatically pull excess material under the mattress.

Machine Washable
Machine-wash with your sheets using normal household detergents that do not contain bleach. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not iron.

SafeRest Invisa-Shield‚Ñ¢
Our mattress protectors will not change the feel of your mattress. This is great for those with any type of mattress including innerspring, latex or memory foam.

reviews.content: My wife went into labor a year and a half ago and that labor went very quickly....so quickly that she ended up giving birth on our bed in the presence of EMTs. We then went to the hospital where I stayed overnight with my wife and new baby girl. The next day, once things had clamed down, I went home to clean up before they came home. For those who have witnessed or gone through child birth, you know what a mess I arrived to. For those who haven't, suffice to say there are many different types of fluids and a lot of them. Let's just say I was fully expecting to be purchasing a new mattress. To my amazement, once I'd bagged our sheets and this mattress pad, our mattress was perfectly fine. I bought another one immediately and will continue to use this brand as long as it exists. I challenge anyone to put it through a more rigorous test and I'm positive it can stand up to some sweat or your child's pee in the middle of the night. I could have posted a pic but it's better for everyone if I don't.

I had high hopes for this mattress topper. I'm using it to protect a queen-sized 3" memory foam topper for my bed against my beloved nemesis: a 5 kg cat.

When my feline companion suffered from an unwelcome malady, she found comfort on my month-old memory foam mattress topper, 3-week-old down duvet (dry-clean only, of course) and brand spanking new blanket. She decided to prance over and urinate several gallons atop me and my partner. Twice in a week. The so-called "waterproof mattress cover" I owned at the time of the first incident, and the other brand I purchased from a large store with a red circle after the second, did not live up to one small cat's piddle. They soaked through, ruined the comforter and memory foam topper, and left us thoroughly pissed.

This cover fits great over the memory foam topper, though the corners are a bit snug to the topper. They tend to pull it up, and I assume that's because most mattresses have rounded corners or the depth of the mattress pulls the sheet down. I'm working with 3" thickness, which leaves plenty of material snug beneath the topper for a solid fit. The terrycloth-like surface of the waterproof part fully covers the topper. Better yet, it feels soft and gives off very little sound whenever we sit or lie on it. I'm leery of anything that produces a lot of noise at night and this certainly doesn't.

I wouldn't expect this to hold up to a ton of liquid for a long time, but it definitely seems to resist sweat and small amounts so far. And don't worry - kitty's been seen by the vet and hopefully won't repeat her bed-ruining antics again.

My teenager requested a loft bed so, I ordered this bag to put the new foam mattress in and, so far, it has worked out really well. After 2 - 3 weeks, I asked my teen how it was holding up and was told, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs fine‚Äù ‚Äî That is Teenspeak for: ‚ÄúDad, it is amazingly comfortable and problem free to the point where I haven‚Äôt even noticed that it was there. Thank you getting such a thoughtful gift for me!‚Äù

I can see where this would be an excellent item to purchase for your college bound kids (who knows what was done to that dorm mattress before your child gets it?) I remember sometimes being too lazy to put sheets on my dorm mattress and just sleeping wrapped in a blanket - is it too late for a tetanus shot?

Your child may not care what they sleep on but you do. Get one of these for them.

Hopefully, this review was helpful to you.

This waterproof mattress cover looked more expensive.I loved the fact that the terry on top of plastic lining made it look like a regular mattress cover no one could tell by looking at it .Also very comfortable to sleep on. I bought a queen size it also had very deep pockets for thick mattresses.I would highly recommend.

The best mattress protector I have used. My grandkids have spilled juice numerous times, urinated and puked on the bed. None has soaked through onto the mattress. Definitely will order again, if I need another one and recommend it to others.

I purchased a king size protector to replace the old waterproof cover. It fits very nicely over my Temper-pedic mattress(21in) and feels soft and tho doesn‚Äôt change cloud memory form feel.
I couldn‚Äôt wash my old protector because it said it will lose the waterproof effect but this one is washable.

I bought this to protect a new mattress. My daughter had an accident. This protector mostly protected the mattress as it should have. The mattress was very slightly damp but not enough to cause any stains or other issues. I washed the protector as instructed and let it hang over the shower rod to dry. I haven't had any other issues to see how it holds up after washing.

I foster cats and sometimes they decide to pee outside the litter box. This mattress protector has saved my mattress numerous times! Not a single drop makes it through and sometimes the pee has been sitting for a few hours while I'm away at work. My only gripe is not getting another to swap between while I'm washing one!
I bought this for my babies, the cover have gone through many, many tough laundry cycles, still hold well and soft. Love the cotton top, and its capability of sealing water.

Extremely convenient! First I had a full covering zipper mattress cover on a California king mattress. It was always terrible trying to take it off to wash. With this one you can just put it on your mattress like any other sheet, and I‚Äôm here for it!! Plus my triplets do supervised tummy time on my bed, and so far no ‚Äúbaby stains‚Äù seeping through to my mattress. Absolutely is waterproof!!üëçüèΩ

name: LeapFrog Learning Friends 100 Words Book
description:
Product Description

Join animal friends Turtle, Tiger and Monkey as they explore new vocabulary in the Learning Friends 100 Words Book. Explore the colorful pages and touch each picture to hear the animals say toddler-appropriate words along with exciting facts and sound effects. Immerse your child in bilingual play by sliding the language switch to hear the words, songs and instructions in Spanish. Touch the pictures to hear silly sound effects in Fun Sounds mode or press the light-up star button to hear two learning songs. Discover new vocabulary with cute learning friends! Intended for ages 18+ months. Requires 2 AA batteries. Batteries included for demo purposes only. New batteries recommended for regular use.

reviews.content:
Got this as a gift otherwise I would have uploaded a video and some pictures ü§£ but it works wonderfully and looks just like the picture. I was actually surprised at all the features it had I got to play with it a little bit ü§£
it's super responsive to touch and very accurate, I was a leapfrog kid from long ago, and I just had to see how they were doing and they're doing great, their stuff is so educational, really fun to learn and easy for kids to get involved with, just like how i remember. what great tools to help kids visually see things, interact with the noises and learn how to pronounce and spell. Highly recommend! Also the design is very durable. A+ will definitely be purchasing more of these.

UPDATE!!!

Replacement came today (day after gross one arrived). It‚Äôs a brand new unit! They did good and got me the replacement less than 24 hours later. Thank you. My daughter loves it (21 months old), I‚Äôm hoping it will help her with her speech.

Moved rating from one star to four stars. Only four due to inconvenience and Amazon nor LeapFrog never contacting me when I filled a complaint. But it was righted in the end, regardless, so a one star is no longer valid.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:

I can‚Äôt give this to my daughter (and she was so excited when we took it out of the box). I paid for a NEW unit. Not used‚Ä¶and if they were going to send me a used toy, give my child the courtesy of at least cleaning it first. Disgusting.

I requested a replacement. I will updated when the new one arrives. Hopefully they will send a brand new unit and not another dirty used one.

This is one of my grandson's favorite toys. It encourages learning and independent play. It is durable, and I have not even had to replace the original batteries after much use. We have since bought a few more of these books. The pages are easy to wipe off and extremely easy for a toddler to turn.
The product is great. It translates in English and Spanish. Only the pages on the inside seem a little soft so I‚Äôm worried by 1 year old may destroy that before anything else

This is absolutely amazing! It has a great price to it and this is a known brand and I do recommend this. My toddler is about 19 months old, so I feel like she will grow better with us. I do have to do it with her and we talk about the pictures. It‚Äôs like a book but thicker obviously not the front or the back but the pages in between and it‚Äôs really sensitive. If you touch any of the pictures it will tell you what it is. It makes noises it‚Äôs very educational there‚Äôs different settings. I am really impressed with this especially for this price. Definitely a great Amazon find and I feel like my toddler could easily play with us from now until she‚Äôs at least three or even four years old. She really likes it and it‚Äôs fun for her and it‚Äôs something fun for the two of us to do together.

I hope this review is helpful.

We bought one each for our kids to play in the car only and thank goodness we did. It‚Äôs been about a year now and they still love them and are always excited to see them since it‚Äôs not an everyday toy they play with. Bring in the car, road trip, doctors appointments or anywhere your little one is needing to give you a break and for them to play. Also, great 1-3 yr old gift

name: Amazon Basics Lightweight Super Soft Easy Care Microfiber Bed Sheet Set with 14-Inch Deep Pockets - Queen, Black
description:
Product Description
Product Description

An Amazon Brand.

From the Manufacturer

Amazon Basics

reviews.content:
Fits perfect. I recently bought a new bed mattress for myself, and my father, and have noticed that some of the older sheets that normally sit on the mattress were too loose or when you lay on them, the sides un pinch them selves or barely hold on (overly loose).

Keep in mind that my old mattress was a standard classic mattress from at least 22 years ago.

All the new mattresses they sell now are a hybrid or gel and tend to be either 14 inches or 12 inches sometimes even smaller or higher depending on the variety. If you‚Äôre like me, it‚Äôs easier to buy the bed sheet for the exact size of the mattress if you buy these.

For example, a queen bed would get a queen mattress covers, but make sure the bed sheet can wraparound precisely on the mattress size.

Try to avoid, for example a 14 inch, that can accommodate an 18 or 17 inches 'deep pockets'. Through personal error, I have found out there either too loose, shift constantly, or they slide loose and sometimes they‚Äôre not tight so it ends up overly loose in the center.

These bedsheets from Amazon are perfect. Tightly wraparound and hold on almost like stockings. I very rarely have to slightly push it to the side from the middle after using it for a week it‚Äôs retaining structure. Very happy with it and they don‚Äôt break the bank either. Nothing negative to say they are a little bit see-through probably 5 to 10% but nothing major.

UPDATED: 2/17/2023

Everything I said in the review is still stands, has not come undone. The bed that I have the image is a hybrid 14inch. It has mini coils (3 inches) the rest is a foam/gel type liquid contouring type of bed. (soft top/medium firmness). Stayed on perfectly after I decided to wash the covers.

I then remove the same cover from my dad's bed and noticed that it was only very tiny lifted in the portion where he was sleeping, but did not come undone. His is a 12 inch version of this one but it's 100% contouring type of bed that molds towards the body, so obviously it constantly shifts with movement.

It stayed on, never came undone and no longer slides off by one of the sides and ends in random places. Very happy with it! Yes. buy the exact type of size mattress cover and avoid the deep pocket variety or the kind that say they can handle your mattress size, but go 3 to 4 inches more.

Those are better for classic bed spring.

Newer bed factors play a role like pure gel/foam/hybrid etc. Using common sense, the constant shifting and contouring toward the body of anyone on the bed moves around little by little the softer it goes. A lot of deep pocket variety don't have a string you can pull if you have a 12/14 inch newer mattress.

Very happy I don't have to waste time every morning now because it slid off on one side or came almost completely undone in the center, instead, I can just do a tiny touchup on top by hand, (flattening) pinching the sides (or where its needed). But rarely needed. I have also slept on the bed a few days with just the new sheet covers (no flat-sheet/comforter or pillows) and they still don't come undone. Great product.

For two years. Two years I suffered in silence. Yes. I.... I a struggling young adult struggled with only one... Yes that's right ONE set of sheets. Every week it was the same. Strip the bed. Wash the sheets, dry the sheets, remake the bed. Over the 2 years my one poor set of sheets took a beating. They saw countless menstrual cycles, various cold and flue viruses, dogs, and sleep overs. I meticulously washed and bleached those sheets until one day I took them from the wash and noted that they were beyond bleaching or stain removal. There were dying.... They were dying gray.

I searched high and low. Went to target and TJ Maxx... But to no avail. Why... Why were simple square pieces of fabric $50.00!?!?!? I could not afford this. I could not justify the spending of $50.00 on plain white fabric. So I searched. I searched high and I searched low Until I came here...
To The Amazon.

It was here. Here I discovered them. Plain white sheets at a modest and affordable price.
"Don't buy them! You'll regret it! You need Egyptian cotton!" My mother said.

"No! I care not what cotton they be! All I need are sheets! I have no one to impress! No one who shares my bed! I am a lowly virgin promised in matrimony to another with a sworn vow of chastity! I care not for fancy sheets!" I shouted.

So I bought them. I made my bed and I laid in it. And I can tell you that yes... They are I fact sheets that you can sleep in.

First, I love the color (spa blue). I really prefer crisp white percale sheets, but that doesn't work for my husband (he sweats a lot at night, so white sheets become yellow rather quickly). For whatever reason, I can't seem to find nice percale sheets like my grandma used to have. She never wasted money on high thread count, but her sheets were also crisp and fresh and smooth. All the sheets I have tried over the years end up being rough or they pill or they wrinkle. I had one set that I loved the feel of, but the top sheet would NOT ever give me a nice clean edge, even if I ironed it. So when we bought our new king-size bed and had to upgrade all our queen size bedding, I decided to take a chance on these microfiber sheets. They are thinner than I expected, but they seem to be sturdy, I hope. Only time will really tell. They washed up beautifully, and when I pulled them out of the dryer (TBH, it was 3 days later), there wasn't a wrinkle to be seen and no pilling. When we put the fitted sheet on the bed, it fit snugly, exactly as it is supposed to, without a wrinkle and without any loose sections that tend to annoy me when I'm in bed at night. The top sheet fit well, but I wish it were longer. The sides drape just right, but the length didn't give me much to tuck under the end of the bed, which is actually very important to me, as my husband is a rough sleeper and tends to pull sheets and blankets out if they aren't well-tucked. The pillowcases are much larger than I expected. We have good quality thick bamboo pillows that are dwarfed by these cases' length (probably extra 6 inches or more hanging loose at the end of the pillow), but they fit the pillows properly in every other regard, nice and smooth, snug without being tight. The sheets are smooth and soft. Not percale crisp, but a nice softness that might just convince me to give up on the percale dream. They also don't have that weird microfiber feel that so many others have (can't really describe it, but it just doesn't feel natural to me). I only have 2 complaints, and they are fairly minor. The biggest complaint is that the bottom sheet fits well, but it doesn't stay in place. Woke up in the morning with the sheet completely off in one corner. I'm hoping that it is just that we didn't get it on quite right the first time and maybe it will hold up better in the future, or maybe I'm going to have to invest in some straps to hold the corners in place better. The other complaint is more like a suggestion. our last set of sheets had a small tag on the fitted sheet that said "Top or Bottom" so we always knew which way to put it on the bed. Queen sheets were easier to identify ends from sides (obvious rectangle), as the king sheets are closer to square and harder to identify ends. We had to put the sheet on and try it, then pull it off and turn it before we knew the correct placement. I will put some kind of mark on it myself for future placement, but it would sure be nice if the manufacturer would include that tag from the get-go.

TL;DR below.

I was looking for a more reasonably-priced alternative to Sheex and several reviews drew comparisons, so I gave them a shot.

They are nothing at all like Sheex; let me fully disabuse you of that idea. I‚Äôm still on the lookout, I don‚Äôt want to pull the $200 trigger on the real deal just yet.

Despite not being what I wanted, it‚Äôs a comfortable and well-made sheet set. A good option if looking for a more cotton-like set feel that is wrinkle-resistant. They don‚Äôt feel cheaply made, quality stitching, and not ultra-thin.

Worth noting:

- They do have a slight satin-like sheen to them; and

- The ‚Äúdark gray‚Äù set might look like a super-light gray in the photos, but it‚Äôs much darker in reality - and has a somewhat green tinge to them, not unlike the cotton set they offer. Be prepared for the color to be quite different.

TL;DR: Altogether a solid set, however (1) they‚Äôre absolutely nothing at all like Sheex, despite some reviews comparing the two, (2) avoid if a mild shine is a dealbreaker, and (3) dark gray is not light gray as depicted, but actually dark gray/green.

I bought these for my son's room, and I've never seen a child so excited lol. He put them straight in the wash and dryer to get them in his bed!
Ordered: burgundy twin xl
Pros: color is rich and vibrant, while the material is soft and comfy. Looks expensive but for a fraction of the cost!
Cons: they are thin so I assume they won't last a super long time, but for the price I won't complain just worth noting. I did notice the dryer had a red tint on the inside after washing these sheets, so make sure to wash separately the first couple times. Nothing stained my dryer easily cleaned up, again just noting ..

All in all a solid purchase! And I'm actually considering getting another set for my bed!

Even with sheet straps attached to all four corners these will NOT stay on an adjustable bed.
They are silky smooth and feel great.
They look very nice.
They didn't wrinkle at all.
If your looking for a standard bed these are awesome sheets and totally worth it.
If you looking for an adjustable bed DO NOT BUY these. Its funny but you actually will slide down the sheets if you have the bed up to watch TV. Also, there is no stretch or give in these sheets at all so every time you move the sheets move with you, you will be adjusting the sheets every single time you get into bed.

These sheets are soft and comfortable. The color was as expected. They looked just like the photo on Amazon. The fit is perfect for my queen size with a mattress topper. The are replacing a set where the fitted bottom wasn't deep enough when I added the topper. I am ver pleased with these sheets.

I've been a fan of 100% cotton sheet sets for ages. They're so hard to find these days. I ended up ordering these for a gap stop until I found cotton ones I liked. I was amazed how much these feel like cotton. They're amazingly soft for synthetic fiber. I will definitely keep these in the rotation!

I do like this, it‚Äôs very nice and over all better than a lot of sheets I‚Äôve bought. Unfortunately it‚Äôs only been a day and I did notice a tear already by the foot of my bed.
And yes. Even after just one night and having it tear, it still definitely isn‚Äôt the worst I‚Äôve bought.

My family of 4 survived on an income of $35k annually‚Ä¶ in San Diego. I‚Äôm telling you this to explain to you why my son had mismatched thrift shop sheets for 4 years. They did the trick and he never complained. But now that we live in Tennessee, our dollar stretches further and now I can afford $20 sheets instead of the $3 I spent on used ones! It‚Äôs exciting, and if you‚Äôre entertaining the idea of buying sheets under $30, then you know the struggle. These sheets are great quality, you would never know they were inexpensive, and my son was SO excited when I told him I got him new sheets. They fit well and they‚Äôre well made. Thank you amazon for making such affordable sheets!

name: YETI Rambler 20 oz Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Tumbler w/MagSlider Lid
description:
Product Description

RAMBLER 20 OZ TUMBLER WITH MAGSLIDER LID

With the Rambler 20 oz. Tumbler, your beverages will stay ice cold or piping hot longer. We over-engineered these double-wall insulated tumblers with an 18/8 stainless steel body, which means your drink still keeps its temperature no matter how much of a beating this cup takes. They‚Äôre BPA-free (obviously), have a No Sweat Design to make sure your hands stay dry, and are dishwasher-safe. Plus its crystal-clear lid lets you check your drink status in a flash. Refill, anyone?

The YETI 20 oz Rambler Tumbler stands 6 7/8 in high and has a lip diameter of 3 1/2 in. All YETI Tumblers are sized to fit in standard sized cup holders.

18/8 STAINLESS STEEL Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so they‚Äôre puncture- and rust-resistant.

DOUBLE-WALL VACUUM INSULATION Keeps cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot until the last sip.

NO SWEAT DESIGN Keeps fingers dry and unfrostbitten.

MAGSLIDER LID

The MagSlider Lid means enjoying a hot drink from our Rambler Tumblers without worrying about splashes on the go. Unlike other closeable drink lids, ours harness the power of magnets (yep, real magnets) for smooth opening and closing, and has a crystal clear lid so you can always see if you‚Äôre in need of a top off. Our magnet technology also makes for easy cleaning ‚Äî you can pop the MagSlider off, rinse, dry, and return it to the YETI Slider Lid. And the MagSlider Lid is spill- and shatter-resistant, just like the rest of our Rambler accessories. Dishwasher-safe.

reviews.content: The 20 ounce YETI tumbler is my favorite size‚Ä¶..yes, I have several YETI tumblers. The reason this is my favorite size is because it easily fits in my car and couch drink holders, is easy to hold and isn‚Äôt big and bulky. I do not personally feel like I need to carry my entire days worth of beverage around at one time. I can refill as necessary! I also like to change between flavored waters during the day and coffee in the mornings so this is the perfect size tumbler to handle all my needs. As for the purple‚Ä¶. I was a little nervous about getting the purple but I‚Äôm so glad I did! I really like the shade and I‚Äôve received several compliments on the color. The lid fits nicely and isn‚Äôt impossible to get off. The sliding drink closure in the lid is really nice but it is NOT leakproof so be careful not to let the tumbler fall over because it will leak! Although this style of lid will leak, it‚Äôs still my lid style of choice! Another plus is that this tumbler design allows for easy cleaning.

My bf started a new job and was actually taking coffee mugs on the road with him in the mornings filled with hot coffee and driving drinking from those. Of course it made me nervous. I was going to get a plane Jane travel mug from the store but was recommended Yeti. It was much pricier that I wanted but I got one anyways. It was a gift for starting a new job. He uses it every day. Even when he's not at work, he walks around the house with it. It keeps his drinks hotter. No issues. No more coffee mugs in the car lol

Yeti 20 oz stainless steel tumbler. I actually purchased this as a gift for my niece who is a very busy exec. She loves it. That it's reusable and washable. Keeps hot stuff hot for a several hours. She also loves the bronzy color. Win/win/win! ¬†Having said all of this, I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful. All of my reviews reflect my honest, personal experience with the reviewed item - your experience may be different. I am not influenced by any outside source. I receive/accept NO free products or discounts that are not available to all shoppers- ever. For some reason our shopper ranks are no longer visible - so, to give you a little more info about me, I am a top 50 reviewer (#30 the highest rank achieved). Those numbers used to fluctuate over time - up and down but I noticed that they stopped updating regularly - perhaps to phase them out. It's a shame because it did help you see who has been around the longest and who is a trustworthy reviewer.¬† I've been doing reviews for over 25 years with Amazon - over 6,000 reviews posted, those reviews have been viewed well over 50,000 times, including over 24,000 likes. Bottom line, I pay for all my stuff, just like you do.

I like this mug for my daily morning coffee. It keeps the liquid hot for the better part of a day. It even keeps the liquid warm when I leave it in the car in the winter for a good amount of time. It also keeps liquids cold for a long time. I left an iced drink in my car during a hot summer day and the ice hadn't even melted at the end of the day. It is also easy to clean, everything comes apart, including the part that closes the mug. My only complaint is that the sliding part that closes the mug is not totally leak proof. I would not recommend throwing this mug into a bag because it will leak all over. The closure is best for if you plan to carry your mug around and not in a bag. Overall I love these mugs and have bought it for many people I know.

I bought this for my wife and the Yeti Rambler stainless steel coffee tumbler is a top-notch product that lives up to its reputation. The tumbler's double-wall vacuum insulation keeps coffee hot for hours, while the exterior remains cool to the touch. The no-sweat paint & design prevents condensation from forming on the tumbler's exterior, ensuring that it won't slip out of your hands.

The tumbler is also easy to clean, and the durable stainless steel construction ensures that it can withstand drops and dings without compromising its performance. I pity the wooden floor this mug makes contact with. This thing is BUILT.

At any moment I can, I grab her cup and use it for myself. Its an excellent choice for anyone looking for a high-quality coffee tumbler that will keep their drink hot for hours and withstand everyday abuse.

I had another Yeti tumbler just like this and left it on my back bumper before work one day. Oops! :) I ordered a replacement (excited it was on sale at the time). It arrived but had no MagSlider with it. I checked all packaging in case it popped off along the way, but it wasn't in there. I know it was a goof and they will replace it so am still giving 5 stars as I LOVE the tumbler.

I bought this Yeti size (20 oz) because there was a deal on the copper color, but I didn‚Äôt expect it to be my go-to tumbler for coffee on the go.

I thought the color was blah when I ordered it since I associate ‚Äúcopper‚Äù with pennies, but it is much nicer in person. The photos don‚Äôt do it justice.

Since the 20 oz is the perfect size for 2 cups of coffee and I prefer my homemade coffee over the coffee my job has, my yeti has become an everyday staple for me. It fits well enough in my car‚Äôs cup holder and can withstand some turbulence. Furthermore, the magnetic slider makes it really easy to sneak in a few sips of coffee while waiting at a stop light while commuting to work. I also love using it at home for coffee or a double batch of tea.

Lastly, I love that it‚Äôs dishwasher safe! While I don‚Äôt always use a dishwasher to clean my Yeti, I appreciate having the option to throw it in there if I don‚Äôt feel like hand washing it.

5/5 stars. If you‚Äôre on the fence, wait for a deal so that you feel even smarter about purchasing something you will use for years!

We recently installed a crushed ice machine in our office so I purchased this Yeti cup to use for that and water. I originally purchased it because it was a good price (it was reduced, I'm assuming because of the color, which I love anyway) and because Yeti has a good reputation for keeping beverages cold. I was not dissappointed. When I return to work each morning, the ice from the previous morning is still solid in the cup. it's the perfect size for my hands too, not too big (as opposed to the larger Yetis).

I never knew I needed one of these until one was gifted to me. After being spoiled with hot chocolate that actually stayed hot, I was hooked. When I accidentally left mine at my daughter's, I splurged and bought a replacement. I really like it, but I'll use it until it dies before I buy another because I think they are overpriced. The best part of this cup is the black sliding piece on the lid that easily removes for cleaning.

I have lots of these stainless vacuum sealed cups from a half dozen different companies. Some were gifts and some I‚Äôve bought. Some are winners and some not so much for various reasons. I hear people say well this one is as good as Yeti or that one is. I have one or two that are comparable to a Yeti but way more that aren‚Äôt. If you‚Äôre just wanting to try something different go for it. If you want to take the guess work out of it. Get a Yeti.

reviews.content: Given as a gift to my young grandson, this rabbit was a hit. I was tickled to see the attachment he has to it already. It is plush, soft, cuddly, clean and kid friendly

I got this lil guy as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and we both love it! He named him Gumpy. He‚Äôs super soft, perfect cuddling size as well as small enough to conveniently ride along on road trips.
Bought for my sons Easter basket. It‚Äôs an adorable bunny, and soft. Excellent choice for all ages.
My kids are obsessed with it. Super soft and adorable.
I love the furry look of this bunny.
Melissa and Doug are lovely stuffed animals. Bunny is cute and squeezable. Exactly what is desired.
So soft and super cute! My son loved it!
Very cute bunny, but not completely baby sage since eyes are made of hard beads.

Very soft & huggable bunny! Little Lily carries it around the house & sleeps with it, feeds it! So, we know it washes VERY WELL too! Thank you for a sweet, well made, washable stuffy! Buy it! It‚Äôs a great gift!!
Super soft, cute pose.
