name: USB 3.0 Hub, VIENON 4-Port USB Hub USB Splitter USB Expander for Laptop, Xbox, Flash Drive, HDD, Console, Printer, Camera,Keyborad, Mouse
description:
Product Description
Ultra Slim 4-Port USB 3.0 Data Hub

Turn one of your computer‚Äôs USB ports into 4 for your device charging and data management.

Widely used in mouse, keyboard, U disk, card reader, hard disk, printer, desktop fan and other devices with USB interface.

5Gbps Data Transfer

The USB 3.0 interface supports 5Gbps super-speed transmission, which can transfer a 1G movie in 3 seconds, and supports fast mutual transfer of files between 2 hard drives, without waiting for file transfer.

	

	

	



Support mainstream systems

This USB Hub Supports Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP, Mac OSx 10.6-10.12 or later, Linux 2.6.14 or Later.

	
High performance chip

Each function is equipped with an independent chip to ensure stable connection and no lag.

	
LED Indicator light

Blue LED to indicate the working status of this USB 3.0 hub.

	
Compact and Lightweight

Ultra slim design avoids clutter and leaving room for all the accessories you‚Äôll insert. Easy to carry around.

	

	



Support 4 USB port work at same time

Supports 4 USB ports to work at the same time, which solves the problem of insufficient USB ports on your computer or notebook, and also avoid repeated plugging and unplugging,protect the computer's native interfaces.

	
No Delay, No Freeze

It supports 5Gbps high-speed data transmission, and the transmission speed is 10 times that of USB2.0. It is responsive when connected to a mouse and keyboard to play games, without delay or lag.

	
Wide Application

Applicable to all kinds of devices with USB interface, such as: mouse, keyboard, U disk, electric fan, hard disk, printer and so on.

					
	4-Port USB Hub	USB C to USB 4-Port Hub	4-Port USB Hub with Individual Switches	7-Port USB Hub	3-Port Wireless Hub
Connector Type	USB-A	USB-A & USB-C	USB-A	USB-A	USB-A
Number of USB Port	4	4	4	7	3
LED Indicator	‚úì	‚úì	‚úì	‚úì	‚úì
Individual Switch	No	No	Yes	No	No

reviews.content:
I am extremely pleased with my purchase of the Vienon 4-port USB hub. This hub has exceeded my expectations in terms of its functionality and convenience. The four ports are perfect for connecting multiple devices to my computer, including my phone, camera, and external hard drive.

One of the things I appreciate most about this hub is its compact and lightweight design. It is easy to carry with me on the go, and it doesn't take up much space on my desk. The ports are clearly labeled, and I have had no trouble connecting or disconnecting my devices. The hub is also compatible with a wide range of devices.

Another great feature of this hub is its high-speed data transfer capability. I have used it to transfer large files, and it has been very fast and efficient. The built-in over-current protection feature is also a welcome addition as it keeps my devices safe.

Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of the Vienon 4-port USB hub. It is a well-designed and high-performing product that I would highly recommend to anyone in need of a reliable USB hub.
When I plugged it in, one of the ports appears to be bad. The rest work and it would be more trouble that it is worth to return so I will just deal with it.

Fits in my space without getting in the way, works great, operates all my usb devices. Every so often I need to reset all my devices simply by unplugging and plugging back in but no big deal. Nice product.
I have used this adapter every single day since buying it, and it works perfectly! I haven‚Äôt had a single issue with it being slow or breaking.
There‚Äôs no lag while I‚Äôm using it and although it gets a little bit hot it works nicely. I use it for my mouse and keyboard because I have my laptop on a fan stand and I ran out of usb slots üóø

...not all of the ports are USB 3.0. If that's a deal-breaker, stay away. If not, it's great. The cord's short, so using it on a desktop PC means there's a chance it comes unplugged, but I just used a command strip to attach it to the side of my case. It doesn't run hot since it's not externally powered, and I have had 0 issues with it not being able to power everything since my PC powers it. Right now it's handling a webcam, mouse, keyboard, mic, and PS5 controller just fine.

Bought this solely based on speed of need and it was delivered in about 2 hours (Thanks Amazon). It works just as you would expect. Construction is cheap plastic so if you want something sturdy look elsewhere. If you need a quick / cheap USB hub then this will fit the bill.

It is alright and good for its price but the thing i hate that it feels like plastic and it feels like its about to open for about 3 or 2 more bucks you can buy a better one but for its price it‚Äôs actually very good i do recommend if you are on a budget or trying to make your setup clean i really do recommend it tho the cable is a little short it‚Äôs alright.

reviews.content: I bought this product for use on vacation on Bonaire, which is surrounded by a marine national park. It was very easy to fit my iPhone in ‚Äî I have a 13 Pro Max, and I didn‚Äôt have to remove it from its case. I‚Äôm still going through the hundreds of videos and photos I took. I‚Äôd say the results seem to be 50% good shots and 50% blurry-because-the-focus-was-on-the-bag shots. It‚Äôs important to set your phone to camera app before going underwater; the touch screen will not recognize your finger beneath the surface. Once underwater, use the upper volume button to take photos or to stop/start recording videos. Much easier than continually surfacing to use the touch screen. You won‚Äôt get the clarity of a GoPro, but for easy underwater photos this works just fine‚Ä¶ just make sure to properly seal the bag according to the instructions. My husband didn‚Äôt. His phone is okay, but he switched to his GoPro after that.

I bought this based off of a review I found on a travel blog and it ended up working out great. I used it while snorkeling and I went to probably 20 feet deep and it worked fine. The only thing I would note is that when you‚Äôre underwater, the pressure doesn‚Äôt allow you to use the touchscreen, so make sure you have other modes to take pictures turned on for your phone, such as using the side buttons or other haptic features.

I wanted a way to have my phone handy during my aqua aerobics classes. This can hang around my neck for check in and easy to find when packing up to leave. I do not take it into the water with me, but I like the convenience of it. I do not use it all of the time, just during the class and it is easy to slide my phone in and out of it.

For the price point it does the job to protect items while you are near or on the water . And yes technically you can still use the smart phone features over the plastic which was convenient to take pictures. The picture quality is not as good as taking one without the cover because you are taking a picture through the plastic cover. But I wouldn‚Äôt bother taking it to take pictures under the water. Also be careful not to touch it with any sunblock lotion because that can ruin the transparency of the cover.

Took this to the national rainforest in Puerto Rico. Where we slid down natural made waterslides, plunging into water, cliff diving into water, swimming in the rivers, snorkeling all with these waterproof pouches and never had an issue.

Was able to take pictures and videos. Obviously due to the electrical current of your finger, it does not work under water, for example while snorkeling; This is easily remedied by turning on video prior to diving under water.

Great purchase, especially for the money. No leaks.

It's a pretty straight forward product. While the cameras were a little fuzzier and the touch sensitivity was obviously hindered (it would have happened no matter what brand we used), the most important thing is that these pouches succeeded at keeping our phones bone dry. We brought them with us to a water park and into the pool - zero leaks. That's all you're really looking for here.

¬†I don't swim, but I love watching life under the ocean. I snorkel at the beach, not out at the reefs. I first tested this case by putting a paper towel in it and weighting it down in the sink at home for about 1/2 hour. No seepage. None in my husband's case either. On our Florida trip, I used it with my Iphone 12 in it and my husband on land with his Iphone 6. Mine took beautiful clear photos underwater, and initially I was having no problems with the touch screen in the case. It worked well when out of the water. In fact, the case and neck cord are particularly helpful when you are taking the glass bottom boat ride at John Pennakamp State Park, Key Largo, FL because you can't drop your phone in the water when using it, and it is protected from spray when you are at the bow of the boat going out to where the viewing area is. I easily added my driver's license and credit card to the case (making sure they were below the camera lens) and my mind was safely at ease that my valuables were protected. One difficulty is that- when you are actually in the water at a beach, and the sun is out, the reflection makes it hard to view the phone screen selections (even without the waterproof case)+ the added water drops on the outside of the case. My phone got warmer, as I was in the water for about 45 minutes each state park we visited, and the case started "fogging" inside, as the water was cool-furthering the difficulty of seeing the phone screen clearly while you are trying to take photos either in or out of the water. When I was taking photos under the water, I couldn't clearly see the phone screen due to the fogging and found later that many of my underwater photos somehow went to video...and the videos were very short; almost "snaps" of the activity I was trying to capture. Because of the wave activity, and standing in the water using the snorkel instead of floating (because I was afraid of drifting out over my head), I was buffeted about + my feet in the bottom silt would cloud the water as I was off balance. So when I saw a school of fish, I just tried, without focusing, to keep rapidly hitting the shutter button to capture as much as I could of the action below me. Obviously, sometimes I wasn't hitting the shutter, but either sliding to video or whatever. Quite a few of my intended to be video videos had the notation "unsupported" when I loaded them to my pc at home. I must have blindly hit something else??? Very disappointing. Some of the intended still photos came out "EA-xxxx". All of this must be operator error, as the touch and slide worked beautifully through the case when dry on the outside and taking photos out of the water environment. I did have a great time using the case, and took videos and stills that I never could have taken without this case, so I would recommend it....just be aware of what could happen in the hands of someone like me. I don't use face recognition. When the camera was warm, it was difficult immediately removing the I-phone from the case without danger of splitting the case seams near the opening, but in a few minutes the problem dissipated as the phone cooled and the fogginess left the case. I am posting a still shot of some type of lobster with a forked tail which ran across my foot and then hid under a rock, Bahia Honda State Park, Big Pine Key, FL and a video of fish at Fort Zach State Park in Key West, FL. I had silted up the water with my feet, so not an issue with the case. The fish at Bahia Honda around the beach tend to be brown, while the ones farther south at Fort Zach beach in Key West were colorful and only a couple of yards out. The birds were taken using the case on dry land at John Pennakamp.

Pros: I purchased these for a cruise trip coming up. I plan on gifting one to my daughter who is also going. It does what's expected.

Cons: The only thing I don't care for is water gets trapped around the latches that seals these cases, when I took the tissues out after testing, there was no way I could take a picture after testing the cases in the water, because you can't see that it was only from removing the tissues from the latches that seal these.

All in all I give these a definite thumbs up.

We got these for our cruise and they were great! If you take your phone out you do have to wipe moisture from the top but we did swim with these on and our phones stayed dry. Very happy with this product

Worked well on all the water rides, including under water. Gave it an4 star due to plastic getting stuck to iPhone after several hours in the pouch. Hard to get iPhone out. Learned to keep it open until ready for the water rides at park. Great for keeping iPhone handy without holding it also.

I didn't expect anything from Aurosports, but a few days after I posted my 2-star review I got an email from them asking if I would like to have a replacement. (They even asked if both binocs I purchased had gone bad, but I told them it was only the one.) They offered to replace them, and I accepted their offer. reviews.content: My windows kept freezing over in the morning & I was spending a ridiculous amount of time out in the cold/dark trying to get the windows to warm up enough to scrape the frost off with paper towels. Eventually said enough of this, I'm just gonna get a window scraper. Ordered this, it arrived in the mail, & my windows have yet to frost over again! Haven't even had to use this! I'm inclined to say it surpassed my expectations.

I am 67 years old and I keep a car foldable cloth bin with a few supplies (microfiber cloth, wipes, spray cleaner, gloves) and this 2-piece snow brush-scraper combo is just right for me because it's easy and user friendly to assemble/disassemble, light to use, and effective. Then, it also fits neatly in the trunk bin. And, it's a pretty red color. I'll buy another one for my husband.

I needed a new snow brush and this Astroal snow brush seemed to be a decent choice. We haven‚Äôt gotten much snow yet, so I‚Äôve only used it twice. It does the job. So far only I‚Äôve used it to clear a couple of inches deep snow as well as some ice on my Jeep Wrangler‚Äôs windshields and side windows. It clears the snow easily with the brush and the scraper end clears the ice fairly easy. It seems to be durable and made well. My Wrangler is lifted so it‚Äôs high off of the ground so I wasn‚Äôt sure if the 27 inches of length would be enough, it is. I can reach over half of the windshield with it before I switch to the other side. I will update my review if it breaks or anything but it seems like it will last plenty long.

I liked the easy assembly, and having the sturdy brush to clean ice shards from cold glass is great. I just wish the scraper itself could be a couple of inches wider so one scrape would cover a greater area. Having just a few inches (about four?) means you have to make more scraping motions - harder for us with shoulder issues - to cover a car window. Otherwise, a very good device.

This is a simple and fast way to scrape off a large amount of snow and ice from your vehicle. IT‚Äôs compact so you can keep it in your trunk without loosing a lot of space. It give just enough reach without having to get wet. Works well.

After researching the best Ice Scrapers and reading lots of reviews, I chose this product. I am extremely satisfied with it. One click, and the two ends snap into place. What I really liked was the ice scraper completely scraped across the windshield so that I didn‚Äôt have to keep going back-and-forth. The contact with the windshield was perfect. The brush worked really well at removing the snow. Next storm I am going to try it with just the scraper as it was a bit harder to control with the brush attached. We just got dumped with 14 inches of snow, and it arrived on time.
I've used it for several years and it works well. Our most recent storm in Utah, it snapped in half while I was brushing off some thick snow on my car. I guess 4 years is a pretty good existence.

As someone from Texas where snow is essentially nonexistent unless it‚Äôs an unpleasant and unprepared surprise, this comes in handy for me. The scraper is so easy to use, you don‚Äôt have to use much force. And the brush is equally as handy. Definitely a good purchase.
I like that I can attach and detach the parts, it‚Äôs saves up space. I also like that it comes with a bag so I can keep them together.

I‚Äôve been using an old car scraper and finally got an upgrade and what an upgrade it is! The handle is detachable so you can have a scraper or a brush or both. Easy comfort hold with the soft grip. Handle also on the brush for easy maneuvering.

description:
Product Description

ÔÅ¨1 roll of elastic string cord

How to use:

STEP 1: Choose how many layers of elastic string to use according to the diameter of the hole on the beads. It is recommended to use double layer.

STEP 2: Folded elastic string. Use the bead wire to grip the loop of the folded elastic string.

STEP 3: Thread the beads until the bracelet fits your wrist (Kindly Prompt: The length of cord= wrist size x 2 + 40cm)

STEP 4: Thread the cord ends through the other loop side to knot the cord.

STEP 5: Tighten the cord, adjust the size between beads to make them close together

STEP 6: Tie a double knot for two strands of cord, and scissor the unnecessary part of cord. Reinforce with glue or nail polish if necessary

STEP 7: Hide the knot in one of beads

reviews.content: These are sturdy and comfortable for normal (limited) use even for someone with arthritis in both thumb and index finger (although I‚Äôm not sure how long they would stay comfortable if you are using them for something that takes a long time). They are nice and sharp but I cannot say yet how long they will stay sharp.
These are the most reliable scissors that I own. I have wasted money on many types of scissors on the past. Save yourself the trouble and get these. They last and work well.

These scissors have an 8-inch blade, which is a good length for a variety of tasks but ideally best for just cutting paper. I wouldn't use these for fabric cutting as they may not be sharp enough depending on the thickness and weave of the fabric.

The scissors have a nice comfort-grip handle. This design is intended to reduce hand fatigue and provide a more secure grip, which can be helpful for people who are using the scissors for extended periods of time. Additionally, the scissors come in a bulk pack of 3, which can be a cost-effective option for those who need multiple pairs of scissors.

Overall, the iBayam Multipurpose Scissors are a decently designed pair of scissors that could be useful for a wide range of tasks. The relatively sharp blades and comfortable grip are two features that are pretty useful as far as scissors go. Mine are located in my kitchen "junk" drawer so I can easily locate them when I need to make some cuts.

These scissors are the best bang for the buck I could find while not sacrificing quality. The cut a variety of materials with great accuracy and are a pleasure to use. reviews.content: bought this for a pair of mom jeans that fit me great, but were grey. I let them soak, stirring occasionally, for about an hour, rinsed, then washed with a white towel. the towel came out of the wash still white, so I‚Äôd say chance of transfer is a very very low! I‚Äôll update if they fade fast or transfer to my skin as I wear them!

I managed to get some sort of discoloration on a favorite shirt of mine, and I thought I would have to use the shirt only as a sleep shirt as the discoloration was so bad. But I decided to give dye a try, and I am so glad I did! After 2 applications you can hardly tell there there was any discoloration in the shirt. Rit saved it!

I was scared to even try this dye...but finally did. The color was good just some were darker than others and this may be because I left the lace dollies in the water too long. The instructions stated that when wet they look darker so for this reason I wanted to make sure I got the color I wanted. When taken out sooner, it yield mor on the green turquoise side. Longer soaking yield turquoise on the blue side. I am able to use both because of my decor in the room with blue and green turquoise. Please get the stabilizer...I think this is a MUST.

reviews.content:
I love these! The glass is quite thick which is nice because that was my main concern. It's about the size of a soda can (see pictures) and about the same width, so not small. The straw was absolutely perfect! It's also thick that it won't break easily and looks well made with no weird rims.

I only use the top when inside my home (rarely) but it's not too bad if you want to use in an office setting or just around the house.

1-2 glasses were kind of chipped at the bottom inside or outside but it was very small and unnoticeable unless you're looking (I was). It was only a bit bothersome cause I'm a bit OCD about things like that but it's not as big of a problem since the glass didn't break or anything or have little shards. Might have been a shipping problem, not sure tho.

In all, I'm satisfied with the overall product (the tops aren't really much of a concern for me but maybe to others)! Would buy some more in the future.

I had been eyeing these glasses for months and finally decided it was time to purchase them and I'm so glad I did. They are the perfect size and are super cute! I love drinking smoothies, greens, or really any drink in them. They're dishwasher safe and super easy to clean. The straws are also glass and wider so they are easy to clean. They really aren't too expensive and would make for a fun gift idea as well. I love them!

These glass cups are so cute! They are sturdy, but you need to be careful not to drop it of course because it will break. I accidentally dropped my cup and it broke. I was so sad because they are so nice. The only issue that I had was with the bamboo lids they don't really tell you how to take care of them. You shouldn't submerge them in water, just use warm soap and water and make sure you let it dry well. Some of my lids had little black dots on them that I wasn't sure about, but the other ones were okay. They came in a really sturdy box so that it doesn't break when being delivered.

I first saw glasses like this in an online video showing iced coffee recipes. Of course I immediately wanted them. Reviews were mixed so I wasn't sure what to expect quality wise. After getting them, I am completely satisfied. The glass seems to be a good thickness, lids fit well, and I love the look of the pretty glass straws. They were also packed well so there were no broken ones on arrival. I am very excited to start using these and if they hold up well I may be back for another set.

I use these everyday and bring my coffee to work in them. They are dishwasher safe which is fantastic, i stick the cup and lid in the top rack, and the straw with the silverware. They keep my drink cold for longer in the glass cup and they just look super cute. Lots of compliments on them!

These glasses are so great I thought about not leaving a fantastic review because I don‚Äôt want them to sell out. I just bought them again so I have a set of 12. They like so cute at a set table and everyone enjoys drinking out of them. Every cup of water is a treat.

I use these every day for hot and cold tea. I also purchased larger glass boba straws and they fit in the hole on the bamboo lid. It was packaged well and the glass isn't super thin.

these came package very good. They are the perfect size for Ice Coffee. The straw is made of glass and it came with a straw cleaning brush. I have used them a few times already. I recommend this highly

I love these cups, whether this is a gift for someone else or yourself everyone will love them. The 4pcs set is just enough and while they are aesthetically pleasing to look at they are also durable and are great to drink at home or out on the road.

reviews.content:
This iceball maker works as you‚Äôd want, not just as you‚Äôd expect.

After putting the molds in, adding hot water, letting it freeze for 24 hours you have very nice almost clear ice balls. I say almost clear as they aren‚Äôt clear like those $2000 machines get them but this is 90-95% of the way there (by my non expert eye)

It can be a pain to get the ice mold out of the unit when it‚Äôs frozen that and who wants to wait 24 hours for an iceball? That‚Äôs why their bag is handy, just make a bunch and store them in the bag to stay as clear as they came out of the mold and use as needed!

Great product if you want near clear ice balls!
So easy to use and the ice is crystal clear and lasts for multiple drinks. Wish I had purchased the 4 ball as we use it daily.

I have read that the trick to making Clear ICE balls needed to be a slow freeze over an extended time in an insulated container - -so I bought a device on Amazon - - Wow -- it delivered.

We followed the instructions to a T - - warm water, filled to the line in the insulated container - and inserted the mold. Please see the pictures for the clear ice balls delivered. Plus the lower portion of the container does deliver an ice block (can be difficult to take out - be careful not to break the inner box by knocking it - -use the directions. You can see in the third picture the clear ice blocks as well.

The Ice ball is large - and it lasted about 3 hours for various pouring of my favorite liquids.

Downside: on produces 2 ice balls in a 24-30 hours period - - but use the provided BPA free bag to collect for a party!

I like how compact the product is, It makes really clear ice balls. If you're making them for multiple guest, I would get the product that makes larger quantities. I also purchased the cocktail neon sign and the custom bar Mat on Amazon and I love all of the products.

we've bought a lot of less expensive ice molds with horrible results - super hard to pry the mold off the ice, they crack when you put them in the glass or shortly after pouring your drink, or even they are hard to fill and spill all over the place. This one is amazing from start to finish. Easy to load, pretty easy to pull out of the mold, perfectly clear, we've made about 8 since receiving last week and haven't broken one yet. It is so worth the extra money over a $10-$15 one. The little extra storage bag works great as well to have some on hand and allowed me to just buy the 2 ball mold to save some cash. We took some advice from reviewers here about using warm water at a certain temp - but after a couple of times we just went with warm tap water, and even that is working just fine....and we have a very old gas water heater that takes forever, so I think we were only at about 80 degrees? Still clear as could be. Agree with others - this is finally one that works as advertised!
I am very happy with the long-lasting and clear ice spheres this product makes!

So, this thing is crazy frickin cool. It's absolutely clear spheres, everytime. I even use tap water from the sink. Its absolutely takes 24hrs to make the ice which is a real shame, but if that's what it takes to make these PERFECT CLEAR ICE SPHERES, then I'll deal with it. The ice lasts about 4 refilled
glasses before it goes away, and that's with room temperature drinks. So, it's pretty cool. I would recommend getting 2 of these bad boys for optimal utilization because I don't know about anyone out there, but I drink a lot of liquids. But if you just want to use these ice spheres for casual drinking with 1 or 2 glasses a day, just the 2 ice spheres will do you just fine. This is a 10/10, refer to my photos because it's pretty rad

I typically wouldn‚Äôt bother completing a review. But I‚Äôve had many ice molds over the years, and I was skeptical this one would actually work, but the product has come out fantastic. Tap water every time (I do have a water softener) and they come out perfect.

These are pretty pricey so I tend to expect perfection. I've made about a dozen or so spheres so far. They come out *mostly* clear but not perfectly so. I have found it takes 4 hands to remove the spheres so it's helpful if another person is around. Otherwise I put the container between my knees and rocking the spheres out. They DO required a full 36-48 hours to make in my fridge/freezer. A chest freezer may freeze them faster.

My husband has been on a quest to make clear ice balls for his bourbon for two years. Tried multiple things he read on the internet, I gave him the large square cube maker...always came out cloudy. I thought I would give it one more try and bought this. Oh my goodness, the ice balls look like crystal glass, they are so clear! My husband is soo very happy. Only complaint is that you can only make 2 at a time.

reviews.content: I was looking for a new way to store the seeds for my garden when I came across this item. After doing a little research, I decided to give it a try - and I am glad I did. It works better than I could have imagined. The case is very sturdy with a heavy duty zipper and handle that feel like they will withstand a lot of use. It is a fabric-covered hard case and feels like it is going to do an excellent job of protecting its contents. Inside, each container holds at least 1 packet of most seeds. I cut out the name from each seed packet and curled it around the inside of the container. Worked out great - you can see thru the container to see the name & how many seeds you have. I love that the containers have a screw on lid - extra protection against spilling and from the weather just in case the case gets left outside. Also, the containers are held in place with a dense foam insert. You can put them in alphabetical order and they stay that way making it easier to find what you are looking for. Couldn't ask for a better product.

This is perfect for transporting your littler gems and such. It is sturdy and made quite well and serves it's purpose. I do, however, wish they would make a stationary bead container that holds 500 of the round tubes. Afterall, they have at least 447 different colors and it means I will have to buy, at least, 3 more of these cases or a few of the stand-alone set-ups available. Even if I could find 2 stationary cases that held 250 of the round bead bottles each would work for me! I'm surprised that no one has thought of this.

I started with the 60 jar case but when the 120 jar went on sale I didn't hesitate. There are plenty of jars to kit up multiple smaller kits. For my larger kits I put the labeled jars on the top layer and put my extras on the bottom with the DMC code. I've tried another case from a different company before this one and the jars for this one feel higher quality. If I am ever in the need for more cases I will definitely buy again

First off, loved this and would buy again. I‚Äôm using it for rhinestones not diamond painting. A bag of 1440 ss20 takes three jars. Which is the biggest downside. The jars are SMALL. I got the one with 2 levels. I definitely recommend the 2levels. Definitely smells like burnt rubber when you get it. The green trays are nice. The white one would be nicer if the neck wasn‚Äôt bent and my rhinestones could flow easily. The tweezers are useless. The little pens are plastic but work well and the wax is also very useful. Very nice for travel proposes and organizing. The labels are super small, but work with regular ink or felt tip pens.

I use this case for all my spare diamond drills (I have filled up 2 so far) and I have the 120 case for my drills for my WIP. It is awesome for traveling and you don't have to worry about the tops opening and the drills spilling everywhere! I also can kit up two paintings at a time if I am working on smaller ones which is great!

The case to hold all the diamond dots is very sturdy. It came with a couple of different sized trays and lots of extra wax. The containers to hold the diamond dots are perfect for my needs and they are good and sturdy also. I really like mine!

I got the 120 size. I love the style and durability of this container. However, unless you have full containers, you cannot see the drills in the container even if you flip the entire pad over you still don‚Äôt see them because they‚Äôre on the other side. I have quite a lot of projects with may be 200 gems and they‚Äôre too far into the container, so you need to keep lifting everything out even more difficult if you have a number on it. The finger protectors on the tool stretched out after three nights of use. I see a lot of complaints about the funnel. Best put it large size down and push down initially and then use your finger nails to put it back together. It definitely could be a little more pliable.

I just restarted diamond painting a few weeks ago after not doing it for a couple of years. This kit is so practical and has everything you need for a beginner. The containers are sturdy and hold lots of drills. The large white trays are so convenient and better for holding lots of drills compared to the tiny trays that come with the kits. And the funnel will save you from spilling all your drills when returning them to their containers!
One of my favorite purchases of the year! So glad I grabbed, and the peach and pink flower print is lovely.

This kit met my expectations in every way, except as soon as I opened it I noticed it didn't smell very good. I don't know if it's from the foam used to keep the little jars in place or what. I will be airing it out as much as possible to see if that helps
Definitely not recommended for anyone with a sensitive nose.
This is a good and very durable case. The bottles work good and are big enough to hold multiple baggies of beads. The funnel is good too but should be rounded instead is squared.

name: Zulay Powerful Milk Frother for Coffee with Upgraded Titanium Motor - Handheld Frother Electric Whisk, Milk Foamer, Mini Blender and Electric Mixer Coffee Frother for Frappe, Matcha, No Stand - Black
description: Product Description

reviews.content:
This is exactly what I was looking for, very powerful little device that can blend up some difficult to dissolve protein powder right in my coffee cup. Some care is needed to keep the coffee mixture in the cup as this little blender is so powerful, but with some precautions (big cup, less liquid than you think, more powder than you think to thicken, blend a bit to the side of the cup) the results are perfectly smooth in a very short period of time. A quick rinse with hot water immediately after leaves it pretty clean, a bit of soap every once in a while to make sure.

Similar products I've used in the past were nowhere near powerful enough to get the job done that this one can. This is an excellent solution for difficult to blend beverages without dirtying the blender. This even worked better for this task than a plug-in immersion blender I have. Just be careful for a potential big splash - with great power comes great responsibility.

Update 3/1/23: This was my error. The two AA batteries ran low, and that's why this frother slowed. After setting it aside for a while, and coming back to a dead frother, I replaced the batteries and it's like new. Five stars.

I used this for frothing mile for coffee, and it was very good for that - at first. The issue I think is that the main stem is fairly small gauge stainless, more like a thick wire than a thin rod, so it ended up easily being very slightly bent. A very very small amount of bending essentially ruins the product for its intended purpose, because once off center, it cannot be put right. So the spinning is slowed down too much to be able to froth milk any longer. It can stir the milk around, but no longer froth as it did before in got off center. Most certainly my fault, i did not take care of it well enough. So, if you get one, ONLY use it to froth milk, and never set down or lean it against the side of a container. Only put it in the included little stand.

I didn't want to be a 'frother', but this little contraption converted me. I use this to blend green powders, collagen powders, and hydration mixes into my water. Way more effective than shaking or stirring them in. I am just whipping whatever I can into my water, because it is so satisfying. I keep purchasing more pricey powdered nutrition mixes because I know they can be frothed right in my water without ending up all chunky and sad. For $10, this thing is totally worth it

I got this to attempt cold foam. Maybe I‚Äôm doing it wrong, but I can‚Äôt seem to get a good, thick froth. I‚Äôve tried using different types of milk, different batteries, doing it longer, etc. It never gets close to cold foam consistency. Just sad, liquidly milk (albeit sort of bubbly).

It also does not come with a stand or anything. I looked at like 20 different brands, so by the end of it, I honestly didn‚Äôt realize I selected one that didn‚Äôt. Totally my fault but worth mentioning.

This little power house provides me with the ability to make my plain cup of coffee into a magnificent latte using flavored creams. In less than 8 seconds, three tbsps. of cream become a beautiful pile of foam for my morning cup!

I really enjoy this frother. I did have a previous one that had a stand so I use it. I would order this one with a stand if you don't have one. The power is Awesome! When it starts slowing down, you know to change the batteries. I was surprised how much froth this little thing was able to produce in my coffee. We love it!

The button feels like it will break off or pop out after a few too many uses. The power is good but not great. I had another like this that I liked better but it's not available for reorder. I have it taped up and it still works better than this new one which is fine and at least it's inexpensive.
This has been one of my favorite tools in my kitchen. And it‚Äôs small enough I can take it to travel with me. Wish it would‚Äôve came with a stand.

This frother literally changed my at-home coffee game. I can make cold foam for iced coffee and frothed hot milk for lattes. I also use it to mix other powders into liquid. I keep it clean by mixing in soap and water then rinsing with water. Been about two months of using once a day and it‚Äôs still working great!

This is the third frother I've bought (4th if you include the steam wand on my espresso machine!) - and it's the first GREAT one I've used.
This is a solid unit that kept on working even after I dropped it!
It takes about 40 seconds to get a great micro-foam on my cream (yes - even works on real cream) - and then 25 secs in the microwave -> perfect!
Highly recommended.

name: AQUAFIT 1 Gallon Water Bottle With Times To Drink - 128 oz Water Bottle With Straw - Motivational Water Bottle - Large Water Bottle - Sports Water Bottle With Time Marker - Gym Water Jug 1 Gallon
description:
Product Description
 
 
 
   

Dishwasher safe?

Unfortunately not as we cannot confirm heat affects on the bottle with different dishwashing cycles. Please only hand wash with soapy water

Is this bottle BPA Free?

All Aquafit water bottles are BPA free

Will the bottle sweat with cold ice and water?

Since the water bottle is not double walled or insulated, it will naturally sweat. This is a natural occurrence with all plastic water bottles.

reviews.content:
My dad recently passed away from cancer and my mom was just diagnosed. Both of them were notoriously dehydrated and I have no doubt that dehydration played a huge part in this.

I have always had a hard time keeping myself hydrated myself because I lose track of time during the day. Before I know it, it‚Äôs 7pm and all I‚Äôve had to drink is a cup of coffee. I‚Äôm a very visual person so buying this giant green bottle with time markers is very helpful. I‚Äôve been drinking a full bottle every day for over two weeks now! I‚Äôm not a super disciplined person. I think it‚Äôs just the visual of the bottle itself that really keeps me on track and I really don‚Äôt see this ever stopping.

Also!! I love that there are drinking options and it has never leaked.

It works really well. We use the straw top mostly. It‚Äôs really easy to drink out of. There‚Äôs barely any resistance with the flow of the straw. It doesn‚Äôt seem to leak, and because of its size we rarely have to fill it up. We keep it bedside. It‚Äôs a bit heavy, but given its size I don‚Äôt blame it. We don‚Äôt have a dishwasher though, and I can‚Äôt recall if this bottle is dishwasher safe. But it is hard to hand wash. There‚Äôs a whole section in the handle where the liquid can go, but you can‚Äôt reach it without some sort of specific brush. We use it for water so it‚Äôs no big deal. But if you want to put juice or something sticky in it, I would not recommend.

I love this water bottle, I love the straw and the extra cap. I have actually dropped it a couple times and it‚Äôs tough. I have used it every day since I bought it, and I‚Äôve got a couple friends struggling to purchase one and they love it as well. 100% recommend!!!

This water jug for me its overkill!! I feel if youre gonna work a 14 HR. Day at would be perfect but its is a big one! Very well made and I like the straw.you can change it out to chug or to slurp with straw ! Its a lot of water to hold if youre a waterholic..

Large size held a lot of water and for some reason made it very easy to drink a gallon of water a day. Unfortunately the plastic near the threads cracked to halfway down the side seam. This water bottle was never subjected to rough treatment, never dropped, and never washed in the dish washer. It cracked while being being up by the handle when it was full of water. Probably just a design flaw. If you want a great water bottle that will hold a gallon of water and you only need it for six months or less‚Ä¶ this is the bottle for you.

Edit: The Seller, after reading my review, contacted me on there own and offered a refund for the defective product. This is the level of customer service we all hope for. Highly recommend this seller!

Works great. Doesn‚Äôt leak and I use it everyday. It is a harder plastic so I was worried about it with some of the negative reviews about breaking but it has not. You just have to be careful and realize any hard plastic you drop might break of course and i hand wash it and use a brush I bought because the one it came with broke from the handle. Not a big deal because I use one on a bunch of bottles.
Solid water jug makes you feel healthy just looking at it lol. Easy to clean, markings are clear even comes with a bottle cleaner üòé . Comes with two lid options to drink out of it. I'd buy again.

Was my favorite gallon water bottle!! I have bought some in the past where I didn‚Äôt like the cap, however this one was perfect bc the straw portion was actually covered and easy to drink from and clean! I used it religiously every day , the markings helped me stay on track with my water intake. However it fell off my bed and broke and water got everywhere
:( I am sad and wish it was a bit more durable

This is a great water bottle. Yes it's quite large (obviously) but it definitely is helping me drink extra water. The straw is easy to drink from and I find myself drinking more out of it compared to my (expensive) Stanley. The only issue is getting out the last bit of water but that's not the end of the world. I haven't had to clean out the handle yet but I don't expect it to be difficult. Good water bottle and I'm glad I chose it.

This thing might have saved my life, my skin was struggling, I had headaches all the time. I‚Äôm always busy between school and work so sometimes i‚Äôd go to bed without drinking any water, now, I at least drink half a gallon per day and I feel much better.

reviews.content:
The unit (though I saw the videos and read the measurements) is larger than I thought. But it does do the job.

Packaging: the box comes wrapped in sealed plastic. And that is the hardest part. Clearly, they realise that people with limited hand strength might be buying this and they made packaging to match. Once the plastic is off, there are easy hold tabs and grasping points to allow you to safely remove the device without getting frustrated. Bonus point to them.

Battery compartment: This is easily removed. But not easy to replace. The grooves don't line up easily and there is a gap after. I'll fiddle with it some more, but didn't want to stress anything. It is plastic afterall. It holds 4 AA batteries

Instructions: written in a small manual or via a video via a QR code. They are simple to follow and concise. No confusion.

Operation: Works as advertised. Just follow the instructions and there will be no slivers of metal in the food. The sound does not change when it makes a full circuit, so simply set the device and remember the starting position and stop it when it gets back to that position. Note that the device will need space around the tin to make its circuit, so clear the area. The lid came off easily with a tight grasp to top and a tilting motion (might have to slip a fingernail underneath). No rough edges. No part of the unit was in the food.

Remember to store it so that the button is not likely to be depressed by anything, and remove the battery if not using regularly. The unit has no strange odour straight out the box.

Now then, the safety point.

IMPORTANT: When I slipped in the last battery, the unit started right up! Not cool. Remember that the likely holding position is blade down, in your palm. Shocked me that it would do that. Took 3 presses of the button (possibly because I just wanted it to stop immediately) before it stopped. So please be careful about that. Star removed.

Misc: there is another QR code for a chance to win something - doesn't work. But that would just have been a bonus and clearly does not affect use of the unit.

Overall: decent device, works as intended, clean cut, easy lid removal. However, IMPORTANT SAFETY NOTE on battery installation.

I open all of my cans that need to be opened with it. Like the Albacore Tuna that I get at Costco. It works perfect and all you need to do when it's done going around the can all by itself is your going to be removing the top of the can--which I use to pour all the water excess off, and so I do that, now dump the tuna in a big bowl if you are making enough to last for 2 people, hope your pickles up nice and fine II always use the ones you get in the cold section of any store you go into for me it's Safeway but I'm sure they have them at Freddy's/its a Kroger store now. I as come green onion and a little bit of dill and your going to have a delicious sandwich that you'll enjoy for a week or more or if you have a husband like I do, then you can both enjoy those sandwich's for quite a while.

it is so easy to use - just lay it on the can and push the button - after it makes one lap around the can hit the button again and pick it up - there is one small concern but i love it overall - takes the entire top off the can making it very easy to empty contents without the lip to get in the way - but the magnet is not strong enuf to lift the top off most cans - they dont lift off easily - i worry i will cut my hand on the can when i lift off the top - despite this i would recommend this to anyone who needs an electric can opener - easy to operate - easy to clean - small enuf to store easily in a drawer - almost perfect

Who knew you could have this much fun opening a can! My wrist was killing me from turning the crank on my manual can opener, and I hated cleaning the gunk off the blade on my electric unit. Set this little gem on your can & in 1 minute or less, it‚Äôs open- no sharp edges & easy removal. SERIOUSLY- one of my best purchases. I don‚Äôt love red, but bought the red & white one so it would be easy to find in the ‚Äòutensil‚Äô drawer (aka junk drawer) and no regrets! I highly recommend this compact gadget for home, professional kitchens and those who go camping.
You‚Äôll be amazed at the versatility!

It works pretty well but as it wears out, it begins to take more and more rotations to completely remove the top of a can. I have had two now and have been waiting for a new one to be delivered which apparently got lost somewhere. I will say that I use this to open no less than six cans a day, every single day. 42 cans a week, 168 cans a month, you get the drift. At a minimum. I think it is a good solution for an older person with bad arthritis or someone like me with a ruptured bicep tendon where turning a hand can opener is too painful. I also like it because I can be doing other things while the cans are being opened. My dogs like that too!

I've been looking for the perfect can opener and I finally found it. This one is actually fun to use. I look forward to having a can to open. You put this on top of the can and it rotates around the can and opens it all by itself. It opens any size 600mgcan perfectly, leaves no sharp edges and has a magnet that lifts the lid off and leaves no sharp edges. This can opener never comes in contact with the contents of the can so cleanup is a breeze. Just wipe it off with a damp cloth.

The electric can opener is an essential tool in the kitchen, and its ease of use can greatly impact its popularity among users. In this regard, the electric can opener is a great choice for people looking for a hassle-free and convenient way to open cans.

One of the standout features of this appliance is its automatic operation. Simply place the can on the machine, press a button, and the can opener will do the rest, freeing you from the hassle of manual labor. The machine is also equipped with a sharp blade that cuts through the lid with ease, reducing the risk of injury or hand fatigue.

Additionally, the electric can opener is designed with ease of use in mind, as it is compact and lightweight, making it easy to store in a kitchen cabinet or on a countertop. Its sleek and stylish design also blends in well with other kitchen appliances.

Overall, the electric can opener is an excellent choice for people looking for a convenient, easy-to-use, and safe appliance for opening cans. Whether you are a busy homemaker or a professional chef, this machine will make your life easier and save you time in the kitchen.

this works OK the only problem is that you have to hand-hold it if you leave it on it doesn't cut also I know by leaving it just goes around and around But it won't cut do you have a bad thing is the battery cover is cheap plastic difficult to get off and put the batteries in then put the cover back on one thing I like a lot is the dog can lid will fit on the cans same as if you use a can opener that I was concerned about this is something that should be added to the list because people might wonder I didn't know if it would work or not work because of the way the cover comes off the purchase is well worth the money conventional hand can openers never work electric can openers you if you can open a can but I did not give this a perfect 5 score because of the way it works

I got this for my mother who can't really grip normal can openers any more, despite being skeptical from previous purchases of other brands that couldn't open a paper bag. This one does the job as advertised and she is opening cans like a champion.

Runs a bit loud, but opens up any can she has tried it with so far, smooth edges on the lid so no cut fingers. Just set it on the can, hit the button and let it work.

This device opens cans smoothly, though slowly. It leaves a non-threatening metal edge, a good thing. Its method of opening is unconventional, which takes a bit of getting-used-to, but it works well. It's especially helpful for people with arthritic hands, since it doesn't require any "strength" in the hands, or twisting. One drawback: the battery compartment is difficult to open, and the instructions recommend removing batteries when the device will go unused for long periods. (This could be fixed with a better plastic indentation design for sliding open the battery compartment.)

description:
Product Description
How to Breathe Better, Sleep Better, and Live Better at Home

Dry air can become a source of unnecessary discomfort even if you have not noticed:

¬∑ Are you experiencing dry coughing/ really dry throat?

¬∑ Do you snore at night or your nose feels congested?

¬∑ Does your skin become flaky, dry or itchy when you wake up in the morning?

¬∑ Do your kids find it difficult to sleep for a full night?

If any of the above rings true to you, then dry air might be the underlying cause.

Cool Mist Air Humidifier by AquaOasis- You Answer to Dryness

The Cool Mist Air Humidifier is a wholesome solution for Adults, Kids and Babies alike. Place it in any room around the house and sleep, meditate, read, or relax with your family- as comfortably as possible.

Adding humidity to dry air may temporarily aid you with:

¬∑ Congested Nose- Let yourself sleep through the night without waking up every hour

¬∑ Snoring Issues- Bring serenity to your partner and yourself with improved sleeping at night

¬∑ Dry Coughing, Dry Throat- No more getting irritated from constant coughing that ruins relaxation

¬∑ Dry Skin Around The Nose, Mouth Or Body-Wake up fresh, rejuvenated and good-looking

Discover a Deeper, Replenishing Sleep Experience by improving the air quality at home. Do away with congestion all year long and pass this flu season, uninterrupted.

	

	



	
	

	

	



Auto Shut-Off Function, Filter-Free Operation

Set the hours of operation to your day/night schedule & let the auto-shut-off feature take care of everything else as you work, sleep or relax.

What‚Äôs more, our humidifier does not need any expensive filters to operate, meaning no costly replacements.

	
Unnoticeably Quiet

Its whisper-quiet operation lets you study, meditate, read, sleep, care for your baby or do any activity with zero noise distractions.

The 2.2 liter tank allows for more than 24 hours of silent operation- making it perfect for overnight use in babies‚Äô & kids‚Äô room where total serenity is a must.

	
Knob Dial for Precise Mist Adjustment

Dial in your preferred mist level with its analogue knob in a far more precise way than buttons, and adjust the 360 rotatable nozzle to the perfect spot.

Create the ideal climate in your bathroom, bedroom or any room around the house, and enjoy every minute of your routine.

Why Choose the AquaOasis Air Humidifier?

Enjoy the most value-packed air humidifier that improves your quality of life at home, does not break the bank and operates according to your schedule.

Create the Perfect Home Conditions for Your Family & Breathe Easy, Starting Today

reviews.content:
At last I can actually BREATHE (literally!!) a HUGE sigh of relief! We simply couldn‚Äôt be more delighted with this Humidifier!

It definitely seems like the rest of the world was enlightened while I was kept in the dark about the fact that numb toes, chattering teeth and the flu are not necessarily the most perilous part of winter!

I recently moved to New York from Florida. I was beyond excited to experience the 4 seasons, despite knowing that I might have to dig my way out of 2 ft of snow at times, and the dangers of blizzards and black ice.

However, what NO ONE prepared me for was this DREADFULL DRYNESS that lasts HALF A YEAR and makes me feel literally like HALF A HUMAN! I‚Äôm NOT kidding.

Seriously, how do people FUNCTION? As soon as the cold set in I began waking up with a terrible thirst and dryness. My tongue felt like sandpaper against the roof of my mouth and my voice could barely croak in the morning. My nose was somehow wet and stuffed, yet dry and burning all at once! (Blowing my nose just caused a nosebleed!) My eyelids literally pasted to my eyeballs and if by some miraculous chance, despite feeling like this, I DID wake up feeling cheery enough to grin‚Ä¶. I daren‚Äôt allow the slightest smile to stretch across my lips lest they sprout half a dozen bloody cracks!! OUCH. And EWWW. What the hell???!!!

But the worst was still waking up all cotton brained and headachy! Copious amounts of coffee didn‚Äôt do a darn thing to lift the fog so I could function! I was feeling so terrible I began thinking I was suffering from depression. I never felt so awful in my life!

Then my 3 year old came down with a really nasty cold that left a lingering dry cough lasting about a week after all the other symptoms were gone. Maddeningly persistent at night, it would simply disappear without a trace in the morning. It was really hard to watch her suffer so much! She‚Äôd wake herself up as her whole body wracked with these coughs! I was seriously at the brink of my sanity!!! Every night I‚Äôd swear that I‚Äôd be at the Doctors office first thing in the morning and every morning she woke up ‚Äúall better‚Äù so no need! After one nightly coughing attack caused her to VOMIT I got my fat a$$ to the Pediatrician because by then I was really alarmed.

Doctor was cool as a cucumber ‚ÄúWelcome to winter and I‚Äôm willing to bet you guys have central heat at home‚Ä¶‚Äù Well, I sure do! It was the BEST perk of our new apartment not having to worry about the kids touching radiators! Who knew it only aggravated this winter dry air situation?! Who knew there WAS a winter dry air situation?! Not me! That‚Äôs for sure!

He suggested getting a Humidifier and I was sure I heard wrong! I use a DE-humidifier so that my clothes could dry faster than it could start smelling of mold if I hung it to dry indoors!

We got a decent Humidifier actually that we THOUGHT was effective and we were happy with (even though it leaked! I thought that was just part of it!)‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Until it broke after a few weeks and the company refused to send us a new oneL! After being stiffed once, I did some research and settled on the AquaOasis. Had some awesome reviews, looked sleek and strong, and loved that it has a built in self filtering feature. (And boy, it even passed my husband‚Äôs curiosity test. Happens to be an electrician and has this thing with electronics! üôÑ

Anyway, the price was well worth it and this operates in virtual silence! I literally need to put my ear to the machine to hear a soft low hum‚Ä¶ Nothing like the grating ruckus of my previous one!

Been using this for a few weeks and simply couldn‚Äôt be happier! I feel sooo much better! My daughters cough is totally gone and I wake up feeling well rested, invigorated and ALIVE! Headaches are gone, my eyeballs aren‚Äôt in a ‚Äústicky relationship‚Äù with my eyelids anymore and I‚Äôm not scared my lips‚Äôll ‚Äúpop‚Äù if I laugh by mistake!! I feel so exhilarated, so alive‚Ä¶so, well‚Ä¶HUMIDIFIED!! It sounds clich√© but it‚Äôs TRUE!!!!!! Best investment ever!

‚Ä¶.AND‚Ä¶. I saved the best part for last here ‚Ä¶. Do you know what THE FREAK‚ÄôN HELL I DISCOVERED folks??! My Psoriasis and eczema improved so dramatically that I came right back here to buy one for my mom who suffers from eczema too! I tell you these Humidifiers are the BEAST!

Anyway, will keep you posted if anything changes but so far so good! I just wish all of life‚Äôs problems were so easily and neatly fixable!

Stay warm folks‚Ä¶ and HUMIDIFIED ;)!

I really didn't have big expectations for this product because when I order online its always something. Let me just say I was pleasantly surprised with this product wait...So first off when I opened the Amazon box the item had outside damage to the box it was packaged in now I'm like uh oh here we go. Then I opened it and found that the power switch wasn't in place properly I'm like see this is what I'm talking about everytime I order online its something. So I gently put the knob in properly then I say now let me see if it works properly and to my surprise it worked pretty good now its been a month and a half it's still going strong exceeding my expectations. The only thing I gotta say it took some time to get the correct mist setting after waking up to my bedding feeling damp and my window all wet. They say its cool mist not really it kinda too cold for me. It was putting out some heavy mist there for a minute so I worked with the setting a few days and now I got the perfect setting still a little on the cold side for me but that not too bad I just bundle up under my blankets. It was using a lot of water there too I'm thinking because the setting was too high and I've only used distilled water I went through about 5 gallons in 1 and half months. Now with the right setting I hope to go through less still a on the cold side even on a lower setting. But other than that this one is a winner. I'd recommend. Oh yeah it also helped with me waking up so dry I use to wake up with my throat so dry I could barely swallow for the first 1 to 2 hours of being awake now I don't have that problem. If you have a dry house like me you should get this one I only use it at night not sure how it would handle during the day. But its got a üëçüèΩ from me.

This is a very small, but effective, misting humidifier. It is mostly good, but I do have a couple of observations after using it for part of a day and overnight. First, it is impossible to totally fill the already small tank. Even if you add water to the point where it starts to overflow as you fill it when you turn it over and put it on the base, a significant portion of the water goes into the base so that the tank is about 3/4 of the way full before you even turn it on. Second, you absolutely have to use the cap/spout, otherwise, it just shoots a cloud straight up into the air that then comes back down and gets whatever you have it sitting on wet. The cap allows you to control the direction the mist goes and makes it finer so it is not just a huge cloud of water. Third, if you dial it up to full power, which is pretty much required if you have a large room (especially if you also have vaulted ceilings) it will not run an entire night. I turned it on at about 8:30 PM and it was shut off before I woke up in the morning. Finally, it will shut off even when there is a bit of water left in the tank and there will be water in the base when you take the tank off. Just be aware of that because if you lift the tank without being careful you will get water on the table or shelf you have this on.

Ultimately, I do think that this is a good deal, but, for $30 it would be nice if the tank was a little bit bigger so that it could run longer. I do like the auto shut-off feature when the water gets low so you are not running the motor when it is not doing anything, which should allow it to last longer. That said, the big plus is that it does not require a filter, so you do not have to keep paying to use it after you buy it. And, you do not have to take it apart and risk breaking it in order to clean the parts that need to be cleaned from time to time. So overall, it is a good deal.

I really like/love this humidifier. I don't like filters and this one does not need one. It's the best humidifier I've had. I waited to review so I knew it was good. I had an old one I loved and used it for years and years and it finally died. i had a hard time replacing it as I bought 2 diff kinds that were no good. So i went years without. Finally took a chance on this one and so glad I did. Works like a charm. Lasts at least 8 hours and flashes when running low. also shuts off. Ive had no problems and none mentioned in comments. Someone said they had overflow problems but I can't even see how that could happen.

The tank can look like it's in place when it is not quite so you have to kind of jiggle it to make sure it's all the way in its place. It will act funny if the tank is a little askew which you can't really see in some cases esp if you are looking down on it from above. So I just jiggle it a little until I can tell it's perfectly in place and can't jiggle. by jiggle i mean it just moves a little. when in place it won't move and you can tell. Puts out lots of moisture. My dogs lay under the stream for max humidity sometimes. I live in cold country and the furnace really makes the air dry on cold days. I thought it was too small but it does the job of a big one so that's not a problem and it's neater and fits more places.

As a mom, I'm always looking for ways to make my kids more comfortable and healthier. That's why I was excited to try this Cool Mist Humidifier in their bedrooms.
Overall, I've been happy with this humidifier. It does a great job of adding humidity to the air and making the room feel more comfortable. The adjustable 360 rotation nozzle is also helpful because I can direct the mist exactly where I want it as it really does shoot out, although the nozzle can be a little loose feeling.
One thing to note, though, is that it doesn't last as long as the product description claims. I found that I had to refill the water tank every 12-14 hours or so. But it's not a big deal, and it's a common issue with humidifiers in general.
The humidifier is good at adding moisture to the room, which is especially helpful when my kids have colds. I like that it's quiet and has an auto-shut off feature, so I don't have to worry about it running dry and causing damage.
Overall, I would recommend this humidifier to other parents who want to improve the air quality in their homes. It's easy to use, easy to take care of, and will help you and your family breathe a little easier.

I purchased this in the height of winter for my toddlers who were suffering from RSV and colds. Our home is so dry with the heat running, and it has done wonders for the difference of humidity in the air.
I like how easy the design is. There‚Äôs nothing special about it, and that‚Äôs what I was looking for. I wanted a humidifier that did what it said it would.
For the most part, it‚Äôs incredibly quiet. On occasion, it does that bubbling thing where you can hear the water shifting around in the base. It holds a large amount of water and I typically run it on low/medium and just leave it alone. There‚Äôs no obnoxious light that lights the room up for those who are sensitive to needing a dark room to sleep.
I do wish it was a too full because it‚Äôs just so annoying to have to take it off the base, drip water everywhere, and then turn it upside down to refill it. That being said, I knew it was a bottom fill but because of the other factors, I figured it was worth the exchange. I was right.
It‚Äôs a great running humidifier. Quiet, holds a large amount, and other than some occasional bubbling, I forget that it‚Äôs running.

I really think this is probably the easiest humidifier I‚Äôve ever used. It takes almost no time to set up and starts working immediately. I personally missed the part where it said it was cool mist, as I normally like warm humidified air. So make sure you intend on getting cool mist before ordering this. That being said, I use this when I had the flu and Covid recently where I thought I was dying. My throat was so dry from being unable to breathe through my nose. I turn this on, and spend the nozzle to face me (nice feature by the way) and I do think it helped quite a bit. It runs for a long time, it‚Äôs very quiet but it‚Äôs kind of soothing to listen to, really, no complaints at all for me. Again, just wish it had the ability to be warm, but that‚Äôs my fault for not reading the description better.

with a lot of sinus issues and snoring, waking with dry mouth, this has been helpful. I don't notice the change until I go a night without. It is easyish to fill and use. The only thing I do not like is the on-off light. I have to swaddle the machine to obscure the light (I need darkness to sleep). But that might be ok for a child's room or for people who don't need total dark to sleep.

The biggest issue is that it does not last 24 hours or more. I set it at the lowest setting around midnight and sometime before noon, it's out of water and off. I wanted a 24 hour one (or at least 16) so that it would overlap my nightshift husband's and my own sleep shedules and run for both of us. I'm not sure when it shuts off, as I get up around 10am and I'm out of the room until 2am when my husband gets up.

I love that you can fill the water as full as possible. That means I don't have to refill it often. When full, it lasts a good 8 hours on highest setting. I didn't give it 5 stars because the water reservoir isn't flat a the top so you can't place it down to pour the water in. You have to hold it with one hand while holding the gallon of water, if full, can be pretty challenging to work with. I now hold it right at the top near the spout where there's an indentation and try to tip the water bottle over a ledge of a counter, dresser or table to pour the water in. Not a biggie but I think can be redesigned for easier refills.

I really like this humidifier. Pretty basic to use but will run all night on a full tank and high mist flow. Since it‚Äôs not huge filling it is not that difficult but make sure that the twist on cap that closes the tank is firmly against the tank ! It may seem closed tight but if there‚Äôs any gap the water will leak out‚Ä¶you‚Äôll get what I mean when you try it. Easy to rinse out and bottom is easy to clean since there is no filter to remove.
Make sure that when you set the filled tank on the base it fits snuggly inside the ridge that runs on the edge of the base.
I read a few reviews that complained about it not working right but if it‚Äôs set up correctly it works great!

name: Mulberry Silk Pillowcase for Hair and Skin Standard Size 20"X 26" Pillow Case with Hidden Zipper Soft Breathable Smooth Cooling Silk Pillow Covers for Sleeping(Haze Blue,Standard,1Pcs)
description:
Product Description

	

	



Silk Material

Satin is made of pure silk, with tight stitches and silky fabric

	
Hidden Zipper

The zipper is wrapped in the pillowcase and does not affect the feeling of use of the pillowcase

	
Right Size

Strictly produced according to the size, perfectly fits the corners of the pillow

reviews.content: The feel of this pillow case is superb! I was so happy to find the exact color I wanted that I forgot it was natural mulberry silk-so wonderful and classic! The hidden zipper is a big plus and totally smooth. No pillow slippy sliding out of the case as I‚Äôve had in other products, and no roughness-the seam totally covers and hides the zipper. The small zipper pull is even designed with a smooth surface. I don‚Äôt know why some colors are different prices. This grayish blue one is almost a dollar more than the silver grey I also purchased, for example, but I‚Äôm not really complaining. Both are great values. I‚Äôll probably be getting more of these.

I would like to give this a 5 star, but I just couldnt. It does check all the boxes and does what it is supposed to. My wife has curly hair and it keeps it from frizzing when she sleeps. The only issue we have with it is we all have natural oils in our hair, so you see the spot from your head on the pillow cover. Perhaps there is no way around it, but there must be something that can be infused with the silk to eliminate the natural oil spot that remains on the fabric. I have fairly dry hair, use no product at all except head and shoulders shampoo, and still the spot from the hair and natural skin oil. Yes, the product does work on the curly hair and help with the frizzing while you sleep on it though.

My hair is b-4 curly, very long and very opinionated. My stylist has been yelling at me for years about getting silk pillows, but I always thought they were gross. Slippery and squicky and gross. Well, I am please to say these are not that. They are glorious! After a wash they still have the lines from packaging and travel, but I think they will fall out naturally very soon (yes, I could have ironed them, but...meh). I've only slept on them for one night and not only were they very comfortable (they don't slide around as I had feared), I stayed cooler than with cotton, percale or linen (I'm a hot sleeper), AND my hair was noticeably less angry this morning! HUZZAH!

I bought 4 standard and 2 king. (I'm a pillow horse.) The standard were a little wider than I would have liked, but they hang nicely. The king has less room than the standard, but still a little big. Certainly not a reason not to get these, just and FYI.

I actually bought this as a Christmas present for my adult son as I‚Äôd run out of ideas. He loves it!!! His complexion has improved and he no longer gets ingrown hairs in his beard and neck areas. When he gets up in the morning his hair isn‚Äôt all dry and smashed looking. He says it is super comfortable. It washes and dries well so far.

Beautiful solid colors in Silk with a shine.
I chose the beautiful white.
Zipper keeps it from slipping off.
I find silk pillow cases are not the miracle
beauty treatment to prevent waking up with dry bed-head hair, as I have read in articles. I guess I was used to good quality high thread count silky 100% cotton pillow cases. These silk pillow cases do feel luxurious. Reasonably priced. Warning: your head will slide down the silk pillow case.

This runs a TON of purple colored inks. It doesn‚Äôt advice to clean it when getting it on the packaging so I just ran it with some other clothes I was washing. For the past few week since I put it on my pillow my face has been covered in black heads. Thought it was the clay masks I started using doing what they advertise, cleansing the pores, but then it just kept happening. It didn‚Äôt make sense that my face would be okay after washing and then a nightmare right after waking up. Before throwing away the clay masks (which were expensive) I decided to pull the pillow case off my pillow and run it under cold water. Purple water POURED off it!! Took five minutes to run clear. Don‚Äôt buy this if you can afford a better product. Shouldn‚Äôt have to wash something twice to avoid it ruining your skin

I‚Äôve ordered 3 sets of these cases‚Ä¶primarily because this color of blue matches my sheets and bedroom decor‚Ä¶softest ever pillowcases, nice to my face and hair, easy to wash‚Ä¶if you hang to dry or hang when almost dry, they are wrinkle free enough not to need to iron‚Ä¶I am so impressed that I felt I needed to keep a couple of sets of back ups as I never want to sleep without them!

The presentation package for this item was lovely - and the pillowcase itself is beautiful - Nice thread size, rich color, well constructed and very soft. The only nitpick is that the zipper does not go from end to end, which I understand insofar as doing it that way helps prevent the outer seams from splitting but just know that one must be a little careful when loading a pillow into it so as not to rip the seam where the zipper begins and end..Otherwise, very happy with this purchase.

I love these silk pillowcases, and they make the perfect gift, especially for traveling. They are packaged nicely, but unfortunately, every envelope looked as though it had been handled by dirty hands. I had to find a creative way to cover up the smudges so I could still gift them in their nice packaging. The smudges would not wipe off.

You can tell that these are made from high quality material. I ordered these and the Bedsure silk pillow cases to compare. While I like that the Bedsure pillow cases are more climate friendly, these silk pillow cases win every time hands down.
