reviews.content: My husband has been deaf for 3 yrs., so we write. The dry erase pens from dollar stores are ok, but run dry or squish too soon. Seeing these EXPO pens and the description on AMAZON, I decided that having free shipping, I would try them. They last longer, so the price is right for us, the tips are great. AMAZON description is exact. Package & delivery good.

I was worried that it would be hard to remove from plexiglass, like some other white-board markers are. Not at all! Wipes cleanly and easily with a napkin (I don't have an eraser). Great ink flow and a fine, clean line make it perfect.
We have a family white board with our weekly schedule. These thin tip markers help us stay organized. Works great! Vibrant colors.
These didn't last as long as I'd hoped and I found the tips a bit too thick for my use
Great markers to write with.
I like the price and product quality. I use it on a laminated calendar for planning meetings and keeping me organized
The fine tip is really good it brings the best out of my hand writing.
We use these for tracing letters in one of those books were you can wipe the words away. I love it she loves it, it‚Äôs a win win situation for everyone! :)

First day I got them they were very dull so I almost left a bad review. I decided to leave them cap down in a cup over night and now all the colors are extremely vibrant.

Make sure you flip them over and leave them flipped over for the best color.
Writes well, lines are crisp. Some of the markers are too light to see from even a few feet away, so 1/4 of the set is useless.

reviews.content: It took me months before I actually bought a battery pack because I didn't want the disappointment that seems to come with half of my Amazon purchases lately... However THIS IS THE ONE! My main concerns were 1) It wouldn't hold enough juice to actually power anything or only enough to give a little charge and then die on me when I really needed it. Neither of the above are an issue. It definitely hold enough juice and not only does it hold as much juice as it says in the description, but it charges sooooo fast! My phone (Galaxy) went from 11% to 100% in less than 45 mins and I still had enough to charge it 2 more times before having to plug in the battery pack again. The price was unbeatable, and the quality is more than worth the price. And it comes with 2!!! If you need a good quality battery pack this one is definitely it. Don't bother spending more because you think the price is too low. It's not necessary.

I have had these for almost two years and they are excellent. I can not touch them for months and it doesn't matter-- they stay charged and are ready to charge my device no problem. I have had no issues with them getting hot/warm and I keep one in each of my cars at all times for emergencies. I have also travelled with them several times. They are incredibly handy and slim/light. I highly recommend.

These portable chargers have a decent battery life. They take a while to charge, but once they are fully charged, they can charge one phone up to 100% and potentially another phone after that. They are small and easy to fit in bags. Compared to other portable chargers that I have owned, this charger definitely charges my phone faster and to a higher percentage.

I‚Äôm really glad I got the two pack bc whenever one is in my backpack and ends up drained after a while, I‚Äôve got the other fully charged and can just swap em so i never am chargerless lol. They haven‚Äôt exploded or over heated or anything like that, and the battery life is extremely long like I have yet to see one fully dead I just notice it‚Äôs low after a long time and switch them out. Solid product and it‚Äôs no bigger than my phone (iPhone 8+) 10/10

These will be my second pair. My first pair are around 1.5yrs old and I use them a lot to charge or power stuff inside my roof top tent when I'm camping and never given me any issue. I purchased the 2nd pair as a power back up to charge my gopro and stuff. Don't use the supplied charging micro USB cord. You can charge them way faster with a usbc quick charger.

So far so good on the chargers. I got 1 for me (IPhone 14) and another for my son (Galaxy S23). My son has used his and I have not. Unable to give more than 3 stars for battery life due to the above mention use. Will update after more time having them.

This charger is pretty good. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't turn off, so if I charge it but then don't use it for several days, it automatically dies. That means I have to charge it again before I can use it to charge my phone. Kind of annoying. But when charged, it does work very well.
This is the third pair of these I've bought. I bought myself two and these I bought as a Christmas gift. They are as slim as a cell phone and hold a couple of charges worth of juice.

Don't know why i waited so long. Tis is a must have. charges the phone quickly.
Bought a short charging cable as well. so if i plan to just charge and not use. i don't have a long cable dangling. excellent product bought 2 gave one as a gift.
I would listen to music loading trucks at work with my phone which kills the battery life but this charger works great. Charges fast & never did it let my phone die!!

name: BEAUTURAL Fabric Shaver and Lint Remover, Sweater Defuzzer with 2-Speeds, 2 Replaceable Stainless Steel Blades, Battery Operated, Remove Clothes Fuzz, Lint Balls, Pills, Bobbles
description:
Product Description

	

	



	
	
				
	Mini Steam Iron	Mini Heat Press Machine	Foldable Garment Steamer	Garment Steamer
Voltage	120 / 240 Volts	120 Volts	120 Volts	120 Volts

reviews.content: Here are some before and after pictures of a jacket I‚Äôve had less than a year. Shortly after purchasing it, it started to get ‚Äúpills‚Äù in areas. I love my jacket and didn‚Äôt want to replace it but felt it looked unkept when I wore it. Purchased the Beautural Fabric Shaver as a last ditch effort to save my jacket. The shaver did an amazing job with minimal effort and saved my jacket and me some money. Now this little shaver is my new favorite addition to my busy family life. Comes with a few extra blades, bag, cleaning brush and some covers. If you need to refresh your clothes, this did an amazing job.

Product is well made and well finished. Does not feel cheap and is solid in you hand.
.
I‚Äôm not finding the attachment head included to prevent ‚Äúover shaving‚Äù very useful or needed. They didn‚Äôt need to include this.
.
The extra blades are welcome. The cover to protect the shaver head is useful.
.
Noise level is not bad at all. And the device removes lint and balls very well.
.
I have seen other products sell for more. This one is rather compact and durable for what it costs. I would buy again.

I‚Äôve had this for a while now and every time I go to use it, I‚Äôm reminded how amazing it is. It really is so easy to use and removes pilling from any material easily. I just had to use it to fix the string of a brand new jacket I got my fianc√© for Valentine‚Äôs Day. The kitty got ahold of it with her claws. It was fixed in no time. A flat surface and going easily and carefully is a must! I usually put my hand under the fabric to make sure it doesn‚Äôt snag. It seriously was a great purchase!

I never leave a review but I felt the strong need to leave a review for this one. I seriously considered buying a new Patagonia fleece jacket bc my burdens one was full of so much lint. I didn‚Äôt know removing lint is possible. I purchased this product with a little bit of mistrust about whether it‚Äôs gonna work or not but oh boy- I‚Äôm so so so so happy with this purchase. Just look at before and after of my jacket in the two pictures attached. Nothing else today. Amazing. So happy.

This one is highly rated by Spruce and a few other "best of" lists. it's definitely easy to use. Absolutely works well. Shaves the lint, balls and fuzz off sweaters. Completely revived some of my sweaters. The handle shape makes it ergonomic & much better than the smaller one I used to use. I've carefully used it without the guard following the instructions to have the item on a flat, even hard surface & the results were perfect and no damage to the sweater. I'm still on my first set of 2 batteries and I'm surprised how long they have lasted considering how long I've fun the device.

The ONLY caveat is that the lint shavings get stuck up at the head of the device. I have to tap it for the shavings to go down into the "Fluff Collector" receptacle & have found it needs to be brushed out from the top, blown thru or vacuumed in order to full clean the top section sometimes more than once on a bigger sweater. So this requires a bit more work than I expected. I think it's a great tool for the price. The results are fantastic. The shape is great for it's purpose but not as much for cleaning it. I would give it 4.5 stars if it let me instead of 4.

This works! I'm shocked. Didn't know things like this existed and boy does it work! If you have something wool like, it may take a bit longer to finish, especially over larger areas. I used it for my mixed fabric thick trench coat like coat and it WORKED! Coat looks new! I was just getting ready to get rid of it but didn't want to because it's not that old and then came across this bad boy. And I'm certainly glad I did. I'd like a larger more powerful one for larger items, but this surely works great for now. Oh and I used it on my couch and rug, as I had fabric dangling and it handled WELL. No damage. For thicker fabric, don't use the guard so you can get close to the area for removal. Hope this helps! Sorry, no pic.

I bought this one because I have a battery operated lint remover, but I was going through batteries like crazy. I‚Äôd recharge them, but when I‚Äôm in the mood to shave pills, I need hours of power. The corded pill shaver is fantastic. I can shave blankets, sweaters, even my couch. It takes off pet hair, too. If I haven‚Äôt burned out the motor after a few months, no one will.

Every time I use this I tell myself that I need to write a review for it because so few products impress me in such a way. It is truly amazing! Sweaters, shirts, socks, anything where the fabric has pilled up and become ragged looking can be fixed with this. It is very easy to use and the batteries have not died on me yet. Clothes that I would normally get rid of due to pills developing and making it look worn out I can now make look almost new again with this product. It is easy to clean, just remove the case and dump the shavings. It is an excellent product for the money and I am extremely happy with it.

This product is awesome! It does what it is supposed to do....remove lint balls from your clothing! What's nice is that it comes with multiple blades! It definitely does make a difference in your clothing after using this product on it as it makes your clothing look new again. Just turn it on, and run it all over your clothing and it eats the lint balls right off of it without harming or damaging your sweaters, sweatshirts, etc.

I've had a number of fabric shavers through the years, but this one is, by far, the best I've ever had. It is easy to use, easy to clean, and really does the job quickly and efficiently. It comes with a very nice storage bag with extra blades and an excellent cleaning brush. The price is more than fair, as well. Highly recommended,

aboutProductTopics.name: Make sure this fits by entering your model number.
Premium Quality Components
Easily remove lint, fluff, fuzz balls and bobbles from your favorite garments and fabrics

Powered by 2 AA batteries, which makes it completely cordless and easy use on a large area

name: 6 Pack Sport Bands Compatible with Apple Watch Band 38mm 40mm 41mm 42mm 44mm 45mm 49mm,Soft Silicone Waterproof Strap Compatible with iWatch Apple Watch Series Ultra 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 SE Women Men
description:
Product Description
6 Pack Sport Bands Compatible with Apple Watch Band 38mm 40mm 41mm 42mm 44mm 45mm 49mm iWatch Apple Watch Series Ultra 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 SE

49mm 45mm 41mm Bands Compatible with New Apple Watch Series 8 / Ultra (2022) &Series 7(2021)
44mm 40mm Bands Compatible with Apple Watch SE & Series 6 (2020)
44mm 40mm Bands Compatible with Apple Watch Series 5 (2019) & Series 4 (2018)
42mm 38mm Bands Compatible with Apple Watch Series 3 (2017) & Series 2 (2016) & Series 1 (2015)

Features:

Two Sizes: 38mm/40mm/41mm Size fits for 5.1"-7.1" (130mm-180mm) wrist; 42mm/44mm/45mm/49mm Size fits for 5.9" - 7.9" (150mm-200mm) wrist.

Package Included:

6 x Silicone Sport Band for Apple Watch (Apple Watch is Not Included)

reviews.content:
I‚Äôm allergic/sensitive to nickel. The Apple brand silicone band has a metal button that touches the skin, but it‚Äôs Apple so I figured they would use quality metal. Unfortunately my skin reacted to that band (Apple confirmed there is nickel in the snap).

Anyway, the folks that engineered this band got around that issue by simple ensuring the snap has no skin contact - it‚Äôs covered by silicone on the back. Genius! The material is comfortable, close to the Apple brand in feel and design. The closure has an extra loop so it feels even more secure. I have taken these swimming in the pool and ocean and so far they‚Äôre holding up and still look and feel nice.

My only complaint is that the components that fasten the bands to the watch are a bit inconsistent - some wiggle a bit when installed but others don‚Äôt. So far they all seem secure.

Overall, you can‚Äôt beat these bands for the price. They‚Äôre an improvement over the expensive name brand bands in many ways, especially for those with severe nickel sensitivities. If you‚Äôre on the fence, give these a shot.

I have an Apple Watch Series 8 GPS + Cellular 45mm. It came with a M/L band from Apple which ended up being too big for my wrist. After scouring the internet for a smaller band, I gave up and purchased these in BOTH sizes so that I could try BOTH on with the intention of returning one set.

Ultimately, YES - the 38/40/41 size band FITS a 45mm watch. There is a small gap on either side of the watch face/casing; however, this does NOT impact the wear, use, or functionality. I have been wearing the smaller band on my 45mm watch for 10+ days now and it hasn't budged - even with physical activity. The band remains securely locked in place to the watch. I will be keeping the 38/40/41 set for my 45mm watch.

The 42/44/45/49 size of course still fit my 45mm watch. These larger bands actually have MORE holes than the Apple band that came with the watch. I was able to secure it around my wrist - however, the "tail" on the band was REALLY long. Even with it tucked inside the band (how it's supposed to be worn), the tail still hit the actual watch casing and was not comfortable for me to wear. If I had to keep the 42/44/45/49 set, I would have ended up trimming the tails off.

I kept the 38/40/41 size set of bands and returned the 42/44/45/49 size bands. I have an Apple Watch Series 8 GPS + Cellular 45mm and am a female with SMALL wrists.

These are seriously amazing! They came in so fast after a previous order never came in at all. They are so comfortable compared to the bands you get with an Apple Watch, they aren‚Äôt so stiff and they don‚Äôt cut into my wrist bone like others tend to (I have very tiny skinny/bony wrist). They fit great and can mix and match colors for different holidays! Will definitely be ordering more in the near future!

My original Apple Watch band broke after 3 years. I read great reviews about these straps so decided to try them out as I really missed wearing my watch. I only wanted black - prefer simplicity and not changing straps but they‚Äôre value for money as one strap would cost üí≤6+. All colors in the set I chose are beautiful and I love them all. Best part is how easily the straps slide into (and out of)the face of watch, perfect width on sliding sides, and the velvety smooth texture. I‚Äôm so thankful for this product and I‚Äôm so happy I constantly admire my khaki green strap while at work today LOL. Thank you seller and amazon!

Very pleased with these bands. They are just a little bigger than the S/M band that originally came with my watch. I have a large wrist and do not like to wear a tight fit when wearing my watch. But even if you have a small wrist these bands will work perfectly.

The watch bands fit my Apple watch perfectly and was easy to change. The colors were as ordered and I was originally concerned about the security of it but I've been using it for a couple weeks and have had no problem with it coming loose. For the money you can't do better.

I‚Äôve got an Apple 8 series watch. The sport band comes close to fitting but are hard to put on. I have just over a 6‚Äù wrist and these bands can be adjusted to fit! It‚Äôs easy to slip on and comes in a great selection of colors AND it never slips to loosen. I‚Äôd recommend to anyone!

Although I‚Äôm not sure I like all the colors these bands are easy to put on than my Apple watchband and very comfortable. They are Reasonably priced and I do recommend them. After looking at the price of and Apple Watch these were def worth it.

My order was sent on time and the way they look in the picture is how they look in person. I like all of the watch bands and they are even prettier in person. Also it‚Äôs a comfortable fit to my wrist.
I have had them for maybe 2 weeks, and wear them daily. Very comfortable, easy close/ open. It‚Äôs what i was looking for. My husband also got a set and he likes his!

reviews.content:
July 8, 2022 - I admit i have stopped swapping them and when only charging via one part i stopped swapping ports (I wanted to test both of these and all four ports for review purposes due to all the "these are junk and caught fire" type of reviews) ... I think OVERALL i felt these get warm ...3 times maybe ... and on a scale of 1 to 10 (10 being "oh crap, this is a fire harzard and i need something to grab onto this before my room burns up") .... i think MAYBE i'd say a .50 out of 10 ... slighltly warm and within a minute of two of being unplugged it was not noticable and i USE THESE REGULARLY with different cords and devices ... almost daily with something i need to charge and NO PROBLEMS at all. I do have to mention those three times max was AT LEAST when the charger was plugged in 2+ hours and even with the same cord and device, and outlet and plugged into the same "port" ... it doesn't happen again for months ... so it's not like one bad cable or wall outlet is causing that RARE (.50 out of 10) "heating" issue ... IF i had any doubts i'd say it and not recommend these ... I forgot when i bought these but it's been months and I am still happy with these and not even questioning if they are safe

Feb 2022 Update: I fully admit i forgot when i orginally bought it and also i only may have swapped them ONCE since the last update ... still NOT getting burning hot like some reviews mention... still charging a-ok ... I may swap the ones I use regularly after typing this just as a test but just wanted to say months later and as someone who was concerned over the bad reviews ... everything is peachy here .. no problems at all and I do charge things at LEAST somewhat regularly

Update from Mid October: Swaping both of them just to see if there are any issues and everything is still a-ok.... the one point I want to make in this update is that I have said i have swapped ports and cables and devices, just to test things out ... I KNOW these are not "fast chargers" but I have charged things in both adapters with things plugged into each side and ... while I do have another OLD dual usb port wall charger (I got these as a backup, as so many things I own now need to be charged this way) ... the speed of which both items charge seem normal to me ... as advertised for those products and no issues afterwards.

The fire warnings from some negative reviews still worries me and just in case I only use them when i am right next to where they are so i could test (for heat) and/or yank them out fast ... but so far ... no issues or SIGNS Of issues of any kind

Update: Week 1 of October and I do use these regularly ... DUE TO the negative reviews I have been doing my best to switch cables (even if dont need to ... like different micro usb cables, different usb c cables ....etc) and even though i admit i have been forgetting (I charge thing REGULARLY) ... doing my best, to remember to switch not only chargers between the two ... but ports .... so far ... i think i have said this in my original review ... is not related to the cable or device specifically .. SOMETIMES (rare ... say 1 out of every .. oh 20 charges ... i am sort of making that up i admit) i feel a slight warmed to the charger only when it's plugged into the wall outlet.... say on a scale 1 to 10 ... 10 being "this is going to cause a fire"/"so hot i cant touch it" ... now I'd say ... a .25 maybe out of 10 ... barely a 1 .. .noticable when i do feel that but ... i cant say any other charger I have had, doesn't have the same thing happen.

i am concerned about any fire danger due to the reviews from others but ... so far my two .... have been A-OK for a few months now.

Also some 1 out of 5 reviews complain this is not a "fast" charger.... I KNEW THAT when I bought them. f you need a fast charger .... they are always more $$ then what looks the same but is a regular charger ... IF THAT Is what you need ... look for something like "supports QUalcomm fast charge technology" or something ... just "this chargers fast" in the general discription may be common even if its a regular charger (say 2-3 hours for devices on a regular charger but a fast charger could do it on 45minutes to 1 hour) ...some of the 1 out of 5 star reviews may have come from people that just didn't read what this charger could do .....

Update: It's now in the first week or so of September ... I admit I stopped (maybe i should start up again) switching between the two adapters and between each plug on each adapter as much as I was doing a few weeks back ... I am not sure i'd trust this (ONLY based on the bad reviews alone) leave this plugged in when I am not right next to them to yank them from the wall if there was an issue but ... STILL TO THIS DAY ... and many things being charged ... no problems at all and I cant remember what I was charging when the adapter got a little (say maybe ... oh a 1 ... 1.5 maybe out of 10 ... 10 "being a problem" .... but I have NOT noticed either adapter even getting slightly warm to any degree since then ... everything is a-ok so far

(Another Update ... less than 30 days ... though i forgot when i posted the update below) ... I am going back and forth between the two items and TRYING to remember to use both ports on each one ... so far NO funny sounds, i guess at times i'd say they'd get SLIGHLY warm when plugged into the wall (say a 1 out of 10 MAX .. enough to notice but BARELY enough to mention ... I JUST MENTION IT @ the reviews that say how hot theirs are .... and to be fair I dont mess with "possible fires" ... if i dont 100% trust these I will not use them again) .... SO FAR ... everything is a-ok and I do use them ALOT
-----
Update (still less than 30 days from purchase but with many different devices charged via usb c or micro-usb cable) SO far ... admitting some negative reviews say issues come up in say month 2 or a little after that ... everything is a-ok ... To address the "heat" problem i was worried about reading some reviews ... WHEN PLUGGED IN only ... on a scale from 1 to 10 ... 10 being "too hot to touch" ... the honest i have felt it got ... (and only SOMETIMES) would be when it was plugged in for awhile and it would be a ... 1.5 to a 2 MAX ... if that ... i leave it unplugged (due to those negative reviews and "mine caught fire") when i am not around if something bad happens... but ... having said that ... I dont worry too much about that when i am in the house .... these dont feel like the cheapest plastics made and probably POOR electronics on the inside .... I trust them or i'd never plug my stuff into them ... I just dont want to take a change, is all.

I'd recommend them so far even if i wish they'd offer say a 1pk for $4.50 or something (just got these as a backup to my one wall charger I 've had since 2013, that is still working great)

-----------
I have to preference that these are first impressions and while I have not checked the 4th port ... I have charged a few different devices already and tested both plugs and 3 out of the 4 total usb ports.

I am not going to open them up but they dont feel super cheap or anything ... smaller than my old white PowerGen 2.1A White charger from about 2013 (still have it and it works fine all these years later ... i just got these for a backup).

I am not going to say the are "SUPER high quality" or go overboard in anyway like that but the prongs seem normal and unlike some reviews I read in no way do they feel like they bend easy or fall out of outlets. I do know that some reviews mention things being fine for awhile and THEN issues start, but so far I have not seen or felt anything fishy. I DO NOT take chances with electricity being involved but with the few things I have charged .. neither adapter feels hot in any way (maybe say a .5 out of 10, when plugged in for awhile, but that is charging two devices and i say that is normal) ... also I do not hear any noise of any kind coming from the charger.

I will be SURE to update this review either way, as time goes on, but fearing a really cheap product and not wanting to mix that with electricity of course, so far ... I am pretty happy with my purchase ... I probably only needed one since my old charger still works, but ah well

I purchased these blocks to charge my 2 dog's bark collars. They are compact and work great. I can charge both at once from completely dead to fully charged in about 3 hours in the same block. My son uses the other block to charge his android phone. I am well pleased with this purchase. It arrived on time, packaged well, made well, and was very reasonable. I highly recommend to anyone needing a USB charger. In fact, I will probably purchase again as my son loses them often.

I really like these blocks.
The only thing I'll say is they get pretty hot if you're charging two things at once, & both devices will charge slow, but I feel like that's expected with that kind of load. They work great if you're only charging one thing.
The cord is well made and I love the fact it is so long. I keep it plugged in an extension cord and no fear of it being pulled out when I am using it six feet away

Built quality seems nice, premium even. Works as advertised. Not sure what else you can say about a USB Charger. Seems to charge my Samsung phone expediently. The 2-pack was a great value, but only time will tell if this was actually a good purchase. So far, no regrets.

3 stars functionally: 1 more for cuteness and multiple outputs.

Great for normal charging except does NOT work with wireless charger (bought from Amazon) of an iPhone 13

Does works well with older basic USB connector for Android, for USB C with a tablet, and a Fitbit

I received my order on time and both chargers tested good. The packaging was easy to open (unlike a hub that I bought from a store). Can't rate the durability since I haven't been using them for very long. Over all I think they are a good deal.
I like this because it cuts down on the number of blocks I need to plug into an outlet. It takes up less room in an outlet or extension cord.

I use one for the chargers for my two smartwatches (different cables), and one so my wife and granddaughter can both charge their phones at the same time on the island in the kitchen. These devices are working well for both purposes.

I travel quite a bit. This device allows me to bring along just one charging hub and a few USB cables.
It charges all my devices including my Apple products. In the past my iPad would not like some chargers but this one works fine.

name: Ecolution Patented Micro-Pop Microwave Popcorn Popper with Temperature Safe Glass, 3-in-1 Lid Measures Kernels and Melts Butter, Made Without BPA, Dishwasher Safe, 1.5-Quart, Red
description:
From the manufacturer
A Great Way to Enjoy Popcorn

The Micro-Pop microwave popcorn popper puts you back in control by offering a healthy way to make popcorn. Bagged popcorn is filled with harmful chemicals that can negatively affect you and your family. The Micro-Pop features a temperature safe borosilicate glass bowl that is safe to use. Just place your kernels in the bowl and microwave for a couple minutes for fresh, delicious popcorn.

Save Time, Money and the Landfill

Gone are the days of buying bagged popcorn with artificial flavors and colors. Save time by making less trips to the grocery store and save money by buying popcorn kernels in the jar vs. the pre-packaged popcorn. Using the Micro-Pop also helps our landfills by eliminating the wax-coated disposable bags from pre-bagged popcorn that can take a long time to decompose.

Easy to Clean

The Micro-Pop popcorn maker, lid and borosilicate glass bowl are dishwasher safe for fast and easy clean-up.

How to Make a Delicious Bowl of Popcorn Using the Micro-Pop Popcorn Popper

	

	

	




The lid serves as a convenient measuring tool for your kernels. For the 1.5 quart Micro-Pop, use one lid full of kernels for a bowl of popcorn. For the 3 quart Micro-Pops, use 2 lids full of kernels. You can also add less kernels to the bowl if you wish to enjoy a smaller amount of popcorn.

	

Drop the measured kernels into the bottom of the popper and place the lid on top to go in the microwave.

	

This step is entirely optional, but the perforated lid can be used to melt butter or margarine over your popcorn while it pops. The lid allows to butter to melt through the holes and distribute evenly over the kernels.

	

Please note that microwaves vary greatly. Make sure you are listening to the pops while your microwave is making the popcorn and stop the microwave once the pops get to be 2 seconds apart. Some microwaves may require more time, while others require less time.

A fast and easy way to make microwave popcorn.

Tips to getting your popcorn just right:

Not all microwaves work exactly the same, so play with the timing until you get it just right. Experiment a little- your microwave may cook the popcorn faster or slower than the 2:30-3:00 average! If your precious popcorn is getting burnt when adding butter prior to popping, try adding the butter after all those kernels have transformed into beautiful puffed popcorn.
Always use fresh popcorn kernels. Store your popcorn in an airtight container. Refrigeration is not recommended.
Stopping and starting your microwave during the cooking cycle is not recommended. Once you stop the microwave, the steam buildup in the center of the kernel, which causes the popcorn to pop, will cool off and never reach the desired temperature to re-pop. If you restart the microwave you also risk burning the already popped popcorn. Using the sound test is the best way to determine if your popcorn is done. If there are more than two full seconds between pops, it‚Äôs time to stop.

reviews.content:
When popping a half popper full (one cap full of corn), the kernels have plenty of room to bounce around and open up as they pop. When popping a full popper full (two caps full of corn) about half way through the popping cycle the popper is full and the remaining kernels can't move around so they don't expand fully. I found them packed so tightly in the popper that I had to dig them out with a long-handled spoon.

In addition, popcorn popped in a microwave with no oil is so dry that flavored salt will not stick to it. You will find all of your flavoring in the bottom of your bowl. I suppose you could lightly spray the popped corn with cooking oil spray and then add the salt. I truly haven't tried that. I have added real butter to the measuring cup on the popper and that works very well but not great for my weight.

As fast as this popper pops corn, I don't see that popping 2 half batches is really much of a downside. It is very easy to clean since both parts just drop into the dishwasher. That's why I give it a 4 out of 5.

I received the three-quart sized one as a Christmas present nearly a decade ago and loved it. However, after a few years our microwave broke and the new one I replaced it with was too small to fit the popper inside it. Anyway, fast-forward a few years later and I really missed eating popcorn as a light snack so I decided to purchase the smaller version of the other and I'm happy to report it works just as well as the larger one. I don't know how popcorn is this easy but it just seems to work. I know there are some other microwavable poppers available but I think the handle really makes this one worth it.

I ordered the small size Ecolution microwave popper in Teal. Love popcorn yet, I must watch cholesterol. This "air" MW popper is extremely easy to use, pops very good. Then pour it in a serving bowl. Perfect amount for one. My current popcorn seed is a rather old so, when I get fresh seed, I expect it to pop even better. I give it 4/5 stars cuz, honestly, a popper that was ALSO the serving dish would be 5-stars. But, this is so dang cute and I am very happy with it.

I needed to add more fiber to my diet so a daily snack of pop corn was on my list.
I like this product because it is glass and you can see what is going on in the micro wave.
It is easy to clean and the handle on it is great for removing the popper out of the micro.
It took me a few uses to get it to pop efficiently. I like to use a teaspoon of avocado oil to make my salt stick.
All in all I am very satisfied with this product.

Upgraded from the smaller one, which doesn't make much. Makes healthy popcorn, because you can use the amount and type of butter that is best for you. There is a fine line between done, which doesn't pop all the corn, and burnt.

This glass/microwaveable popcorn maker works well.....but this size is for passionate popcorn eaters/family sized popcorn sharing! We are a family of 2 and it's a little too big for the 2 of us for a movie night. The popcorn comes out of this popcorn maker a little dry, but perfect for adding the trendy popcorn salts/flavorings. It's super easy to clean and easy to use. Would recommend for hungry popcorn eaters!

Reminded me of a coffee pot
Small size is handy
Made popcorn well

I have purchased this popcorn popper three times. Two were purchased somewhere else so I was so happy to find this on Amazon. I broke two after many uses. I accidentally banged one on side of faucet when cleaning and the other chipped somehow. We use this with all different oils, and the butter feature. It makes delicious popcorn in 2 minutes, 25 seconds in my microwave. I had each of the last two for a very long time you just have to be a little careful like anything.

I like that the part that comes in contact with the corn is glass. It's easy to clean as no oil is needed. It makes just the right amount for me.
I didn't like the butter on top as it mainly seemed to plug the holes and was messy to clean. I instead spray some butter flavor cooking oil on the popcorn once it's done.
Cook timing is important because if it's too long the bottom kernals burn. I've found a minute 50 seconds seems about perfect for my microwave.
Overall I'm very happy with this popper.

First let me say I never leave reviews, but this product deserves one! I LOVE popcorn and was spending way too much money on LesserEvil so I thought I would give this a try and I found the perfect recipient! 1/3 cup of kernels, and a little salt with 1tbsp of coconut oil and throw it in the bowl. I added 1tbsp of butter on top and oh my gosh! The best popcorn!!!

aboutProductTopics.name: Make sure this fits by entering your model number.

FAST GOURMET POPCORN: Choose beautiful, durable temperature safe borosilicate glass for better popcorn popping experiences. No oil or butter needed. Hot air circulates preventing burning. Melt butter with the dual function lid for gourmet results. Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. A fun gift idea.

PREPARING AND SHARING: Great for a healthy snack, movie night, the big game or recipes including popcorn. Simply use the dual-function lid to measure the desired serving size, pour into the Micro-Pop and place in microwave for 3-minutes or less. Hundreds of fun and healthy snack recipe possibilities for your popcorn enjoyment.
MONEY WELL-SPENT: Make homemade popcorn as an alternative to buying expensive single use prepackaged bags containing unwanted chemicals, ingredients, and calories.

WHY GLASS IS BETTER: Watch your popcorn popping for perfect results. Temperature safe glass resists wear-and-tear and will not absorb acids or chemicals typically produced during use. Glass is made without BPA, hypoallergenic, and thermal shock resistant. Wide-mouth design and ergonomic handle add versatility and ease-of-use.

USE AND CARE: For use with microwaves with turntables only. Only use popcorn popper in a clean, fully functioning microwave oven with unrestricted, rotating turntable. Do not use popcorn button or setting on your microwave. Make sure to use fresh popcorn kernels.

description:
Product Description

reviews.content:
If you're reading this, we're probably still in the weird middle years of USB-C adoption and compatibility. If you are like me and have several USB-C devices and various cables with different capabilities (especially when it comes to charging devices), but still have a few USB-A ports to spare, this adapter does a couple really nice things:

1) It adapts your old ports to USB-C without losing any of their original functionality. This is nice for car ports and older machines that haven't moved entirely to USB-C. You can convert entirely to USB-C-to-whatever cables without having to worry about not being able to charge your phone when you're out in the world.

2) it actually expands charging capabilities for certain setups. I have some USB-C-to-USB-C or lightning cables that provide TOO MUCH power for certain devices. They just need 5 or 10w charging, but not every dock or device is smart enough to throttle power and leave you unable to charge your Airpods Pros unless you can find a low power port. Now I just keep one of these on a cable that's dedicated for low power charging.

This was exactly what I was looking for. I recently purchased IPhone 14 Pro, which did not come with a plug. It just came with the charging cable that doesn‚Äôt fit into my existing plug, nor did it work in my car. These adapters solved my problem, and work great! I had originally gone to Best Buy to find a solution because I wasn‚Äôt sure what I needed, and the associate knew what I was talking about and looked it up on his phone. He was disappointed that Best Buy didn‚Äôt carry the item, but he told me Amazon has it!

My son bought some Bluetooth headphones for gaming intended for use on a PS4. When they arrived, they were for PS5. They had a 2.4Ghz dongle that was usb c which the PS4 does not have. I bought these adapters so he could plug that dongle into the usb A on his PS4. This worked flawlessly.

Solid little performer; used often during a two week trip around PNW. Admittedly, it would have been nice to have a mesh bag or small plastic case to keep them in while traveling, but not a deal-breaker, per se. I'd recommend them to anyone trying to consolidate/eliminate the need for multiple charging cables while on a trip.

I'm not sure why it's so hard to find an adapter like this in the wild, but I needed one in a hurry and this came overnight to my doorstep. It did the job and prevented me having to buy another camera tethering cable when I realized at the last minute that I got the wrong one. Really thankful for this product and its quick shipping.
I bought a new iPad Air and the connections are a new type. These come in various colors and connect the new connections to the older USB plug. I bought everything to match my new purple iPad.

Technology is always changing...and it's hard to keep up. This little adapter helps those of us who just haven't transferred every device to USB-C..yet. It's great to help you keep your old chargers for the new wave of change! Get one...you won't regret it and trust me...you'll need it!

I have a few high-quality USB-A connector charging units that I didn't want to throw out just because some of my more recent tech items (fitness trackers, smart watch, etc.) are coming with USB-C connectors on them now. I use these adapters so that I can continue to use these slow charging devices on my older multi-port chargers. Seem to work fine for this use. I'm not sure you'd want to connect high-power charging USB-C devices with these kind of adapters, you may not get the results you think.

This adapter is just what I needed for a bridge between my new phone with a USB c connector and my old style USB connectors. I use it to charge my phone in the car and to transfer photos from my phone to my computer.

Ever get stuck not having the correct connection due to so many different phones, laptops and other electronic item's ? Reduce the issues of being able to use or charge by having good quality adaptors within reach.

You can easily hook up any USB-C peripherals (USB Type-C cable, USB Type-C flash drive, USB Type-C hub) that make use of the newer USB-C connector.
This adapter offers data transfer speeds of up to 480 Mbps between connected devices and also supports up to 2 Amps of power output for charging your devices. Enjoy the fast and safe charging.
Our aluminum-alloy-bodied dongle occupies very little space and can plug directly onto the end of your USB-A hardware, so you won‚Äôt have to worry about carrying it around.

name: Ferilinso [3+3 Pack] for Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max Privacy Screen Protector Tempered Glass Accessories 3 Pack 9H Anti Spy Privacy Screen for iPhone 14 Pro Max 3 Pack Camera lens Protector
description: Product Description

reviews.content:
The Ferilinso Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 Pro Max is a popular option for those looking to protect their device's screen. Made with high-quality tempered glass, this screen protector boasts 9H hardness, providing excellent protection against scratches, impacts, and drops.

The product is advertised as being easy to install with no bubbles, and it comes with a cleaning kit that includes an alcohol pad, a microfiber cloth, and a dust remover. The screen protector is also designed to be ultra-thin, so it won't affect the touch sensitivity or the clarity of the screen.

Based on online reviews, customers generally seem to be happy with the Ferilinso screen protector. Many have commented that it is indeed easy to install and provides good protection without sacrificing the touch sensitivity or clarity of the screen. Some have also mentioned that the screen protector has saved their phone from damage after a fall or impact.

Overall, the Ferilinso Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 Pro Max seems to be a decent option for those looking for a screen protector that provides good protection without sacrificing the touch sensitivity or clarity of the screen.

It's always so exciting to get a new phone, but the headache comes when you realize you need a case and a screen protector and a camera lens protector and it's all just kinda overwhelming. Not only because options are usually somewhat slim, but also because there aren't ever that many reviews yet! So how are we supposed to know if it's a good product? Well, I guess we just have to cross our fingers and hope for the best. Which is what I did with this purchase. At the time of my order, there were 12 reviews, all 5 stars and they seemed really legitimate. This seemed like a better option than going with another brand that just keeps the same reviews from last year's item and changes the title to this year's model. With that said, I couldn't be happier with this purchase. Actually, I could, but it's something super minor and I'll get into that later. For now, I want to mention all of the great things I've noticed about these screen and lens protectors. First, I love how even though the top looks like it's cut out for the camera, it's actually not on the finished product. It's a smooth covering that's fully protected. It's just that those areas don't have the 'privacy' glass like the rest of it does. It's a nice fit for the iPhone 14, although I do think it is just a hair too small. With a case, it doesn't bother me though, as the gap between the case and the edge of the protector is minimal and I can't really feel it unless I'm trying to. The lens protector was a huge surprise to me. I didn't think I'd really care if it were there or not, but now I'm absolutely thrilled to have it! I always had such a hard time keeping my lenses clean and free of nicks and dents around them, but now I don't have to worry about that at all. It's a flat surface all the way across, so a quick wipe with whatever cloth is nearby means my photos will be clear. It also feels really nice to the touch versus having to deal with those clunky ugly lenses. It's definitely something I didn't know I needed in my life and I'm so glad it was included in this kit! I suppose it would be nice if there were color options for the black rings, but that's a petty ask and it doesn't really matter. The fact that the kit comes with 3 of everything is such a huge bonus. The glass feels durable and not too bendy. I'm also noticing way less fingerprints and smudges on my screen than usual! It's smooth and feels really natural to use.

The one and only real thing I would change is the overall 'privacy' aspect of it. While I don't really have anything to hide, I always hate that feeling of someone seeing what I'm up to on my own phone. This protector does what it needs to, but I could use a tad more privacy. Even at a 45 degree angle, it's still possible to see what's on the screen, it just makes it a little blurry. At an almost 90 degree angle, it's fully blurry, but you can still make out shapes and colors. The only true way to hide your screen from curious eyes is to turn the brightness down as low as you can handle it.

The last thing I want to mention is the customer service. Upon purchasing, I received a message from the seller to make sure I ordered the right item for the iPhone I have. I had, so there was no issue, but they also included some useful tips on how to install the protectors and offered assistance should I need it. In my entire existence as an Amazon customer, I have never received any message like that from any other seller. It really made me feel like they care about their product and their users. It was such a lovely touch and I wish more companies/sellers would do the same.

My best friend has been getting on me about how I just leave my iPhones naked without any protection from me dropping them ‚Äî I‚Äôm what he likes to call ‚Äúa cluts.‚Äù

So, I finally upgraded my phone to a 14 Pro and I absolutely LOVE. Since this phone is expensive, I decided to look into getting some quality protection to keep it safe from unexpected accidents.

Finding a protective screen that‚Äôs also built for privacy has been HARD. All of the stores were sold out, and I honestly didn‚Äôt want to spend $30 on a Belkin one. Nothing on Belkin; their products are really great quality. Just couldn‚Äôt justify it in my mind when I knew there were equally great and more affordable options.

Which brings me to my review: these are a PERFECT option for someone who wants a privacy screen that‚Äôs affordable, easy to install, actually works, and is easy to see through.

It comes with extra screens for the phone and cameras, plus everything you need to install them üò©üôåüèΩ AND at a fraction of the cost of a Belkin one that only comes with 1?! A steal.

If you‚Äôre wondering whether you should buy or not. Def just buy it ‚Äî totally worth the expense imo.

At first I wasn't a huge fan of this product. The privacy screen is okay, it's not bad, but not as private as my previous screen protector (different company). I couldn't fine one for iPhone 14 though from the other company, so I figured I'd try this one after reading a lot of reviews. Secondly, all three camera lens covers all came off within less than 24hrs of putting each one on, and wouldn't stick again. I didn't ask for a refund because I still used the privacy screen protector though, and I ended up just ordering camera lens covers from a different company on Amazon which have stayed on since day one of using them. However, after less than a month of having this phone it somehow managed to fall and hit a large screw that happened to be sticking straight out of the ground. I picked it up and saw a chunk dug into the protector and cracks all over. I wasn't sure how my screen was doing, so I peeled off the protector. My phone screen was completely fine! I went home and used a second screen protector that was in the package, because now I know this product is great since I've experienced it for myself. The protector did it's job, and I'm very happy. I'm only leaving three stars for the adhesion portion of this review simply because, while the screen protector adhered well, the lens covers did not.

I have real problem installing these face covers for devices. I have difficult time minimizing the the trapped air pockets. However, this product aided me tremendously in eliminating air pockets during application of this screen cover. I think it‚Äôs the jig supplied with the screen cover. It helps to go You Tube to see the process of installing this particular screen cover. The anti spy characteristics built into the screen is great. I had my wife take close up positions on different sides of me to test if someone could peek at you making phone entries. It would difficult and obvious to the user. Great product, works for me, based on my experiences this product has earned my recommendation.

I've had a privacy screen protector before from another brand and i think it works just as great. I have a iphone 14 pro max which is a big screen. Even though im mindlessly scrolling or reading comics on it, still dont want others to just see what im doing on my phone easily, which makes these privacy screens perfect. What i liked best about this was the easy installation and added camera protections that the other brand did not have. What made this easy to install was that they provide a tool that allows you to align it perfectly (its the orange plastic thing shown in the pictures). After that, it was simple to push out the couple of air-bubbles.

I was very skeptical at first. This being my first purchase of a privacy screen protector. The products work great and so their job. But I would suggested putting on the screen protector first. Then your case. Then the camera protector in that order because when I tried to put on my case After my camera protector was on. It completely shattered the lower right corner.
Ive also gotten a scratch on screen protector. Not sure if it‚Äôs advertised as scratch resistant. But it isn‚Äôt. No cracks yet. About 2 weeks in.

This screen protector is great so far. The privacy filter works well but if your brightness is turned all the way up you can still see. My biggest frustration would be that I wish it would have come with a set of paper instructions on steps to take. The instructions were on clear plastic containing the cloth and the as extremely hard to read. Otherwise it is 100% great!

I bought a privacy screen for my son at the Apple Store, paid $50. Then I saw this on Amazon and thought I'd give it a try. Should have tried this first and saved my money. It came with two screens so I gave my husband one. Basically saving myself $90. These work just as good as the Apple ones (Belkin is the brand they sell at Apple). I definitely recommend this product.

It made my screen considerably darker when looking at it straight on. I‚Äôve never messed with any of the privacy screen protectors but with my job now sometimes there‚Äôs people all up in my personal space which I don‚Äôt have a problem with it‚Äôs only when I grab my phone I don‚Äôt anybody checking out my flow so I‚Äôll see if I keep it on after a few days. But it works the way it says so there‚Äôs that.

name: Crayola Super Tips Marker Set (100 Count), Washable Markers, Kids Gifts for Girls & Boys
description:
From the manufacturer

	

	



Crayola SuperTips Markers

Ensure your budding artist has the perfect colors for drawing and coloring with Crayola SuperTips Markers! This marker pack provides a full spectrum of colors so you can find the perfect shade for every project.

	
Versatile Art Markers

With uniquely designed conical tips, Crayola Super Tips can create both thick and thin lines. Perfect for coloring, drawing, and hand lettering, these marker tips give kids better control of their creativity!

	
Great Kids Art Supplies

Parents and kids alike will love these vibrant markers! Outfitted with bold, washable inks, SuperTips are perfect for carefree coloring. Stray marks and smears wash easily from hands and washable clothing. Perfect for artists ages 3 and up!

reviews.content: I love these markers. They‚Äôre exactly what I needed. I write on my teacher board each week with dollar tree markers and they would die before I finished writing. To give an example, I only write one small fact on a piece of paper. I use 6 sheets of paper. So very little writing. I purchased these markers in hopes that they would last longer. They‚Äôre lasting MUCH longer and they write beautifully. With the other markers, some times it was difficult to read what was written because it would bleed so much. These markers are great and write so clearly. I‚Äôm glad it wasn‚Äôt my handwriting that was the issue with the dollar tree ones. Ha!

I bought these for bullet journaling so I had access to more colors to add as accents for the brush pens I already own. I know some people try to use them as brunsh pen substitutes in themselves, but I don't recommend it with how quick the tip wears down.

The Pros:
‚Ä¢They are so cheap. So. Cheap. They could be absolute garbage and only work for a day but honestly I would still recommend them for how cheap they are
‚Ä¢Huge color variety! I did go to college for painting so I (not to toot my own horn) have a good eye for distinguishing color other folks might not. I appreciate having some colors that are close but one is warmer while the other is cooler, which does happen a bit.
‚Ä¢The tips are, in fact, super! Very pointy to start out and the broad side is the perfect width perfect for highlighting. It is slightly thinner than the average 6cm dot grid found in most bullet journals
‚Ä¢The back end of the marker is marked with the cap color, too, so you can't get the colors mixed up by putting the wrong cap on a marker
‚Ä¢Surprisingly smudge resistant! Not smudge proof, but they don't smudge under other markers and they don't smudge pens more than expected (looking at you, Stabilo Boss) under them. They dry fast, so you also won't smudge them running your hand over them for the most part
‚Ä¢They start out feeling very juicy, but not in a way that pools on the paper. You can get some good depth and variation in color in one stroke by varying pressure and speed.
‚Ä¢Theyre buildable! Not blendable, but they dry quickly so can create 3 or so different shades without a problem on the paper (Rhodia 80gsm) I've been using

Cons (which I will again emphasize are sort of less relevant because these were $15 at my time of purchase and would have to be worse than garbage for me to not recommend):

‚Ä¢The biggest one for me, honestly, is that I can't organize them in the box!! This might not bother other folks and some of you may have marker stands, but I don't and this bothers the hell out of me! They're kept in the box by four smaller boxes which fit two rows of 13/12 markers, which means there's tons of room for the markers to wiggle everywhere as you're taking them out and putting them back in. This matters especially because...
‚Ä¢They are only visually marked by color, not with any number or label. I tried using a Permanent Pilot Twin Marker to label them after I put them in rainbow order, but they are slick and it rubbed off immediately
‚Ä¢They wear down in time. I set aside a handful of markers each month as one months color palette for my bullet journal, and after one month, the colors I heavily relied on have lost their tip and don't have much "endurance" meaning I can write and draw with them, but it doesn't take much until they get less ink and I have to set them aside and wait a minute. None have completely dried out on me in the couple of months I've had them, though
‚Ä¢There are no true pastels! Good on Crayola for making nice and saturated markers, but there isn't anything that serves as a gentle highlight I can use
‚Ä¢There are, of course, still some gaps in the colors.
‚Ä¢The caps are hard to post on the ends sometimes. None have cracked so far, but it doesn't seem out of the realm of possibility
‚Ä¢Not good to use with a water brush. They're surprisingly water resistant (which is generally a good thing!) So if you're looking for blendable markers you can carry with you for travel water color painting, they are not it
‚Ä¢They will wear down so fast if you try to apply pressure and use them like a brush pen. Which is fine if that's what you're using them for! They still last enough to be worth it in my eyes. But after 3 or 4 uses you will find your upstrokes get thick and the bottom of your downstrokes don't have that nice deeper color.
‚Ä¢It is hard to get a smooth color if you're actually coloring with them. This is a general complaint of most water based markers, though. They're really not mush worse than my expensive Tombows in that.

Again, though, my gripes are incredible overshadowed by how cheap they are. I gave them five starts not because they're perfect, but because they are so cheap they do not have to be.

When I saw this set, I knew I wanted it for my Bible journaling, esepcially after seeing the price. This is a very good deal for 100 colors. I love using Supertips for highlighting verses in my Bible and in my journals.
Cant go wrong with Crayola

Got these markers for my granddaughter. She absolutely loves them and they have encouraged her artistic abilities ten fold. There are soooo many colors and they are packed in an awesome giant crayola crayon box lol. She loves them and they are washable and very easy for small hands to use. Great product great price

I got this for my daughter, to be honest they‚Äôre just fine. Three of them arrived broken from the tip, and most of them are low on ink.. I‚Äôm keeping them but I will definitely not be buying again.

This is the quality Crayola marker that I usually buy as the set of 50 x 2. I was actually hoping Crayola markers had taken 100 of their crayon colors and made markers but this wasn't the case. I'm guessing it's for the artist who uses the same colors and needs the duplicate when the same 50 run out.
Excelente producto y env√≠o gracias a Amazon.

LOVE. THESE. They say they are for kids, but I use them all the time. Amazing for calligraphy, huge color selection (more than lots of expensive brands), SUPER CHEAP (It costs an arm and a leg to buy 100 Tombow Brush Pens), and super good quality! These are so beautifully pigmented. These are great for all ages. Even if you aren‚Äôt an artist, you should get these for some therapeutic drawing or coloring (if you have/get a coloring book). YOU NEED THESE! :)

I thought I did my homework and read this product does not bleed. But it does. That was one of the many reasons I bought this product. At least this product is washable, and it comes in 100 different colors which my granddaughter absolutely loved. I do recommend but be aware it does bleed through coloring sheets

reviews.content:
This is a ream of Hammermill-branded Sylvamo paper in A4 size, which is the standard *most* of the world uses but the U.S. does not. I buy A4 because I happen to like the size. Anyhow...

I have no real issues with what I received; however, as can be seen from the photos, the ream package was pretty significantly torn open. I left it in the outer clear plastic wrapper so there would be no question this was the condition in which I received it. It's hard to say if this happened at the seller's location or due to shipping, but nevertheless the package was *not* flawless.

In the process of writing this review, I have now opened the package, and the paper seems fine. No damage. I'll put it at the top of the stack I've got since it's now pretty much "open".

I'm not upset over this; I have plenty of prior experience in printshops handling paper, and so it's not going to be a problem and won't go to waste. These things happen.

I'd still do business with this seller again.

I recently purchased the Hammermill Printer Paper and I am extremely happy with my purchase. The paper is a perfect weight for printing documents, at 20 lbs it is sturdy enough to withstand multiple prints without tearing or jamming in the printer. The 92 brightness makes the text and images on my documents look crisp and clear, and the 8.5 x 11 size fits perfectly in my printer.

I also appreciate that this package includes 3 reams, which means I have a nice supply of paper on hand for all my printing needs. The price is also very reasonable for the quantity and quality of paper that you receive.

Overall, I would highly recommend the Hammermill Printer Paper to anyone in need of high-quality copy paper. It has exceeded my expectations and has become my go-to choice for all my printing needs.
GREAT PRICE FOR THE PAPER FOR PRINTING!
It‚Äôs easy to work with. Not many paper jams. Great price for all the paper you get. I‚Äôll keep buying it.
I have had problems with HP paper sticking together when it feeds thru the printer. Absolutely no problems with this paper.
Have used this brand for several years. Copies come out clean and clear.
Good quality paper
It was the 20lb I always use. It work fine..
The paper is good quality, the ink adheres to the paper (no bleeding) works...
It's exactly what it says it is

reviews.content: I like how dark the privacy screen is and somewhat blurs out at a angle so people can‚Äôt be nosey looking at your phone. The screen is very clear when it‚Äôs facing you. The only tricky part is aligning the facial recognition and front camera since there isn‚Äôt a cut out for it on the screen protector and your phone won‚Äôt unlock if that part is smudged but other than that I like it

As the ad states there are 2 screen covers and camera lens covers inside the box. Also included are the cleaning agents and cloth to help ensure a good fit. The screen and camera covers fit perfect and makes for an unnoticeable good look. I might suggest you practice aligning the screen cover in place before pulling the backing off. The instructions made the job a snap. Can't beat it....life time guaranteed... would recommend!

Initially I was very impressed with packaging & instructions. Very nice & easy to put on my iph XR, no difficulty with no bubbles, screen responds well with screen protector in place. However, after I was all happy that it was so easy‚Ä¶it‚Äôs about 2 mm smaller than my screen, iph Xr (fits within the black digital frame, but I need the screen covered completely). I just can‚Äôt go through the hassle of trying to take the screen protector off, & wait for the right size. So I‚Äôll keep, maybe they‚Äôll fit the iph X. Does provide privacy though.

These are privacy screen protectors but not as durable as others I‚Äôve tried. I wouldn‚Äôt say that I‚Äôm a clumsy person, but I do happen to drop my phone sometimes. I‚Äôve found that these cracked a lot faster than the ones I get from Five Below.

Have you been in a spot where you don't need anyone looking at your phone screen? Sitting down in a public place and want to look at your girls naughty pics on your phone? Texting someone your not supposed to be texting? Riding home on the subway or bus and wanna look at porn ? Then these are for you. No one cause look to see what is on your phone while you're using it and keeps the screen for getting scratches to. Trying to film a session with your girl and she gets rough with those fingernails, well if you have these in your phone she can't scratch it all up. So when you go to sell your phone after she gets ahold of it and goes thru it and see what you've been doing , you can get more money out of a scratch free phone than one that has been thru everything. If any of this sounds like you or close to it then you Need these on your phone. *** Helps protect the screen and gives you privacy***

This screen protector does everything it lists. Has good quality, has good privacy angles, and was pretty easy to install. The only thing keeping me from giving a full 5 stars is the way the screen lifts up and forms air bubbles when I press the volume button. Also, the bottom left corner doesn‚Äôt seem to want to get rid of a giant air bubble but that‚Äôll go away eventually. Overall, it‚Äôs a good screen protector for its price.
I ordered the screen protector a few days ago. So far, everything is going well. I would need some time to test the durability
This not the first one I have purchased. It is a very good phone for the price.

I love that instructions came written on the box itself inside, which eliminated all need for extra paper. It had the 3 tempered glasses, the cloth, the guide stickers and of course alcohol pads to clean. All were used. Unfortunately I had a bit of trouble getting it on properly but it still sticks even after being reapplied a couple times. Plus the black out effect is great. I would definitely recommend.

I just put it on and so far so good, my only complaint is that there‚Äôs a border for the speaker and front camera that doesn‚Äôt go to the top so it cuts into the viewing space. Small issue, but annoying.

reviews.content:
I was shocked with the quality & performance of this cleaner!!
It works not only in the car, but on TV and computer screens, WINDOWS!!! ( never a streak), and is safe for cleaning my special tinted windows in my sunroom. Normal glass cleaner would damage them over time.
Excellent purchase & I will continue to enjoy purchasing additional products from this company ongoing!!

I‚Äôm now a fan of this brand. I like it better than other car cleaners I‚Äôve used. The scent is light and clean and doesn‚Äôt linger for too long. I purchased this item along with their leather cleaner and conditioner. All 3 scents combined were amazing. The leather conditioner scent is what stays and smells great. As far as this cleaner, I used it on all the surfaces of my car except for the leather. Cleaned the windows, mirrors, and the touchscreen well. I used it on the doors and overall I enjoyed using this product. I recommend and will continue to purchase.

I can‚Äôt speak for using this product on a heavily soiled interior as I am not hard on my cars.

I never come on here to do reviews but I just got this yesterday and it was so good I had to come give a review. I have been neglecting my car for over a year and i bought a couple things from this brand recently and they all have a been great but this product was so amazing and worked so well I almost used the entire thing in one use I wiped down ever possible service with it lol I am about to order another one because it was that good! Buy this and you won‚Äôt regret it!!
I very pleased with how well this worked on the used Impala I just purchased. She was really dirty but this stuff worked great and now she really looks and smells great!
Saw this stuff on Amazon and figured I‚Äôd give it a whirl. Did a great job all over my car including whatever sticky one of my kids spilled, dust, and the windows. Smells amazing too!
Spray on let sit for a minute or two and wipe off, super easy.

I asked my new car dealer what they recommend for cleaning the interior of my new car, this is what the recommended. Works fantastic!

Pleasant scent and leaves surfaces clean and streak free.

name: Amazon Basics Slim, Velvet, Non-Slip Suit Clothes Hangers, Black/Silver - Pack of 30
description:
From the manufacturer
Amazon Basics Slim, Velvet, Non-Slip Clothes Suit Hangers
Slim, Velvet-Coated Hangers

Available in multiple styles and colors, the hangers are sturdy enough for shirts, dresses, blazers and pants as well as heavier pieces like coats.

Non-Slip Support

Featuring metal hooks and a textured velvet coating, the hangers keep items in place and reduce slippage.

Everyday Use

Lightweight and versatile for everyday use, the hangers offer long-lasting strength as well as functional design. Multiple pack sizes available.

Rounded Edges & Notches

These hangers feature smooth, rounded edges to prevent clothing from becoming misshapen as well as notches to keep shoulder straps in place.

reviews.content: These were some of the most affordable hangers I could find, period. For them to also be velvet/felt and low profile was just cherries on the cake. You can fit 2-3x the amount of hangers in the same space with these vs plastic. Plus, spaghetti strap shirts and cold shoulder shirts don‚Äôt just slide off of them. My new closet does not have doors so I appreciate that these look nice. It helps make things look a bit more put-together and intentional. I appreciate that these did not come in tons of plastic packaging. A simple cardboard wrap on each set and that was it. 10/10 or I guess 5 Stars, haha. I highly recommend these.

I have been slowly replacing all my hangers with these over the past couple years and have no regrets. None of them are shedding like other people have said one or two may have broke but out of the 500 plus that I've bought I can live with those numbers. They're not for hanging heavy coats or things like that but they do exactly what they're supposed to do and they have saved a tremendous amount of space in my closet.

I keep getting these and the matching ones with a bar. They look great in my closet and save a ton of space since they're thin. I like this shape as it better fits the shoulders of my shirts and doesn't stretch out sweaters the way others do. I like that I can twist them around, too. I've had a few of the metal hooks crack off but not many--mostly while moving or if I accidentally step on it/exert force the wrong way. I haven't noticed any velvet shedding or transferring color even when I use them while steaming clothes for wear, but some of them do pick up a bit of lint or fuzz. Not a serious issue and probably would be easy to clean off if I bothered.

Pros: clothes don't slip
thin profile, as thin wire hangers, but studier, so more clothes fit on a rail than standard plastic or
wood hangers
doesn't create large "peaks" on shoulders of shirts
clothes don't slide off hangers

Cons: slightly more difficult to put clothes on and take off hangers.

These hangers are much nicer than any standard plastic or wire hanger I've ever used. They are not as sturdy as quality wood hangers but take up much less profile space, so more clothes fit in the same space. Since the "body" of the hanger is covered with felt, clothes don't slide off and get misplaced in the bottom of the closet.
I feel the only negative thing is that it is slightly difficult to take clothes off a hanger and much more difficult to put on a hanger. The felt has increased friction on the fabric, making it difficult to keep the article smooth and wrinkle free.
I replaced all of my plastic hangers with these and now I can fit so much more in my closet! I love the velvet‚Ä¶it keeps my shirts and dresses from sliding off the hanger.

I like these hangers. They're thin, sturdy, and pretty. Best of all, the heads swivel.

I'm a very particular person when it comes to my clothes. I like them all to be facing one direction. So when my fiancee used to hang my shirts backwards the opposite direction, I would take them off and re hang them. With these, I can just turn the heads.

One thing, I don't like so much about them, is the felt like material that allows the clothes to be held onto the hanger, also makes it difficult to put a shirt on it. I guess this is an inevitable effect. It's not the biggest deal, it's just a minor nuisance. So I won't deduct a star.

Overall, really good value for your money. Would recommend.

Good price for a lot of hangers, they are light colored so I thought they could be stained easily, but they don't stain and the felt does not come off easily so they stay and look nice for a long time. Had mine for over a year and no stains or torn felt!
These are great hangers! I was looking for a large bundle pack in the Ivory color and these are very sturdy and durable for a great price!

These Amazon Basics Slim hangers are sturdy and nice looking. Their surface is non-slip, so you can hang pants or skirts on the bottom and place tops across the wide, narrow shoulders.

They're quite slim and take up very little space in your closet. This is ideal for small apartments, hall coat closets, mobile homes, etc.

I bought these as additional hangers for guests. I've been using the older ones for the past four years and am quite pleased with them.
Finally got rid of all the old plastic and in with the felt. Keeps shirts hung. No snags. No dimples in clothes. Love them.
