reviews.content:
I'm 5'7" and I weight around 120lbs. This seat cushion is perfect for my needs. I hurt my tailbone area from prolonged sitting in my Corsair gaming chair. I was using a cheap (and very flat) pillow temporarily while I healed up. However, I needed more support than that - as you can imagine.

I received this cushion, and it was wrapped in a sealed, plastic bag. There was a faint smell for a couple of minutes after taking the bag off, but that was it. I posted a picture here of what it looks like on my small to mid-size chair for comparison.

The cushion may seem firm at first, but after sitting on it for a while it will "break in." I think anyone that is heavyset or has a very "wide" frame will probably be the ones to complain about this cushion. Unfortunately, there isn't a one-size-fits-all when it comes to orthopedic seat cushions like this.

I aggravated my lower back / tailbone a while back and have had episodes of discomfort and pain while working from home. The normal stretching, ice, heating etc. just wasn't cutting it as i was needing to sit for 8 hours a day. I came across this product and decided to give it a try. Since purchasing i have not regretted it once. As soon as I got the item i left it outside as suggested to air out and then started using it. Within 1 day i could feel the pressure relief within my back / tailbone and within a few days of using this product and doing the other mentioned remedies i was able to get back to normal. I would 100% recommend this to anyone who sits for 8+ hours a day and has minor-medium lower back/tailbone discomfort and pain

Pros
- Very comfortable (soft enough to sit on, yet sturdy enough to still be firm)
- stays in place and does not slide around in the seat of the chair

Cons
- The only con is the foam smell, but that is pretty normal and does go away / lessen over time (especially if you allow it to air out as recommended)

Overall I do like this seat cushion but do have some issues. I needed a cushion for my office computer chair to make sitting long hours more comfortable. I do not have pain or back issues to deal with. What I found is that the cushion is great at first but after sitting for long hours it starts to flatten out. I have to get up and try and make it unflatten. So far it still has flattened out and not at its original depth and thickness. I left it overnight to see if it would conform to original size but it does not. So maybe my personal preference is that I want a high cushion that stays full and does not flatten, but maybe that is a wrong perception of a cushion. I have a memory foam pillow that I put underneath the cushion and this helps keep it work better by adding more thickness and depth. Well it works but I am not happy with the flattening out of the cushion. I keep it because yes it does its job but not as good as I thought it would. I am giving it a 4 star rating because my preference and expectations may be different from other buyers.

The first week using the cushion did not improve with my Sciatica pain. In fact it made it worst, but I wanted to give it the benefit of doubt first. After that first week it began to improve on the pain relief and continues to do so up to a reasonable point. As one who sits at an office desk 5 days a week, this cushion has turned out to be a real benefit for me personally.
I only give it 4 stars instead of 5, because I believe it is just a bit on the small side. If Comfilife would add an inch on the overall diameter it would have far better comfort in my opinion. I'm not a large obese person, so I am pretty certain that I don't have a large a$$.

This cushion is GREAT! It does not however work as good as I'd hoped for my fractured tailbone. I have to sit further back on it for relief if it's on a flat surface. Just road 6 hours though the past two days in a van whose seats were slanted downward in the back so the cushion worked extremely well. GREAT CUSHION though and love the removable zippered cover so it can be washed. Grateful to have it even if it's not perfect 100% of the time.

I‚Äôve been using this product for a couple of weeks now and I wish I‚Äôd bought it years ago! My back hurts less, which is good, but not what I bought it for, if you get my drift, and yes, it helps with ‚Äúthat‚Äù condition, too! Hallelujah! If you‚Äôre on the fence (and I don‚Äôt recommend that) about buying this, buy it! It also has a lifetime warranty, so what do you have to lose? Make your butt happy!

Purchased as I have been working from home since the pandemic. Very uncomfortablely I might add. Make shift desk and chair. Chair from the dinning room with a wood seat. This cushion is saving my butt and makes the day go by quickly. I am now nice and comfortable. I originally ordered one for my dad who lost a lot of weight due to age. He loved so much, I ordered one for myself. If your on the fence, don't think twice, just order.

I had previously purchased a similar memory foam cushion as I was working from home sitting on a metal card table chair which gets quite uncomfortable quite quickly. The previous one felt good at first but compressed completely where I could still feel the metal chair.
I was and am still very impressed with this one. It is thicker and more dense so it does not compress all the way down. It offers good support and has the perfect recess for the tail bone. My only complaint is that the front edge is square and after some time, you can feel that edge on the back of your legs. I would recommend the only improvement that could be made to this cushion would be to mold a "waterfall" edge to the front (rounded). Then I would give it 5 stars.

Got this for my husband who drives roll off dumpster trucks and he says it‚Äôs been making a huge difference he says the gap takes pressure off his tail bone and back it‚Äôs been a little over 2 months and it‚Äôs still comfy he‚Äôs 5‚Äô9 & about 200lbs if that helps anyone

It is a well made cushion but it is very hard. I have been using it for over a week and it is still not conforming to my sitting position and is causing issues with other pressure points. I just wish it was softer.

name: Dr. Brown‚Äôs Natural Flow¬Æ Anti-Colic Options+‚Ñ¢ Narrow Baby Bottles 8 oz/250 mL, with Level 1 Slow Flow Nipple, 4 Pack, 0m+
description: From the manufacturer

reviews.content:
Dr Brown‚Äôs bottles, in general, are great!! Each one, however, is slightly different and overall I prefer the Options, even though my baby is not old enough to use valve-less. I have the original (terrible at spills, because the white cap in the shape of a top hat, sort of, doesn‚Äôt stop any liquid at all; they have clear bottles, blue tubies, and whitish valves). I have 4oz blue Options (great, easy parts, thumb print on the lid is awesome for popping that sucker off, and the lid also has these bumps that line up with the nipple, where it slows down the leaking of liquids, and keeps the leak in the cap, although given the ease of taking the cap off, it can still get really messy). (Sorry for the run on sentences, I‚Äôm a sleep deprived mama!!) I have the 4oz pink Options (similar to the blue, but actually the valve fits very snuggly along with the tubey part into the bottle, so that can be handy when trying to put the bottle together or add formula, while also holding a baby - more stable than any of the other bottles, where the tubey/valve pieces are just loose kind of sitting on top of the bottle; similar cap as the blue, but no thumb print, and harder to get the cap off, especially one handed). Lastly, I have the 8oz Options with plain bottles and with the Dream/Adventure and Animal characters, all with the green valves and tubies, and the similar cap to the blue, except they are clear, thumbprint included! These have been great, and the animal characters are super cute; the ‚Äòdream big‚Äô and ‚Äòadventure awaits‚Äô are cute-meh. The only thing I was disappointed in that set, is that half the bottles had characters, and half were plain. I may be off on the count, because I bought two sets, but I remember being bummed that I paid a premium for cuteness, and didn‚Äôt get a full set of cuteness! I do not own, but have used some purple wide bottles that I was loaned while traveling. That was great, so I wouldn‚Äôt have to carry a bunch of bottles, but I wouldn‚Äôt/didn‚Äôt buy them; they‚Äôre just too wide for my taste, harder to handle, especially one handed, and I didn‚Äôt feel the wide nipple was significantly better for my baby girl. I will address two of the main two complaints I‚Äôve seen about Dr. Brown‚Äôs: leaking and too many parts to clean! Leaking, yes, totally a thing, but it does in fact say on the bottle to only fill to X line to avoid leaking! Having said that, it is very hard for my brain to perfectly calculate how much water I need for the formula, where I don‚Äôt end up exceeding the volume specified on ghe bottle! I personally don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a huge issue. I know it‚Äôs going to or probably will, leak, given the liquid in the bottle, and what I do is to keep a cloth or bib under the bottle when she first starts drinking, and after the liquid is down a bit, I just open the bottle up and pull the valve/tubey piece up a bit, and several big drops come flying down the side of the bottle, which I just wipe off with the same bib/cloth. I can immediately get the bottle put back together before my daughter complains too terribly much. Remember, this is only an issue when you‚Äôre filling the entire bottle, either 4oz or 8, so at that point the baby is a bit older and can hopefully handle the briefest of pauses without too much of an issue. If my daughter were the type to go full on nuclear melt down, I think I would probably have to be more diligent about staying under the line, and offering more milk, once the bottle‚Äôs finished, and a fuller belly is less likely to melt down. Ok, regarding too many parts to clean... there‚Äôs what? Two extra parts that other bottles don‚Äôt have? Meh. But I will totally recommend getting the Dr Brown‚Äôs dishwasher baskets!!! Oh. Dude. Awesome sauce, life-saving, yes. I am very green, sustainable oreinted, so I cringe at how much water I‚Äôm consuming running the dishwasher sometimes every day. So not cool. And, I‚Äôm also a sole parent, so I gots a lot to take care of, dishwashy basket is a must!! I have 4. : 0 ) I‚Äôm not a super fan of washing the nipples in the dishwasher, so I still do those by hand, no biggy. There‚Äôs even special baskets for just nipples; someone gave them to me, but no, I no likey since it looks like there‚Äôs still a film on the inside.
My experience with Dr Brown‚Äôs bottles in general, has been awesome! I don‚Äôt even remember when I sorta stopped burping my baby (she‚Äôs six months now), it just happened organically over time, but when I was burping her (maybe for three months?), she would only have one, maybe two burps. She burps on her own now, but then maybe that‚Äôs just her, the point is that there was very little gas! She had a wee bit of reflux as a newborn, but that‚Äôs normal I think, what with having an immature gut as a tadpole-baby. I gave her probiotics and kept her upright-ish, and I think the bottles helped. Ultimately, I totally recommend them!! They were recommended to me by my sister, 8 years ago, as my nephew‚Äôs salvation, hope they work for you!

I was a first-time mom of twin boys. They were in the NICU for a couple of days and they were intubated. People recommended that we use these bottles and every website we searched also had Dr. Brown as one of the best bottle brands. Let me tell you that they were right. My twins never suffered from colic or has problems sucking from the bottle. As my boys got bigger, I would just change the nipples. They even sell a nipple to help them get started on sippy cups, which works. I highly recommend this brand for new moms and moms that are looking for the perfect bottle.

I‚Äôm exclusively breastfeeding. Now that my baby is approaching 4 months I‚Äôm giving baby this bottle when I need to go somewhere and baby takes it no problem. Plus this nipple shape is most similar to mom‚Äôs nipple unlike other trendy bottles and therefore doesn't interfere with baby‚Äôs latch. It also helps baby‚Äôs oral motor skills according to my friend who is a baby speech pathologist. (:

I bought these for my granddaughter. She was getting hiccups and had a lot of excess gas and spitting up from regular bottles. These bottles have alleviated gas and spitting up and she hardly ever gets hiccups after eating now. Highly recommend these bottles. And they are so cute.

My granddaughter loves to gulp her milk then puke. Not no more with these bottles. I'm having trouble with one of the nipples. It's sucked in and.sideways and the white piece that screws in doesn't want to go on right
Work great without the extra gas fighting pieces but even better with them! Grandson used from newborn to toddler stages and they're the best!
I love Dr. Browns anti colic bottles and been using these bottles for years for their the only bottles my kids seem to love I definitely recommend and it‚Äôs a must have for your baby essential needs

Not sure why some people say these leak or leave a negative review. My reflux baby does the best drinking from these bottles. Minimal to no reflux, and the bottles do not leak! I just place all of the parts in the dishwasher (minus the nipples) and dry them in the Dr Browns bottle sterilizer.
My baby loves it. People complain about washing the parts but I have a sterilizer/dryer unit that makes using these bottles no problem

Not sure why some people say these leak or leave a negative review. My reflux baby does the best drinking from these bottles. Minimal to no reflux, and the bottles do not leak! I just place all of the parts in the dishwasher (minus the nipples) and dry them in the Dr Browns bottle sterilizer. These are the only bottles we use. Don‚Äôt hesitate to buy them - they are great!

reviews.content: These wipers were half the price as in an auto parts store. They were delivered quickly and were easy to install. I can turn them on with the dry windshield, and they make no noise. In the rain they are far superior to what was on my 2012 Ford F150 4x4. Great produce better price....

My windshield is over 20 years old. I hadgiven up on getting any wipers to clean it 100% with all the micro pits in it. In just one use, I see perfectly clearly in the rain for the first time in decades.

Can‚Äôt beat receiving car accessories right to your door without having to go into an automotive store. I Googled what size I needed for my car type and ordered them up. They work great and were easy to install. Price was the same as Walmart or Target. No downside to buying this product. Will order again.
Exact same product sold in big box stores, but a few dollars cheaper online, than in store. Have no complaints thusfar. Wipers work and fit fine for my 2015 Ram 1500.

These are so physically and emotionally PAINFUL to install. I needed to watch a whole video and it was still unclear. I was helped by people in the comments.

RainX needs to leave BOTH adapters loose in the pack. Getting the first off and then adding back the second was a nightmare. One came off easily, the other took 20 min and a screwdriver (and preying I didn't break them. My hands hurt so bad. I had to use leather gloves to pull and push on the sharp metal parts.

Then there was actually figuring out how to get it on the hook. I got there eventually but I think I spent 45 min on all this! Now that they're on they are working way better than my old warped set. I still see a dash of streaking but it goes away almost immediately. Hopefully won't be a big deal.

Hot tip: before you throw away your old wipers, swipe the squeegee down with rubbing alcohol over and over until the cloth becomes clean. So much gunk will come off and they'll work way better. The gunk adds to the streaks.

I have had my Mercedes for 33 years and these are the first wiper blades that have worked and are quiet.
Will buy again when needed and for all my other vehicles.
In the southeast where rain can frequently be a deluge, I must have a wiper blade that can handle the elements. Uniform across the visual fields in clearing the windshield.

They are great blades. The one issue I had with them was the passenger side short blade. The correct blade side for the Hyundai Elantra Sport is 26" for Drivers Side but 14" for the passenger side. I had to redo the connector so that I could use the 16" Blade. In the future I will order the 2 blades seperate that way I will be able to get the correct fit.
Went to my local auto parts store and the price was double what I paid here. Great product as well for your money.
Fairly easy to install. It does what it‚Äôs supposed to. I will buy it again when I need to replace my blades.

reviews.content: These are definitely for a fast eating baby. If you turn the bottle to where the milk is in the nipple, it will leak. Sometimes if the bottle is very full, tipping it results in it squirting a line of formula across wherever it‚Äôs aimed. If she‚Äôs upset while eating, I have to tip it back so that it doesn‚Äôt spill in her mouth while she cries, otherwise she‚Äôs likely to choke. But I keep it in her mouth until she‚Äôs ready to drink again, because she‚Äôs still hungry even if she‚Äôs grumpy. You just have to make sure to tell any other people who will be feeding using this nipple that they have to be careful because it will leak into the babies mouth regardless of if they‚Äôre drinking or not. No other complaints though.

My newborn was having trouble the the regular slow flow nipples. Feedings were taking a long time bc I would have to pace her. Milk was always spilling from her mouth, she would cough, and get hiccups. I got these to use on the parents choice standard neck bottles and they fit perfectly and have helped tremendously with feedings. The flow of these nipples really is slower.

Baby was born 41 weeks, 8.5lb.. So definitely not a preemie by definition, but my lactation nurse suggested using this nipple tip for the first few weeks to slow the flow of milk and reduce spit ups. By 3 weeks, we have upgraded to the "1" nipples that come on most standard bottles (like Dr. Brown's). Not sure if we needed to use these, but they certainly didn't hurt anything.

we just switched from the ready-to-feed formula to milk powder for my baby. Previously we used size 4 and it was great. But size 4 is too small for the milk powder, so we bought this Y-cut nipple, but it actually does not work for my baby, he has difficulty sucking the milk out from the bottle.

I love Dr browns products and these are no exception. We started with the preemie nipples from the hospital and have just kept going up! They definitely help, are easy to clean and not a bad price for how many you get. Will continue to buy again and again

My daughter was really fussing at the bottle so we decided to size up her bottle nipples. Almost immediately she stopped pulling and fighting us at every feeding. These are a good quality and have been holding up well.

We bought Dr. Brown's bottles that came with size 1, 2, and 3 nipples. It was too much for my baby that she chokes while eating, kinda like drowning sometimes and the milk leaks on the sides of her mouth. I bought the Preemie nipples and they are so much better!

We have been using Dr. Browns since my baby was 3 months old. At 9 months I started exclusively pumping. These nipples helped reduce the amount of time it took for my bay to drink all his milk.

Pros :
- easy to clean
- reduces feeding time
- small and compact nipples

Cons :
- can easily lose the nipple
- doesn‚Äôt come with white screw bottle lid
- will leak if holding bottle upside down

We are using these with our full term newborn while we try to get her to learn to breastfeed after a tongue tie snipping, so that she doesn't get used to a too fast flow. Really happy with these. She has to suck to get the milk out, whereas the bigger nipples allow milk to flow through without sucking.
Perfect flow rate for what I needed thank you for a great product

My great nephew loved this basketball set!
Great value, good durability and fun, fun, fun. I bought this for a gift. It was hard to find elsewhere.

reviews.content: I've only just received these so I will update later as far as durability and longevity but as far as how they work now right out of the box I'd say they are fantastic! Each automatic grinder uses 6 AAA batteries. I don't mind that at all. More power to grind with. I set the both of them down to the finest setting and I'm using them for happy belly black peppercorns (fantastic by the way) and my Colimo sea salt. They are working great for both. I had traditional grinders that were very nice but during a recent arthritis and gout flare up in my hand, I was totally unable to use them because my hand was in fact was useless. These automatic grinders solve that problem. As long as I have one hand that I'm able to use, I'm golden because these are fully automatic and begin to grind as soon as you turn them upside down. The light turns on and it starts grinding. As soon as you you turn it upright again, it stops... Genius. I love them so far. I will update after several months of daily use. The glass containers hold a nice amount of peppercorns, salt or spices! The LED light is kind of pointless and it's blue which is really weird but I don't hold it against these because they work so great! üòä üëç

I really enjoy having both a salt and pepper grinder. Some of my brines require a lot of ground pepper, and I prefer to use fresh ground. I haven't used this for a big brine yet, but for every-day uses, they're pretty good.

They do have one major flaw, and that would be the LED lights. The lights on these grinders are a clear, and perfect example of the failure of communication with R&D. It is pretty obvious whoever thought these high beam headlights were a good idea, never actually used them on food.

Between the color of the light, and the intensity level, it's nearly impossible to actually see the amount of pepper you're applying.

General aviation airplane landing light - yes.
S&P grinder light - no.

Other than the mild sunburn I get from them each time I use them, I love everything else about them.

I'm pretty savvy with small electronics. I will be disassembling these to deactivate the lights. They're really not needed.

I was able to have some fun with these and I was glad to finally have fresh cracked pepper. I bought these in black - they‚Äôre very attractive. At the same time, I got some multicolored peppercorns and grey Celtic sea salt to fill them with. Once filled, they didn‚Äôt just add taste to my food; they also looked good in the kitchen. Worked well out of the box. I think these also have various fineness of grind which I haven‚Äôt looked into yet because I‚Äôm good with the grind size as is.

I have used these for about 3 months now. These are pretty handy little grinders. They get the job done and have a great battery life. They turn on when inverted and off when placed in upright position. They are a little awkward to hold until you get used to them but that is mostly because the weight is at the top where the battery is. They do a pretty good grind and I am overall satisfied with this product.

We bought the salt and pepper grinders to grind our own coarse salt and fresh pepper. Works great. I was kind of surprised that they each required 6 AAA batteries, but then I suppose that it does take more power to grind out the salt and pepper. Just cleaned them up last evening and added the salt and pepper to the grinders. It looks good and feels good when handling them.

Beware! The set requires TWELVE AAA batteries (six in each). But, they so worth it!! They are much easier to operate than my twist-to-dispense old set. Just turn them upside down and return to upright position when the automatic grinder has distributed the amount of salt or pepper you need. You only need one hand. They are very attractive too. Highly recommend you buy a set!

What I like most about these is that they're electronic and automatic. There is NO off/on button - just simply turn the grinder upside down and it goes to work! Great to have and use without taking up 2 hands to manually grind. Be prepared that each grinder requires 6 AAA batteries (not included).

What I like least about these is that it grinds our salt very fast - so if you're not careful, you'll get a whole lot all at once. However, it grinds our pepper relatively slow. At first we thought maybe the shakers were specific to salt and pepper and we had them backwards but we swapped the containers and got the same result. Either way, not a deal breaker. We'll keep the grinders but just have to be aware of the difference when using them.

I seriously can't figure out if it's me, the user or if it's the product. I can't give this a 5. I can though what they ask for... easy to use, easy to hold, and ergonomics. The 4 over all were given due to the fact I want to buy many of these and just put a different herb in each. Yet I can't since even the rock salt size falls through the opening before it's even crushed. Again, if I figure this out, I'll buy more and give the full 5 ratings; till then, this is what I can give.

These salt and pepper grinders will not disappoint you. I bought the Himalayan pink salt for one grinder and the whole kernel black pepper for the other grinder. They grind up both perfectly. They are very attractive sitting on my kitchen counter stove top as well. I got the black ones and I love them. The only downside is they require six AAA batteries in each one so don't forget to order a 12 pack of batteries. I don't know how long the batteries will last but I imagine it will be quite a while.

After regretting my purchase of the rainbow steel manual grinders (different company) because I can't get them to work, I found these.
They work amazingly! Love the adjustable grind coarseness, easy to use, less cross contamination while working with raw meats because you can use one hand!
Hope the batteries last for a while since it takes 6 AAA (each!!). Only time will tell.
So far they are top notch.

„ÄêAutomatic Operation„ÄëOur electric Pepper Grinder with Gravity sensor switch, you even needn‚Äôt to press a button, Simply flipped the grinder and you will have fresh ground spices, Convenient and funny. Battery powered, each grinder requires 6 AAA batteries (batteries not included).

„ÄêAdjustable Grinder„Äë Many grinding levels for your choice allows you to grinder your spices from coarse to fine. Electric pepper grinder use a high-quality ceramic rotor. You can choose the coarseness of your spice, salt or pepper by turning adjustment knob at the head of the grinder.

„ÄêWide Applicability„ÄëThe electric grinder is suitable for pepper, salt and other solid grain seasonings. Battery powered, convenient and fast, you can use it anytime and anywhere. This grinder is the good helper for kitchens, restaurants, parties and outdoor picnics.

„ÄêUnique Design„ÄëTransparent acrylic material(BPA-FREE) at the bottom allows you to see the remaining spices and convenient to distinguish the spices in the grinder. With the blue LED light, blue light is not only bright but also gentle, you can easily to see amount of pepper, salt and other grain you put in your food.

„Äê200% Quality & Money Back„Äë100 days free replacement & money back if any dissatisfaction. If you find that the mill does not work after the product arrives , it is generally the case that the ceramic grinding core is stuck with granules. In this case, please turn the top button to adjust the coarseness to the coarsest state, so that the particles blocked inside the ceramic grinding core will fall out, and then it can be used normally.

name: Camco TastePURE RV/Marine Water Filter | Features Flexible Hose Protector | Reduces Bad Taste, Odor, Chlorine, and Sediment with a 20-Micron Sediment Filter | (40043)
description:
From the manufacturer
Greatly Reduces Bad Taste, Odors, Chlorine and Sediment in Drinking Water

Camco's TastePURE Water Filter reduces bad taste, odor, chlorine and sediment in drinking water. Connect the TastePURE Water Filter to your drinking water safe hose for safer, cleaner water.

Removes aluminum, bad taste, cadmium, heavy metals, hydrogen sulfide, iron, lead, mercury, odor, and turbidity

The TastePURE Water Filter attaches to any standard water or garden hose connection.

Compatibility and Uses

Use this product at campsites to keep sediment out of your RV water tank and to improve the taste and smell of your drinking water for a whole season. Use it in the garden for reduced-chlorine watering and when washing your car to reduce mineral deposit spots. Excellent for filling up your pool or hot tub, home brewing, boating and marine use.

Key Features:
Durable Activated Carbon Filter
20 Micron Fiber Barrier
Wide Body Design For a Higher Flow Rate
Quick and Easy Installation
No Assembly Required
In-line Design Streamlines Water Flow
KDF Helps Prevent The Growth of Fungus, Bacteria and Mold in the Filter When Not In Use
Removes Aluminum, Cadmium, Heavy Metals, Hydrogen Sulfide, Iron, Lead, Mercury, Odor and Turbidity
Safe Water Matters

	

	



Multiple Uses In Various Locations

Can be used inline between your RV or trailer and water hose, at campsites, and even when cleaning your vehicle or gardening!

	
Flexible Hose Protector Helps Ensure Smooth Water Flow

Simply attach flexible hose protector to use along with your water filter. Flexible hose protector helps prevents water hose from kinking that could impede water flow.

	
Lasts All Camping Season

Camco's TastePURE water filter lasts through the entirety of your camping season.

Safer, Cleaner, Fresher-Tasting Water

	

	

	



Flexible Hose Protector Reduces Water Hose Strain

The Flexible Hose Protector with Gripper by Camco, eliminates hose crimping at the faucet. This hose protector comes with an easy gripper for effortless attachment to the faucet.

	
Easy to Hook Up

Can be attached to any standard gardening or water hose to provide healthier drinking water and cleaner water overall. Ideal for outdoor and recreational use. Perfect for gardening, planting, and farming.

	
GAC and KDF Filter Removes Carbon and Prevents Bacteria, Fungus and Mold Growth

Our filter uses a KDF Fluid Treatment to remove chemicals that give unpleasant odors and tastes to water. KDF also prevents the growth of fungus, bacteria and mold when the filter is not in use. When first attaching the filter to your water source, allow the water to run free for a few minutes to flush the initial loose carbon out of the filter. When the water runs clear, the filter is ready for use!

	
Wide Body Inline Design Increases Flow Rate

Camco's TastePURE water filter attaches to your water hose, for easy, quick access to cleaner, great-tasting drinking water. Our water filter stays aligned with your water hose during use and has a wide body for higher capacity and flow rate!

reviews.content:
There‚Äôs an upside & a down side to buying this filter & most likely all others like it. It‚Äôs easy to install, ( make sure you use a pressure regulator when using it ) you hook it up to water source, let the water run till it‚Äôs no longer black water ( from the charcoal inside the filter) then hook up to your rv , boat , etc.
I will say the water tastes amazing ! However, your filter won‚Äôt last long if it‚Äôs the only source for your faucet, shower & toilet, so be sure to keep this in mind . I used it for our city water hook up. The water wasn‚Äôt bad before the filter, I could drink as is, but I wanted to see if it made any difference & it did. Also, and here‚Äôs why I call it a double edge sword, once the filter is used up, it puts out a nasty, vial taste and smell in your water ! I guess that‚Äôs their alert for you need to replace your filter ? I took the filter off and did not replace it and the water was no longer nasty & vial. I‚Äôm sure in places where the water is disgusting , it would make a big difference. I will most likely keep one on hand for that sole purpose when ever I‚Äôm traveling. What I think would be more helpful, is if they made filters that hooked on to your kitchen faucets. That way you aren‚Äôt wasting filtered water on flushing the toilet or shower.

I love this filter! I‚Äôm new to RVing and I noticed all the neighbors have this on their water supply so I researched it and I knew I needed one! I immediately noticed the chlorine smell was gone. I use bottled water but I occasionally run out and I hated using tap water because of the toxins it contains. I also worried about giving it to my dogs to drink. The installation was a breeze but there were no instructions that mentioned the black water that comes out at first. I was alarmed but I found their website and read that it‚Äôs carbon from the filter and it isn‚Äôt harmful. I made my first pot of coffee this morning (without my regular dread) and it was far better than regular tap water! The only thing that I don‚Äôt like is that it leaked from the water source. It comes with a rubber ring but it didn‚Äôt work for me. Luckily I had others on hand and now it doesn‚Äôt leak. Best purchase I‚Äôve made in a very long time!

While you can spend hundreds of dollars more, this easy to use filter does the job.

I've been using this filter and replacing them annually for 5 years now and I've never had a water clogging issue.

The Camco filter really cleans my RVs water. I am so glad I found Camco it works great for filtering all the smells, bad tastes, and sediment out of the water coming into the RV. I find it easy to attach to the water supply. I am concerned about the water not only for me but for my two kitties. Great product.

Camco has been my go to for all of my camping and RV supply needs and they don‚Äôt fall short with this water filter. I love the extra adapter that they throw in with it, it makes it easier to place your filter and gives you a little wiggle room to work with. It seems like Camco filters more harmful pollutants than other filters, as it says on their packaging. I have also noticed that my water does not smell like city water when using the Camco water filter, and that will keep me coming back to Camco for all of my camping and RV needs.

I have found this filter to be very good, I do not know how long it will take before being clogged, I am sure that will be based on how clean my water sources are. I use it in RV parks for my motor home. Run the water about 5 minutes through your filter before using the water to insure all the carbon/ charcoal that may be loose from the manufacture of item is washed out.
Does a great job , makes a huge difference in water quality
I purchased the filter for the clean water in my RV. Works great and is easy to install.

I started using this filter this past fall as I noticed my brand new in March of ‚Äò22 water heater anode was completely destroyed from the poor quality campsite water supply from various Oklahoma campgrounds. Kinda made me think about the showers me and the family had been taking! Thank goodness we only drank bottled water. Immediately noticed the showers made our skin feel better and the shampoo lathered better. This filter also comes with a faucet to filter flex hose, and the filter has a flow arrow to make sure you know water flow direction.
This seems to be the go to for carbon filtering of water when camping.

reviews.content: The pen is great! The battery lasts long and is almost like an actual click pen when you click the top to turn it on. The pen writes really smoothly and there‚Äôs no lag compared to an actual Apple pen. The only complaint I would have is that the tip can get unscrewed sometimes and when it‚Äôs loose the pen writes a bit spotty but just screw the tip back on and it‚Äôs great! They even gave extra tips in case you lose one or think it‚Äôs starting to write dull.

I am thrilled with my stylus pen. Easy to use, my mini IPad recognized it with no problem. It‚Äôs not heavy, good quality, the on and on is only a small touch on the top of the stylus. It adheres perfectly to my mini IPad. I was helping my granddaughter with a school project and I was able to draw a picture on my mini IPad using the stylus and it turned out great. I then shared the drawing to her IPad and she loved it. I definitely recommend it and the price is good. I got the white one, which is less expensive too.

Unless you‚Äôre an artist, do not spend the money on an Apple Pencil. This pencil is PERFECT and at a fraction of the cost! I love this pencil so much and I can‚Äôt stop raving about it. No wonder it has over 80k reviews!!!! A friend of mine gifted me an Apple Pencil earlier this week. Upon further inspection, it was a first gen pencil and I need a second gen pencil. I couldn‚Äôt exchange it because he didn‚Äôt get it at the Apple Store (I think he got it on the Zon, lol) so I sold it to a friend of mine for $80. New one was 100 so she got a discount, and I can use the money toward the pencil that was compatible with my iPad. You know what? I‚Äôm seriously debating going to Apple and getting it. This pen works pretty awesomely for me. I think I‚Äôll just keep what I have.

Great gift too!! I love it.

I wanted a stylus/pencil for my iPad mini 6, but wasn't sure I wanted to pay the price of an iPencil, or Apple Pencil. After reading reviews on this one, I decided to try it out. I think it works great, and at a much cheaper price. The accuracy is good, writes very well. Super easy to hold. I don't use it for hours at a time, so the battery has lasted very long of me.

Got me a new iPad, needed a stylus to take advantage of all it can do! An Apple Pencil is OVER $100 and I was not about to pay that much. This thing is great! Works perfectly and stays charged for a long time. The only problem I have is that I misplace it often and have resorted to keeping it on my fridge when I'm not using it.

I love this stylus! It looks just like an Apple Pencil but is even easier to charge and less than half the price. I‚Äôve been using it for about a week on my 2018 iPad and it works amazing. I use to take notes mainly but it also works to just navigate around the iPad. Super easy to connect and it automatically connects every time. Sometimes it does turn off but all you have to do it tap the top it‚Äôs very easy. I bought a case for the iPad that has a holder and it fits great. Only wish is that it showed battery percentage somewhere. I‚Äôve charged it a few times and it‚Äôs never died but I don‚Äôt known how long the charge lasts for. Not a big problem though. Highly recommend as an amazing Apple Pencil dupe.

One of the selling points for me aside the ratings and amount of reviews was the usage time (20 hours of continous usage & 365 standby). But now that I rec‚Äôd the package and read the short manual it states only 10 hours of continous usage. See photo for a snapshot of manual that comes w/stylus. Just FYI ..

It‚Äôs definitely cheaper than investing in an Apple Pen. I think this pen is great. I‚Äôm not sure how long the battery lasts, but it definitely lasts at least a full two days. Depending how often you use it. I use to to draw. By the way there‚Äôs this app called Sketch for the IPad and iPhone. You can use with this pen. Just have to pay a one time fee of 1.99. You get unlimited colors. To sum up what I‚Äôm trying to say, is buy this pen if you are the artistic type or just want to write with a pen. It‚Äôs a good starter for those who don‚Äôt know if they‚Äôll use it. Definitely before you buy an Apple pen.

Bought this to use with my iPad for notetaking. It works really well and has a long battery life, but it's a bit loud for note taking during classes / meetings. I even tried replacing the tip, but that didn't help. Still much more economic than the Apple Pencil, so I'm not upset

Seems to work just fine. Had ordered an Apple Pencil that was DOA and decided to go with something like this that has a status light and a physical charging port. It doesn‚Äôt have the detailed features of the Apple Pencil but I don‚Äôt use it for digital drawing.

reviews.content: I ordered one set of these and I‚Äôm already thinking about ordering more! I use them in my fridge, the store, various things and in my pantry. I love how they stack and nestle so you could do either or depending on how you turn them. I think they would be great to use in other rooms of my home, and I need to invest in more very soon! It‚Äôs wonderful that they‚Äôre clear and you can see the items easily inside.

Bought 2 sets of these -- 16 total. Sturdy, slight texture at the bottom for stability, and, best of all, no logo. Clear plastic and the handles are fantastic for a small fridge so you can pull out the box easily for access. A box can hold around 8 cans of conventional soda or sparkling water, and more if they're skinnier cans or glass bottles.

One of the 16 did come cracked, but still usable so I'm not majorly miffed. Most likely due to transit? These are also stackable when empty, but they stick a little when stacked -- kind of a pain, but again, not a big deal.

I use these to store my breast milk and they work perfect! Only downfall which isn‚Äôt to the product itself but to get the most of the product you have to freeze you breast milk bags flat then put into the storage container otherwise you can‚Äôt fit many bags it the containers.
My fridge was a mess! I had no idea what was even in there. Using the organizers, they fit 3 to a shelf and hold my fruit, yogurts, my husbands meds, and my coldcuts. Love them!
Love these, I highly recommend. Wish they were a little longer to fill the shelf but the trays are light weight and sturdy.

These HOOJO Refrigerator Organizer Bins are awesome! It's like having extra drawers, but so much easier! We love that they are clear plastic making it extremely easy to search. I'm contemplating getting a set for canned goods in my pantry. Love, love,love them!

One of eight of my bins was broken at the handle. I didn‚Äôt discover this until I got to the last bin. I had already placed seven in my fridge and pantry. I like the bins, but wonder how long they will last
Love these organizers! Sick of my fridge being a mess. This is easy to use and helps to organize. Also it has handles so that I can pull a bin out and it‚Äôs easy to access. Love them.
If you need organization in your life....Buy these!! They work great to help the chaos in the fridge. Easy to clean and a wonderful value!
Las compre por error, pense que erabn mas grades, pero son magnificas y si es el tamano que requieres, son perfectas.

reviews.content: First, this works!! It‚Äôs my second purchase after 4 years. I‚Äôve developed butter fingers in recent years and seem to drop my phone frequently. I have a case for the back and this product for screen protection in the front. With all the drops on my hardwood floors, there‚Äôs been no issues. But this past week, I dropped the phone face down on my natural stone tile floors and the only damage was two cracks to this screen protector. Phone is left flawless! I‚Äôm telling you, this product is worth it‚Äôs weight in gold!!!

Easy to use, works like a charm. This was a replacement for a screen that I had for about two years but which got chipped up a couple of times. It did what it was supposed to do, protect the actual screen on the phone. So, spending $5 for two protector replacements was a no brainer.
I love these beefy tabs to help line up the position of the glass. They were wide and long to wrap securely. Install was a breeze with the directions. So far the glass performs well. Will buy again.

I am absolutely horrible at dropping my phone. I love my Apple, but as we all know those screens are really great at scratching or cracking with the smallest bump. These screen protectors have saved my phone screen from cracking and scratching on multiple occasions. They are easy to apply and, unlike a lot of screen protectors, they don't get a lot of bubbles in between the screen and the screen protector when applying. This makes for better and clearer viewing over the months of use you'll get out of just one screen protector.
We‚Äôve ordered these for all of our phones over the past 4ish years and they NEVER have disappointed! Through drops, kids handling, etc., our phone screen have stayed protected!
Great product and price point. I like how easy these are to install on my phone screen to protect it. The protector shatters but my screen has not when it is dropped.

I've bought many of these screen protectors, and you probably have too if you've been using cell phones for a while. They shouldn't be super complicated to make, but some are better than others. JETtech has been among the most reliable, in my experience. It's important that they give you more than 2, because while installation isn't difficult, I've found no perfect way to ensure that zero specks of dust attach to the phone screen or the sticky side just before you pop the protector on the phone. It can happen. Usually the bubbles that they form will come out in a day or two, but if you can't live with the result, it's important to have a backup and still one left over when you need to replace it.

As for the "tempered glass" part, I don't know whether any of these brands really has tempered glass in them; they all feel like thin plastic to me. But they do help to protect against scratches and cracks. I have a good case on my iPhone and have dropped it many times, even screen side down, and the combination of the case edges (which extend beyond the phone) and the screen protectors almost always holds. Sometimes the screen protector gets faint cracks in it not long after installation, but only if I've dropped it hard. I figure the cracks are in the screen protector rather than my phone screen, so while I need to replace the protector, it's a small price to pay.

JETtech is one of my go-to brands.
Great value! Great price and has done a great job protecting my phone screen! I‚Äôve used this brand almost a year and while I‚Äôve cracked several screen protectors my screen has stayed intact!
I dont even leave reviews. But both protectors came with their own fiber cloth and cleaning wipe. Thats good if u ask me
Serves my needs came with great instructions and the video online and is a two pack. I would purchase again.

aboutProductTopics.name: (NOTE: Due to the round edge of iPhone 11 and iPhone XR, the screen protector will NOT cover the full screen, only the flat area)

Extremely high hardness: resists scratches up to 9H (harder than a knife). High response and high transparency
Dust-free, fingerprint-free, one-push super easily installation, bubble free
Retail package includes: tempered glass screen protector, cleaning cloth, dust removal stick, instructions, customer service card

reviews.content: I have tried the cheaper knock-offs and keep coming back to the original. I do a lot of ink drawings and honestly, there is no comparison. Don't waste your money on the cheapies - get the original Sharpie and you will save money in the long run.

All have worked straight out of the box. Dark lines like I expect from a new marker. I keep one in the household pen jar, several in my craft area, and one in my purse. It's my preferred marker for sticky notes and writing in cards.

I work in veterinary medicine, and these are my absolute favorite pens! They work well on everything from labeling IV catheters to inventorying pharmacy. They have a nice, fine tip that makes it easy to write details in a small space and still have it legible. If you work in vet med, these are a MUST for your nursing pouch!
Their size fits comfortably in ones hand; write and draw consistent lines.
Works good and good value

So I use transparent sticky notes (or tracing paper) to annotate my books- since the material is slick not every pen works on it. Sharpie Ultra Fine Tip markers are the way to go. They dry fast and don‚Äôt smear! I have tested other colors (Mystic Gem) and those work too
Great product, works wonderful!! I use them every day! Doesn't smear on most surfaces, and the writing lasts, doesn't fade!
Writes well but bleeds through on everything!
Awesome price
These are my favorite markers to use for almost any project!

reviews.content:
I tried several mobile phone holders for my car. Common problem with all of them was that there was insufficient suction so the holder would fall off in hot or cold climates.

Vanmass car phone holder has been holding on well. Plus this also has the lowest price of all the previous holder I purchased.

I've seen all my friends and family STRUGGLE with car mounts and buying my first one was terrifying because I was scared I was gonna get one that didn't work! This one is AMAZING! It was SO easy to install and the directions are easy to read. I have never had my phone fall out of this even when slamming on my breaks to avoid a deer/getting rear-ended by a drunk driver. I now have it in my second vehicle because I couldn't part with it. I literally pried it off the dash of my old car (which was SUPER hard to do btw) and put it in my new car lol. It's extremely adjustable and gets the job done. Enough said.

*****Update-Feb 8th, 2023****
Before editing this review again, I was thinking, "How can I find a single element that adequately expresses all aspects of a phone mount?"

Approximately 3 years ago, after having the pleasure of contacting VANMASS customer service about the suction cup temperature issue, I determined that their customer service goes above and beyond any other offered by an internet-based company.

Usually, when purchasing an item the transaction is over after I can use it as expected and the seller has resolved all my issues. But what I didn't expect was that when I returned to the office back from my Xmas break in 2023 I received an email from a VANMASS wishing me a happy new year and wanting to know how the product was performing now.

The 36-month warranty offered by VANMASS is more than a simple guarantee. No matter how much time has passed they still consider the needs and feelings of each customer. These guys have again renewed my belief in humanity with their over-the-top customer service.

To the initial query, I believe I have an answer, and that factor is the CERTIFICATION OF TIME. Although the Amazon marketplace is sophisticated, the mission of the phone mount is simple - to make driving easy. This mount has done that for the past 3 years, and I think it will do so well beyond that given its high quality of it.

I travel quite frequently with my kids and love to go on adventures with them. Each year we prepare a list of places and people we wish to visit that year. Now that the world has opened up again and the once-sleepy cities have long since been awakened it's time to get out into the world again.

We traveled through numerous cities with this car mount, ensuring that we can reach where we need to be. When it's cool outside I'll use the suction cup and when it's hot I'll move the mount to the vents. Either way, you can use the holder to hold your phone as it charges while also allowing it to navigate. This not only ensures safe driving but also consistently saves us money on expensive gasoline

Ultimate success in life is created by day-to-day persistence, a process that is often tedious, repetitive, and requires patience. The same experience that this product has undergone allows it to continue to exist today. It is unique but only because it has gone through a long period of improvement.

Lastly, I discovered that they had added more colors. Among them is purple, my daughter's favorite color, I didn't hesitate to get one then because I had no idea that any company even made a purple phone holder. When it arrived, my daughter couldn't wait to open the box because she was excited to have a mount that would match her purple outfit lol. The mount looked as adorable as she did.

If you are looking for a phone mount that can be installed on the dashboard, windshield, or air vent to free your hands and bring convenience to your driving, you can trust VANMASS. They are very professional with their service and their products are reliable.

******Original review******
I was conquered by VANMASS! If you told one customer service of a car mount company that every time you finish eating Mexican food, your car mount will be fall off, so you want a refund, what should the customers service do? VANMASS gave us the right answer, they communicate with me over 10 emails, finially solved the issue.
I have to say that the moment I got VANMASS I was very satisfied. The package is very simple and elegent. You can tell it is not the same thing as the $5 car mount on the market. The product is an artwork, the cutting is neat, all parts are complete, and the installation is very easy. At first, there was no issue at all, then something strange happened.
There are two Mexican restaurants not far from my company, I picked up my lunch there sometimes. The strange thing is that every time I come back from Serrano's, my car mount will fall off, and then I need to clean the suction cup and re-attach them to the dashboard. But I didn't encounter this problem when I came out of another Mexican restaurant. I put the car in the same parking lot, it is so frustrating.
I contacted VANMASS for warranty, I think VANMASS is a little wronged though. This kind of thing keeps happening, it is really frustrating. I did not not expect that, the customer service of VANMASS, reply me immediately, and did not think it was a spoof.
After she got the details, she asked a question about how long I usually stay in Serrano's. Then I understood the problem. Serrano's business is better than the other restaurant in near street. It took me about one hour to finish my lunch at Serrano's instead half-hour at others.
Customer service told me that when the temperature outside the car is 100 ‚ÑâÔºå after half an hour, the temperature inside the car is about 130‚Ñâ, after one hour, 150‚Ñâ. The car mount fall out because of the temperature growth rapidly.
From then on, I would insert the car mount into the the vent or park the car in the shade during the hot weathers, no matter which Mexican restaurant I went to, I never encountered this problem again, lol
I am very grateful to the customer service of VANMASS for helping me solve the problem. I truly feel that VANMASS is professional and responsible, the reply is timely and not perfunctory. In short, VANMASS is a brand I CAN TRUST! Best shopping experience on Amazon.

Was looking for a stable & secure phone mount that can be secured to the windshield specially and had a telescoping arm with he ability to be tilted. This mount can also be mounted to the dashboard if need be. This mount so-far works perfectly. I have not tried mounting it to my dashboard because I don‚Äôt want to put any sticky material on the dashboard which this mount requires in order to adhere an additional smooth surface for the suction cup to stick to‚Ä¶ This mount is a little bulky but has enough adjustability to suit my needs perfectly. I‚Äôm hoping it stays stuck to the windshield during the summer months when it‚Äôs hot. Good mount at a fair price.

Update: I have been using this phone holder on my vent for some time, and it works really well. The customer service for VANMASS was top notch as they cared that the suction did not work for my car. This is definitely a company I would buy from again!
Original post:
I tried to put this on my window and did everything right, but it fell off within a day. I finally clicked it on to my car vent which has worked better. I am still using it and it is working fine but I‚Äôm bummed about the suction issue!

This company is absolutely first class from A-Z. I purchased an extended mount for my iPhone 13 Pro Max and it never peeled off or discolored. Stayed looking new, When I came to peel it off to move to my new car, some of the glue on the suction cup came off due to me using a spatula.

One email to the company and they offered (AFTER over 2 years) to refund my money or send me a replacement suction cup, which is all that I needed. to my positive amazement, I received a new upgraded mount (the full product) and they did not ask me to mail things back, or spend any more time dealing with the issue.

Needless to say, the new mount is PHENOMENAL and I think I will use it for many years to come.

VanMass restored my faith in great and timely customer service. I rarely ever write reviews, but they deserved to be acknowledged. You won't regret buying from them.

I wanted to love this as soon as I opened the box. I think that for most cars this mount will be perfect. I have an Infiniti Q50. For this car, it was not the right mount. The suction cup mount positioned the phone in the middle of the windshield. Not a good idea for safety or law enforcement if you get pulled over.

The vent mount attached firmly to the horizontal vent slats but they move side to side so the phone shakes when the car is moving.

Although I returned the item, I have to give it high marks because it was thoughtfullly engineered and quality is apparent. I wish it would have worked for me.

I tried switching the mount to a different car by placing it on the dashboard, but it would not stick so I returned it. The company was kind enough to reach out to me and send a replacement. I would definitely buy again for this reason. I ended up using it on the air vent
Doesn‚Äôt stick well, the weight of phone tips over, The option to put in vent is not convenient for our vehicle. Customer service was quick to fix our problem. Thank you!

This item has been super helpful in my courier job. I am constantly in my truck and it‚Äôs an older vehicle so I don‚Äôt have Apple play or all that fancy stuff equipped. Having a phone holder in my vehicle is a MUST. I purchased this item in 2021 and from all the heavy heat of Florida beating down on it, it recently broke. I messaged customer service my issue and without hesitation, they‚Äôre sending me a replacement. If you need a phone holder for your vehicle.. look no further!

name: Lifetime Height Adjustable Craft Camping and Utility Folding Table, 4 Foot, 4'/48 x 24, White Granite
description: From the manufacturer

reviews.content: Versatile and workable. It is height adjustable and small enough to fit into many room configurations, or use it outside for medium-sized banquet table, food prep or game table. Upon initial search thought I might have to purchase a 6-foot folding table which was really too big for my needs. This 48" table is the perfect size. Am considering ordering several more as I figure out how best to arrange my workspace. The medium size offers great flexibility in this regard. Table can be used as a standalone, or side by side (48" sides matching), or end-to-end, or perpendicular (on either end), or T-shaped configuration, or flush against a wall--all without taking up too much space. No tools required for assembly/setup. But it was very disappointing that there are no instructions. Lots of print copy on the packing box, as well as images. Seems that it would be a simple thing for manufacturer to print the instructions on the packing box, along with all of the other words on the box (which has plenty of surface space to include the instructions). Perhaps manufacturer doesn't want to incur the cost of a printed set of instructions on a single sheet inside the box. Called Customer Service which was responsive. Customer Service Rep said they get numerous calls about the absence of any written instructions, but she sort of walked me through it, and invited a callback, if I was unable to get the table set up. Good price. Shipping is extra cost factor. Use will be primarily indoors in an extended home office type setting where tabletop surface is needed for some of the office equipment (desktop CPU & dual monitors, etc.) and space needed to spread out papers and files.

I really like this folding table. It is light in weight and easy to set up and take back down. While it is easy to make the heights different, it does take a bit of finger strength to push the buttons in to allow the legs to move up or down. But that is good because then you do not have to worry about the tables legs dropping on you when you put stuff on it. I really like using this table so much so that I have a total of 4 of them. They hold up really well and can withstand a bit of weight. I use my tables for painting, scrapbooking and any time I need a larger area to do crafting on. Then when I am finished with whatever I was doing, I just lower the legs, fold it in half and sit it in a closet out of the way. I also like the fact that if you need to put it in a car, it does not take up a lot of space.

Extra*Spare*FOLDING Table
I use it as an extra table to set up in my tiny little room. I use it to stage instagram photos, lay out and cut fabric for crafts, spread out my bills, anytime I need some counter space. It's light enough for me to carry and that is saying a lot.

That said, I had a little trouble locking it open. Hubby helped. It could pinch your fingers badly so don't get it for children to set up on their own. It's definitely NOT FOR THAT. There are plenty of places to get pinched.

You can change the height! I love that. Of course, at the tallest height it gets a little less sturdy. The next height down is plenty sturdy, not to stand on and dance drunk or anything, just enough to do some work on it or feed some children, have a lemonade stand, put your Replica Surfaces on it, set out a food spread while tailgating, a buffet for a party, that kind of thing.

It's a great price.

That said,

Exactly what I wanted! Pretty decent price, considering in general these folding tables are ridiculously expensive! It even does stuff other folding tables don't usually do, like the adjustable height feature. Easy to carry, set up and adjust. I carried and set it up all by myself. It is little on the heavy side though, so just to be safe have someone around who can help if you need it. I'll be buying another one soon. Overall I'd recommend!

These tables are great. They are sufficiently sturdy (but that also means a bit heavy), fold down into quite a small and easily packable size, and have 3 adjustable heights - one for kids, one for seating dining, and one at cocktail table height.

If I could change only one thing about these, it would be to make them a bit wider. But then again, then they wouldn't be so easily stored!

I'm only 5'10, but it seems like work surfaces are made for people shorter than I am. I have back problems, so bending over a short table is a killer. This table goes up to 36" and voila! I can fold laundry without causing myself pain. I can stand up straight with no need to bend!

This could also be used as a cheap standing desk, but I would recommend using it as a separate desk from your sit down desk because it would be very difficult to adjust the height up and down without knocking things off of it.

It's a bit harder to adjust the height than I expected, but not bad once I got the hang of it.

I've had good luck with Lifetime folding tables. In fact, it's all we used for a budget desk solution at the startup I used to work for, so I was confident in buying one for home. I wish they didn't all have a bit of a bump at the fold when they're open, but it's a minor inconvenience.

I bought 2 of these tables a few years ago and when I tell you it was the best investment I could have every made. I'm an event coordinator, a vendor, and I design dessert tables and these tables are my best friend. I use them for literally everything. I didn't know how bad I needed them until I them and I refuse to live without them. Im considering ordering 2 more as I write this review. If your conflicted about getting them im here to tell you just do it. You will thank me later.

I bought this for travel softball tournaments, camping and cook outs. Im very happy with this purchase. I wanted a table that folded for easy storage and transportation but was big enough to hold lots of food or items. It does seem a little wobbly sitting in my kitchen floor but we will see if that affects anything outside. So glad I got it on sale because now it's over $60. I don't think I would pay $60 for it. Can't wait to use it.

Update: September 2017
Another great use for these tables: When painting or installing decorative shutters on the house these tables at their highest setting make a great temporary workbench to use outside for all of your needed tools. I found this lightweight table very handy for setting drills, screws, etc. when I installed plywood on my window before hurricane Irma hit Florida.
I have a bad back so using the table reduced the need for me to bend down to pick up tools, etc. The tables are easy to move. I found it easy to pick one up (makeshift crossbar and all) and lift it over my head with the legs aiming to the sky then rest the table top on my head while I walked it to the place in my yard where I needed it. I'm no muscle man. I'm a 6 foot, overweight 64 year old but I could easily handle putting the table top on my head. (I know. Bad visual. That's why there is no picture of me doing this! LOL.)
ORIGINAL POSTING:
I'm reviewing Lifetime Table 4428 with the folding table top.
Pros:
This table has 4 features that are hard to find in one table: a folding table top, 36" height, small footprint for storage and a decent price.
Good height as an outfeed table for my 7491RS table saw.
Highest height 36" is perfect for projects where you want to stand.
Folds up for storage.
Carrying strap.
Not too heavy for short distance carrying for a 62 yr. old male.
This is a great table for a 'weekend woodworker' who needs to store everything away at the end of the project so his car will fit in the garage again!
Cons:
Only 24" wide.
Surface has a slight texture but writing with a gel pen and paper are no problem.
Not contractor quality nor durability but good for many home uses.
Not for heavy items like engines. Not a sturdy workbench.
Not easy to open for a weak/elderly person.
Tricky to open and close but this technique should help:
Pull it out of the box, stand it on end and place the hinge side on the floor.
Use a large screwdriver to pry open the end opposite the hinge. Reason being the plastic clip holding it closed is very tight until it wears a little.
Once opened, tip the table on its side edge and extend the table top and legs until they lock.
Look for one red plastic clip under the table surface near the hinges. Press it to lock the table top open.
Now stand the table on its legs. It will be real low.
To raise the table you need 3 arms, 2 people or this trick:
Put your foot on the cross bar that connects 2 legs to each other.
Press in on the 2 silver pins that pop out of the side of the legs and at the same time push down with your foot while lifting with your hands. The table will rise one level.
Do the same thing to the other end of the table.
Repeat the process until you achieve the desired height. There are 3 ht. settings.
====================
Another con: The table wobbles side to side at the highest setting but I have a simple cure to make it sturdy:
Buy a cheap 2x2 stick of lumber for a couple bucks. Actual dimensions: 1.5"x1.5"x4ft.
Cut a notch in the center of each end of the stick to these dimensions: 1" deep by 1" wide. I used a scroll saw.
With the table at its highest setting, pressure fit diagonally the notches between the 2 cross bars at ground level. Then slide/center the stick perpendicular to the cross bars. No screws or bolts needed. The stick will force the legs apart and reduce the wobbling. If you are unable to cut notches in the stick you might get by just using a 47" stick. See photo of notched stick.
It is just as described. I really wish these folding tables would have a completely flat. But that seems to be the issue with these folding tables. All in all excellent product.

name: Scotch Thermal Laminator, 2 Roller System for a Professional Finish, Use for Home, Office or School, Suitable for use with Photos (TL901X)
description:
From the manufacturer
Protect. Preserve. Create.

At home, at school, or at the office, Scotch Brand offers fast and easy to use laminating solutions.

Whether you are simply looking to reinforce documents, or making items tear and spill-proof, we have a laminating solution for you.

	

	



	
	
Scotch TL901X

Our easy-to-use machines produce high-quality lamination, so you can feel conÔ¨Ådent laminating recipe cards, photos, important or frequently handled documents, arts & crafts, and more. All of our machines have settings for both 3 mil and 5 mil pouches. This basic 9-inch machine is a compact introduction to thermal laminating.

Laminating with Scotch Laminators can be fast and easy, let us show you how.

	

	

	




Make sure your machine is warm and ready to go.

The on/off button can be found either as a toggle switch on the back or a push button on the top
Choose your pouch setting, either 3 mil or 5 mil depending on the thickness of the pouch you are working with
Warm up times can take between 1-6 minutes depending on your machine, your machine is warm enough to start laminating once the ready light illuminates
If your machine has a feeding tray, ensure it is extended in the ready position

	

Place your project inside the laminating pouch.

Center your item inside the pouch checking that you leave laminate margin on every side for best sealing results
Have some fun with it by stacking multiple layers of colorful paper, confetti or lettering on top of one another

	

Place the Sealed End of the pouch into the machine, with the open end following behind.

Check to make sure the pouch lines up to the opening to prevent an uneven or angled feed through
Remove any objects that could get in the way of your project as it feeds out of the machine

	

Let the laminator do its thing!

Avoid pulling or obstructing the pouch as it feeds through the laminator
Your project will be hot when it exits the machine so use caution

Helpful tip: Cut/trim pouches only After feeding through the machine

reviews.content:
I bought this Scotch Thermal Laminator hoping to laminate some of our recruiting material to hand out on the street corners to the disaffected youth of my assigned city for my two year committment. I belived the Scotch Thermal Laminator would lend some credibility to our youth movement. I also believed that despite being made fun of and tormented by the youth, they would realize that we take our beliefs seriously and took the time to laminate our literature.

Since we normally travel in pairs, we always want to present the same professional image and therfore wear ties. Here's a hint - ties and lamination machines do not mix. The lighting is subpar in our temple so I had to lean over the Scotch Thermal Laminator to ensure it was hot enought to use. It was! When I leaned over, my tie was accidentally fed into the insertion slot and pulled me into it! I'm natuarally a panicky soul, at least according to the Father, and I didn't know what to do. My tie was being fed into the machine and my face was getting closer. In fact, I could smell my first beard attempt starting to singe! Thankfully Jebidiaha saw what was happening and simply unplugged the Scotch Thermal Laminator. Sadly, our bikes were stolen from out front while this was happening, but at least we got our brochures laminated and distributed even if it was on foot.

I would buy this again. In fact I WILL repurchase this same Scotch Thermal Laminator model once our headquarters wires us our monthly stipend. My only real complaint is that the machine doesn't have a reverse button. :)

I had never given any real thought to acquiring a laminator for my home office, but I ran into a situation where I really needed one. Amazon offered a few other models at somewhat lower prices, but I decided to spend the extra few dollars on the name brand Scotch. Very glad that I did.

Device heats up reasonably quickly (just a few minutes time). Feeder works flawlessly. Laminations of small and large size (business card size, letter paper size) feed easily and the laminated sheets look professionally done - no gaps, bubbles, or creases.

Now that I have such a device, I'm finding quite a few uses for it. Very pleased with this purchase.

I literally got this and laminated two items : car insurance card and health insurance card using 1 pouch in less than 5 minutes. The time it took laminater to warm up and say ready. Wow I am 62 and this is so easy, and did 2 things in one pouch, no waste. Love this. Wondering why I didnt buy this years ago

I love creating my own cards, tags, and party favor items and have always been intimidated by a thermal laminator. Wow, I was dumb for too long. This machine is beyond easy to use. Place your paper in a pouch, feed it in, and it immediately does it thing. Doesn‚Äôt take long at all. I am so happy with this purchase and plan to use this for all my party favor/gift giving needs.

I laminated over 500 hearts for a decoration project. This made it so easy and they are very durable. My only tip is to make sure you weight down your smaller projects until they cool or they will curl up on the edges. I use this all the time and it works without fail!

I am a kindergarten teacher, and I purchased this for personal use for classroom materials. Sometimes our school laminator is getting quite the workout and a backup plan is needed. This works great, and the sheets are thick and hold together well when cut. I have purchased some off brands for sheets that separate almost immediately, but not the Scotch brand ones! Would purchase again!

I am using this to laminate instructions and notes that I take with me "in the field" where I am outdoors. Makes it really easy to print out a sheet and keep it from getting destroyed by dirt, tearing, or moisture. It's easy to use, seems fast enough for my needs.

I am just using normal printer paper, off of a laser printer, often double sided. No issues with clarity or legibility.

Does the job. Give the laminated document time to cool and set. Don't trim the plastic too close to your laminated document, otherwise the lamination could come apart. Also, round the corners for smooth inserting and removal from your wallet.

This little laminator is PERFECT! My 10 year old is in 5th grade and does online school. I have been laminating her weekly homework list and she is able to mark off what assignments she completes. I also print out her spelling words and put in on the back of her weekly assignments, that way everything she needs is together and ready for her!

This item has been like my hot sauce ‚Ä¶ I laminate everything now. Saves papers from stains. Keeps me from spending over 2-5 dollars going to a print shop. It preserves papers and is great when framing and keeping pics and documents from deterioration.
