reviews.content:
I bought this product when I recently replaced my toaster oven and discovered that every toaster oven on the market now has a super short cord. I liked that this device would cover the outlet and provide that extra length needed for the new toaster oven. However, it is NOT perfect.

Pros:
- Outlet cover does cover the entire outlet with a minimally flat cover
- Cord is rated for 1625 watts, which will support small kitchen appliances with heating elements like toaster ovens, coffee pots, electric tea kettle, etc.
- I like that I have 3 outlets now instead of my original 2

Cons:
- The cord management kit that comes with the unit is useless. The adhesive backings pull off as soon as you put any tension on it (e.g. attaching the cord to the clip). I followed the instructions to the letter. I thoroughly cleaned the surfaces, dried them, and then cleaned them again with alcohol and let thoroughly dry before adhering the clips. I then let them sit for over an hour (instructions say 15 mins). As soon as I attached the cord, the clips pulled off the surface. I did this exercise again, this time letting them sit >24 hours after cleaning. Same results. It should be noted that I was trying to adhere the clips to a tiled backsplash and a granite counter. The strips to adhere the outlet end of the cord were just as bad. I ended up using industrial strength velcro for that.
- The outlet cover does not sit flush against the outlet/wall. There is a noticeable gap between the cover and the outlet. Not a huge deal, but far from ideal.
- The outlet cover is MUCH larger than I anticipated. I would have preferred an outlet cover that was the same size as the original outlet plate (possibly even replacing the plate), as that would have made it even more sleek and slim.

Suggested improvements:
- in addition to a smaller outlet cover as previously mentioned, I would also have liked to see a couple of USB ports along with the 3 outlets - especially in this day and age where everyone has to charge their devices

Conclusion:
It solved my problem, but it is not perfect and it is VERY expensive for what you are getting. Unfortunately, this manufacturer seems to be the only game in town with an extension cord that provides a full flat cover over the original outlet. It's too bad it is lacking features (USB plugs), and it definitely could use some quality improvements for the pricetag.

I recently moved to working 100% remote, and the ugly wall outlet just above my desk was more than slightly distracting during those meetings. So - off to find something to hide or disguise it... and I found this! Super slim and discrete. Now, I'm not a huge fan of the cord run-off, but the only other option is to simply cover the outlet, rendering it unusable. I should have gotten a longer cord (they have several options) but I have other areas in my home where this would work great, such as behind my dining room credenza or the entertainment center. Would definitely purchase again. Shipped quickly as well.

I had to move a large, heavy, wooden office credenza with a printer to a different wall. But the cord in the socket stuck out TOO MUCH for the space I was moving it to. I had to find some way to make the cabinet more FLUSH to the wall but the darn plug was unfortunately bulky and the maneuvering in front of the furniture was not going to work!

This product saved my entire project! The SLEEK SOCKET did the trick and now I have the extra space in front of it! I am so happy I could scream!

Thank you, SOCKET SOLUTIONS - you helped me work a miracle today!

I‚Äôve been wanting one of these for a while but the higher price kept me buying less expensive options. I finally broke down when I wanted to to use every inch of my tiny closet that also houses our paper shedder.
It was super easy to install and came with easy to install cord keepers to secure flat to wall trim. My only regret is not buying it sooner.

This cord is just what I was looking for, my outlet is right where my bed sits in the corner so I needed something that didn't stick out, and this worked perfected, bonus point too, came with a good amount of strips to stick it to the wall, they've held up well so far, had a phone charger and a vacuum cleaner plugged into to. Both worked fine and the extension did rip off the wall even when I tugged the vacuum cleaner cord.

I‚Äôm so glad I came across this product. Like everyone, I hate it when a piece of furniture has to sit a few inches away from the wall because something is plugged into the outlet behind it. These not only solve that problem, but they allow give you more than two spots to plug things in. It‚Äôs the perfect invention I wish I‚Äôd thought of it first lol

I had an outlet that sat in the middle of an empty wall with the tv and cat fountain plugged in. I hated the way it looked with the cords sticking out. the socket concealer worked perfect. I read the reviews and one said the cover wasn't big enough to cover the plate. I actually had to cut away some of the wall trim around the outlet away because the cover was a good amount larger which was great. Also read the sticky cord holders did not stick. Mine are sticking perfectly. Nothing really to install just plug it in and put on the little cord stickers and done. It looks so much better I have to do some paint touch up where I had to cut trim and I am going to paint the cover also so the whole thing will completely blend in. A perfect solution for ugly cords.

We needed to use an outlet that was buried tight behind our couch and came across this. I was impressed with how simple and sleek the design was and with its incredibly low profile, it should work in just about any tight space. The cord was just about the perfect length and we now have access to an otherwise inaccessible outlet.

Used this product so I could push my couch up against a wall that had a plug with things plugged up to it making it difficult to put my couch there, so once I put the new ultra slim plug in with the 3 extension plugs I was able to slide it up against the wall and hide the extension 3 way plug under my end table

I love this flat wall plug in outlet with three adaptor on the opposite end of cord. I hate cords showing because it takes away the beauty of the decor. I have mine hidden so perfectly, you won't even notice it. I wish I had this years ago. I would certainly recommend it. Mine is in an outlet for my TV, clock, fireplace, and added an adaptor for my firestick. It is all hidden behind my fireplace TV stand. Yeah-yah! This piece is getting 5 stars; Go ahead a buy yours today!

description:
From the manufacturer
About us

Canon U.S.A., Inc. is a provider of consumer, business-to-business, and industrial digital imaging solutions to the United States and to Latin America and the Caribbean markets.

Canon's founding mission was to build a company that created high-quality cameras. Canon realized this dream in 1936 when it released the Hansa Canon, Japan's first 35mm focal-plane shutter camera. Since that time, our technological strengths have helped us to also become a digital imaging and networking company and a force in personal and office printers, copiers, controllers and fax machines. We also have applied our innovative skills in environmental technologies, as well as medical, semiconductor, and broadcasting equipment. We will continue to develop innovative technologies as a means of bettering the world we live in - redefining the workplace and enhancing lifestyles.

As always, Canon aims to be a good corporate citizen within the community and will continue fostering relationships in the surrounding area.

reviews.content:
I am a home school teacher and I have many printable per day and this product for this price is amazing and better than going into stores. I am most grateful for this seller and will continue to buy at this price.

Thank you.

Packaging was adequate, fast shipping, reasonable pricing, and it is working. I printed off photos that I used as Christmas presents for friends using photos paper of excellent quality, and the photos came out to be perfect. I was very pleased with the quality of the printing at least partially due to this ink cartridge, so absolutely no complaints. It has not run out so I can't speak to longevity actually although indications by the gauge on my printer are that it is doing just fine....at least as expected. Update...it sure seems like it could have lasted longer. Ran out rather quickly. So rating should be adjusted maybe to a 4 star.
Was easy to install and prints just fine

Ink cartridges are often unavailable in office and chain stores but always available with quick delivery via Amazon. Price is slightly better so reasonable value. Problem I have with these and most cartridges is that they don't seem to really last very long.
Fits and works is perfectly
Ink last just as much the ones you buy at Best buy, or any other place. And definitely a better price.
Not much to way except I chose to purchase my Canon twin-pack from Amazon because of a competitive price, Prime next-day delivery!!
Couldn‚Äôt beat the price. Good quality and easy to install. Good product.
Good item
good product
